<b0>"My Projects" Location</b0>: The location qhere <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will initially create new projects.

<b0>"description":</b0> The description of the last uploaded file.
<b0>"description":</b0> 上传的最后一个文件的描述。
<b0>"errorString":</b0> returns an Error String for any error.
<b0>"id":</b0> The id which was returned from the called function.
<b0>"resultString":</b0> This holds a string which is the data blob returned from the cloud.
<b0>"resultString":</b0> 从云端返回的二进制数据。
<b0>"status":</b0> This holds the status code, where a negative value denotes an error, a description of which will be contained in the “errorString”.
<b0>"status":</b0> 这是状态码，其中负值表示错误，错误详情包含在“errorstring”中。
<b0>% when application is not in focus</b0>: The base power consumption when <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> is not in focus (regardless of the power supply).
<b0>% 在应用程序失去焦点时（% when application is not in focus）</b0>：当<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>失去焦点时的基本功耗（该情况下无视电源类型）。
<b0>% when on AC power</b0>: The base power consumption when connected to a power input.
<b0>% 在使用交流电源时（% when on AC power）</b0>：当连接输入电源时的基本功耗。
<b0>% when on battery power</b0>: The base power consumption when using battery to power the machine.
<b0>% 在使用电池电源时（% when on battery power）</b0>：当使用机器电池时的基本功耗。
<b0>&&, ||, ^^ (and, or and xor)</b0> - Combine Boolean values to give either true or false.
<b0>&&, ||, ^^（与、或和异或）</b0> - 将两个布尔值结合在一起判断是真还是否。
<b0>++, --</b0> - Add or subtract <i1>one</i1> from a value.
<b0>++a</b0> will increment the variable and return the incremented value.
<b0>++a</b0> 递增变量并返回增加后的值。
<b0><, <=, ==, !=, >, >=</b0> - These are comparisons and can only give a <t1>true</t1> or <t2>false</t2> result (where true can also be interpreted as 1, and false as 0).
<b0><, <=, ==, !=, >, >=</b0> - 这些都是比较运算，且只会得出 <t1>true</t1> 或者 <t2>false</t2> 的结果（true = 1，false = 0）。
<b0><t1>-debugoutput <filename></t1></b0>: Sends console output to the filename, excluding any custom debug messages, but including extra information from the runner for bug reporting.
<b0><t1>-debugoutput <filename></t1></b0>: 将控制台输出发送到文件名（filename），不包括任何自定义调试信息，但包括来自运行程序错误报告的额外信息。
<b0><t1>-inawindow</t1></b0>: Forces the game to start in a window, even when set to run in fullscreen mode.
<b0><t1>-inawindow</t1></b0>: 强制游戏以窗口方式运行，即使在编译时设置成以全屏模式运行。
<b0><t1>-intel</t1></b0>: This will switch on a fix for bad Intel drivers, no matter what GPU is being used.
<b0><t1>-intel</t1></b0>: 无论使用什么显卡，这都会启用无效 Inter 驱动修复程序。
<b0><t1>-noaudio</t1></b0>: This switches off all audio in your game.
<b0><t1>-noaudio</t1></b0>: 关闭游戏中所有的音频。
<b0><t1>-output <filename></t1></b0>: Sends console output to the filename, including any debug messages that you have in your code base.
<b0><t1>-output <filename></t1></b0>: 将控制台输出发送到文件名（filename），包括代码库中的任何调试信息。
<b0><t1>-software</t1></b0>: Will force the game to use Software Vertex Processing instead of hardware for rendering the game graphics.
<b0><t1>-software</t1></b0>: 强制游戏使用软件顶点处理而不是硬件渲染游戏图形。
<b0><t1>-vanillaGFX</t1></b0>: Using this switches off any check for driver manufacturer, and can be very useful for testing your game "as is".
<b0><t1>-vanillaGFX</t1></b0>: 使用该选项可以关闭驱动程序制造商检测，这对于测试你的游戏“原貌”非常有用。
<b0>=</b0> - Used to assign a value to a variable.
<b0>AC power framerate (%)</b0>: The base IDE framerate modifier when connected to a power input.
<b0>使用交流电源时帧率（%）</b0>: 当使用交流电供电时，IDE的帧率。
<b0>About</b0> - Opens the "about <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>" window where you can get version information on the product (essential for reporting any bugs or issues).
<b0>关于</b0> - 打开 “关于 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>” 窗口，你可以在这里面获取到产品的版本信息（在上报 Bug 和问题时这很有用）。
<b0>Add Event</b0> - Add a new event from the event list.
<b0>添加事件</b0> - 从事件列表中添加新事件。
<b0>Add Existing From My Library</b0> - Add resources to the tree from an asset in your Marketplace library.
<b0>从我的库添加现有资源 </b0> - 从 Marketplace 库向资源树添加资源。
<b0>Add Existing</b0> - Add an existing resource from a different <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> project folder.
<b0>添加现有资源</b0> - 从不同的 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 项目文件夹中添加现有资源。
<b0>Add Group</b0> - Add a new Resource Group folder to the tree at the clicked position.
<b0>添加组</b0> - 在点击的位置向资源树添加新的资源组文件夹。

<b0>Add default help content</b0>: By default this option is enabled and all it does is add a simple comment into the <i1>code editor</i1> for all new events to remind you that you can add your code there.
<b0>添加默认的事件内容</b0>: 该选项默认启用，它所做的只是为所有新事件在 <i1>代码编辑器</i1> 中添加一个简单的注释，以提醒你可以在那里添加代码。

<b0>Add default layers when creating a new room</b0> - When you create any new room resource, <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will generate a couple of "base" layers for you - a background layer and an instance layer.
<b0>创建新房间时添加默认的层（Add default layers when creating a new room）</b0> - 当你创建任意一个房间资源，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>将为你生成两个“基础”的层， - 一个背景层和一个实例层。
<b0>Add default room layers</b0> - When you create any new room resource, <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will generate a couple of "base" layers for you - a background layer and an instance layer.
<b0>添加默认房间层</b0> - 当您创建新的场景资源时， <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 将为您生成一些“基础”图层 - 背景层和实例层。
<b0>Allow Empty Tabs To Close Via Shortcut</b0>: You can close any open Tabs using the keyboard shortcut <i1> + <b2><t3>W</t3></b2>, but if you disable this option that shortcut will no longer work.
<b0>允许通过快捷键关闭空标签（Allow Empty Tabs To Close Via Shortcut）</b0>：你可以使用键盘快捷键<i1> + <b2><t3>W</t3></b2>关闭任意被打开的标签，但如果禁用该选项，则该快捷键将不再生效。

<b0>Allow empty tabs to close via shortcut</b0>: You can close any open Tabs using the keyboard shortcut <i1>/<i2> + <b3><t4>W</t4></b3>, but if you disable this option that shortcut will no longer work.
<b0>允许通过键盘快捷键关闭空的选项卡</b0>: 你可以使用键盘快捷键 <i1>/<i2> + <b3><t4>W</t4></b3> 关闭任何已经打开的选项卡，但是如果你禁用该选项快捷键将不再有效。
<b0>Allow workspace chains to overlap</b0>: When enabled this option will permit workspace chains to cross and overlap.
<b0>允许工作区的连接线交叉（Allow workspace chains to overlap）</b0>：启用该选项后将允许工作区内的连接线彼此交叉重叠。

<b0>Always Open New Resources Dropped Into IDE</b0>: Certain resources (like sprites or sounds) can be dragged onto the main Workspace in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE and will be detected and added as a new resource in the Resource Tree.
<b0>总是打开被拖拽到IDE中的新资源（Always Open New Resources Dropped Into IDE）</b0>：某些资源（像精灵（Sprites）或声音（Sounds））是可以被拖拽到<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>主工作区中的，并且它能够被检测到并被添加到资源树中作为一个新资源。
<b0>Anchor Point Height</b0> - Set the height of the anchor points, in pixels.
<b0>锚点高度（Anchor Point Height）</b0> - 设置锚点高度，以像素为单位。
<b0>Anchor Point Width</b0> - Set the width of the anchor points, in pixels.
<b0>锚点的宽度（Anchor Point Width）</b0> - 设置锚点的宽度，以像素为单位。
<b0>Anchor point colour</b0> - Set the colour for the different anchor points on the spline/arc.
<b0>锚点颜色</b0> - 为锚点设置颜色。
<b0>Anchor point height</b0> - Set the height of the anchor points, in pixels.
<b0>锚点高度</b0> - 设置锚点的高度，以像素为单位。
<b0>Anchor point width</b0> - Set the width of the anchor points, in pixels.
<b0>锚点宽度</b0> - 设置锚点的宽度，以像素为单位。
<b0>Anchor points colour</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points.
<b0>锚点颜色</b0> - 设置用于绘制路径锚点的颜色。

<b0>Android</b0> - For Android devices, a single <t1>*.apk</t1> file will be generated which can be used directly on any Android devices or uploaded to the <i2>Google Play</i2> or <i3>Amazon</i3> stores (or any other site that accepts Android apps).
<b0>Android</b0> - 对于Android设备，将生成 <t1>*.apk</t1> 文件，可直接在 Android 设备上使用，或上传到 <i2>Google Play</i2> 以及 <i3>Amazon</i3> 商店（或任何其他接受 Android 应用程序的网站）。
<b0>Anti-Aliasing Mode</b0>: Here you can set the anti-aliasing mode for the output windows font rendering.
<b0>抗锯齿模式（Anti-Aliasing Mode）</b0>：在此处你可以设置输出窗口字体渲染的抗锯齿模式。
<b0>Anti-Aliasing</b0>: Here you can set the anti-aliasing mode for the output windows font rendering.
<b0>抗锯齿</b0>: 这里可以设置输出窗口字体渲染是否抗锯齿。
<b0>Asset Cache</b0>: The location for saving the asset cache for each project.
<b0>资源缓存（Asset Cache）</b0>：该位置用于存储每个工程的资源缓存。
<b0>Asset cache directory</b0>: The location for saving the asset cache for each project.
<b0>资产缓存目录</b0>: The location for saving the asset cache for each project.
<b0>音频组</b0> - 查看 <a1>音频组</a1> 窗口
<b0>Auto Delete Temp Folder</b0>: Checking this will force <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to automatically delete the Temp folder that it creates per project for compiling etc...
<b0>自动删除临时文件夹（Auto Delete Temp Folder）</b0>：勾选此项将会强制<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>自动删除每次编译工程等时候产生的临时文件夹。
<b0>Auto add function brackets</b0>: Enable or disable the automatic addition of brackets () when you use the autocomplete.
<b0>自动添加函数括号</b0>: 启用或禁用在使用自动填充时自动为函数添加括号 ()。
<b0>Auto indent after brace</b0>: Enable or disable auto-indentation for your code when adding braces {}.
<b0>在大括号后自动缩进</b0>: 启用或者禁用代码添加 {} 时的自动缩进。
<b0>Automatic Response to Exit Confirmation</b0>: This option permits you to set whether a confirmation message should be shown when you exit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>自动响应退出确认</b0>: 此选项允许你设置当T你退出 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 时是否弹出提示。

<b0>Automatic response to DnD&trad; conversion to Gamemaker Language</b0>: You can use the right mouse button <i1> within the Drag and Drop workspace to select the option to turn all Drag and Drop for that event into GML code.
<b0>自动响应 DnD&trad; 转换为 GML</b0>: 你可以在拖拽工作区中使用鼠标右键 <i1> 选择将事件的所有拖拽转换为 GML 代码。

<b0>Automatic response to DnD™ conversion to GameMaker Language</b0>: When you convert a Drag and Drop event or script into GML code, you will by default get a message warning you about what you are about to do and asking if you want to continue.
<b0>自动响应 DnD™ 转换为 GameMaker Language</b0>: 当你将拖拽事件或脚本转换为GML代码时，默认情况下会收到一条警告消息询问是否继续。
<b0>Automatic response to DnD™ conversion to GameMaker Language</b0>: When you select the option to convert a DnD™ node to GML, you will be prompted to confirm the change as this cannot be undone.
<b0>自动响应 DnD™ 转化为 GameMaker Language</b0>: 选择将 DnD™ 节点转换为 GML 时，系统将提示您是否确认更改，因为该动作无法撤消。

<b0>Automatic response to DnD™ conversion to GameMaker Language</b0>: When you use the right mouse button <i1> menu option on a timeline moment to convert Drag and Drop actions into script (code) you will get a prompt asking you if you wish to continue, since this is a one way conversion.
<b0>自动响应 DnD™ 转换为 GameMaker Language</b0>: 当您在时间轴上使用鼠标右键 <i1> 菜单选项将拖放模块转换为脚本（代码）时，您会收到一个提示，询问您是否要继续，因为这是一个单向转换。

<b0>Automatic response to DnD™ node deletion</b0>: When you delete a Drag and Drop event node, you will by default get a message warning you about what you are about to do and asking if you want to continue.
<b0>自动响应 DnD™ 节点删除</b0>: 当你删除拖拽事件节点时，默认收到警告消息询问是否继续。

<b0>Automatic response to closing a workspace via keyboard shortcut</b0>: The keyboard shortcut mentioned above can be used to close any open tab, but sometimes you may accidentally close an empty tab that you require.
<b0>通过键盘快捷键自动响应关闭工作区</b0>: 上述快捷键可以关闭任何打开的选项卡，但是有时候你可能会意外地关闭你需要的空选项卡。
<b0>Automatic response to closing the debugger</b0>: This option permits you to set the automatic response when closing the debugger.
<b0>自动响应关闭调试器</b0>: 此选项允许你在关闭调试器时设置自动响应。
<b0>Automatic response to committing changes on tool change</b0> - When you change draw tools after editing a frame, by default a message shows to ask if you want to commit the changes made.
<b0>自动响应工具更改时提交更改</b0> - 当你在编辑帧后更改绘图工具时，默认会显示一条消息，询问你是否要提交所做的更改。

<b0>Automatic response to deleting custom views</b0>: When you have created a custom Resource Tree view and then choose to delete it, you will be shown a message asking if you wish to continue and remove the view.
<b0>自动响应删除自定义视野</b0>: 创建自定义资源树视图后，当您删除它时，系统将显示一条消息，询问是否继续并删除该视图。
<b0>Automatic response to deleting frames</b0> - When you delete a frame by default a message shows to ask if you are sure you want to do this.
<b0>自动响应删除帧</b0> - 当你删除帧时，默认显示一条消息询问你是否确定要这样做。

<b0>Automatic response to exceeding physics vertex limit</b0>: This option can be used to control the pop up message that is shown when you exceed the permitted vertex number in the physics shape editor.
<b0>自动响应超出物理顶点限制</b0>: 当物理形状编辑器中超过允许的顶点数目时会显示一条警告信息。

<b0>Automatic response to file deletion</b0>: The default setting here is to show a message asking if you are sure you want to delete, but you can set this to "OK" so that all deletions are completed without this message as if you'd clicked okay already.
<b0>自动响应文件删除</b0>: 默认设置是显示一条信息，询问你是否确定删除，但是你可以将其设置为“确定”，以便所有删除造作在没有此消息的情况下完成，就像你已经点击了“确定”一样。

<b0>Automatic response to file import</b0>: When you import a new image and one already exists, by default you will be prompted to continue importing and overwrite the existing image or cancel the operation.
<b0>自动响应文件导入</b0>: 当你导入一张已经到如果的图片时，默认你会被提示是否要继续导入以覆盖原图或取消当前操作。

<b0>Automatic response to group selected warning</b0> - If you select multiple layers in the layer editor and then try to draw or edit then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it is not possible.
<b0>自动响应组选择的警告</b0> - 如果在层编辑器中选择多个层，然后尝试绘制或编辑，那么默认情况下将显示一条消息，告诉你这是不可能的。
<b0>Automatic response to image load failure</b0>: When you import a new image and and the import fails, by default you will be shown a warning message informing you that there has been a failure.
<b0>自动响应图片加载失败</b0>: 当你导入新的图片但导入失败时，你默认会收到一个对话框提示告知导入失败。

<b0>Automatic response to invalid layer selection drag error</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you drag a resource onto the room editor when you have selected multiple layers in the layer editor (or have not selected any layer at all).
<b0>自动响应无效层选区拖动错误</b0> - 当您在图层编辑器中选择多个图层（或根本没有选择任何图层），将资源拖动到场景编辑器时。

<b0>Automatic response to invalid resource drag error</b0> - If you try to add a resource to a layer that is not designated as being for that resource type (like adding a sprite to a path layer), then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it can't be done.
<b0>自动响应无效资源拖动错误</b0> - 如果您尝试向未指定为该资源类型的层添加资源（例如向路径层添加精灵），则默认情况下将显示一条消息通知你无法完成此操作。
<b0>Automatic response to item locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete an item it happens to be locked, you will be shown a message by default.
<b0>自动响应项目锁定警告</b0> - 如果您尝试删除一个项目，它恰巧被锁定，默认情况下会显示一条消息。

<b0>Automatic response to item owner layer locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete an item on a layer and the layer happens to be locked (even if the item is not), then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it can't be done.
<b0>自动响应项目所有者图层的锁定警告</b0> - 如果您尝试删除图层上的项目，并且图层恰好被锁定（即使该项目未被锁定），则默认情况下将显示一条消息以通知您无法完成此操作。
<b0>Automatic response to layer locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete a layer in the room and it happens to be locked, you will be shown a message by default.
<b0>自动响应层锁定警告</b0> - 如果您尝试删除场景中的图层，并且该图层恰好被锁定，默认情况下将显示一条消息。
<b0>Automatic response to locked layer warning</b0> - If you try to edit a locked layer you'll get a message by default informing you that you can't do this.
<b0>自动响应锁定层警告</b0> - 如果你试图编辑一个锁定的陈，默认会显示一条警告信息告诉你不能这样做。
<b0>Automatic response to locked or invisible layer drag error</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you drag a resource onto a layer that has been locked or is flagged as invisible.
<b0>自动响应锁定/隐藏层拖动错误</b0> - 当您选择将资源拖动到已锁定或被标记为不可见的图层时。

<b0>Automatic response to opening multiple resources</b0>: As mentioned above in the general Resource Tree preferences, when you open multiple resources at once from the resource tree, you can get a warning if the number exceeds the number specified.
<b0>自动响应打开多个资源</b0>: 如上所述，在“资源树”首选项中，当从资源树中一次打开多个资源时，如果打开数目超过指定的数字，则会收到警告。
<b0>Automatic response to parent room item deletion</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you delete an item that is part of a parent room (and so present in all child rooms).
<b0>自动响应父房间项目删除</b0> - 当您选择删除作为母场景一部分（并且在所有子场景中存在）的项目时。
<b0>Automatic response to parent room layer deletion</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you delete a layer that is part of a parent room (and so present in all child rooms).
<b0>自动响应父房间层删除</b0> - 当您选择删除作为母场景一部分（并且在所有子场景中存在）的图层时。

<b0>Automatic response to permanent action warning</b0>: Certain actions within a timeline cannot be undone, and when that happens you will recieve a warning message asking you if you want to continue.
<b0>自动响应永久（permanent）动作警告</b0>: 时间轴中的某些操作无法撤消，如果发生这种情况，您将收到一条警告消息，询问您是否要继续。
<b0>Automatic response to proxy file deletion</b0>: As above, this controls the message you are shown on deletion of any proxy files.
<b0>自动响应代理文件删除</b0>: 如上所述，这将控制删除任何代理文件时是否显示消息。

<b0>Automatic response to replacing images during strip import</b0> - When you select <i1>Import Strip</i1> from the <i2>Image</i2> drop down menu, you will get a message warning you that you will be overwriting any images already in the sprite resource, with the option to continue or not.
<b0>自动响应在长带图导入时替换图像</b0> - 当你从 <i2>图像</i2> 下拉菜单中选择 <i1>导入长带图</i1> 时，会收到一条消息，警告你将覆盖精灵资源中已有的图像，有继续或不继续两个选项。

<b0>Automatic response to resetting the project layout</b0>: When you select to reset the project layout (from the <a1>Layouts Menu</a1>) you will, by default, be shown a warning message about how this will close any open resource windows.
<b0>自动响应重置项目布局</b0>: 当你选择重启项目布局（从 <a1>布局菜单</a1>），默认情况下会显示一条警告消息，说明这将如何关闭打开的资源窗口。
<b0>Automatic response to resource deletion</b0>: When you delete a resource from the resource tree you normally get a warning asking if you are sure you want to proceed.
<b0>自动响应资源删除</b0>: 从资源树中删除资源时，通常会收到一条警告，询问您是否确定要继续。
<b0>Automatic response to restarting a running build</b0>: When you restart a build and another previous one is still running, you will be asked whether you want to stop the current build first.
<b0>自动响应重新启动正在运行的构建</b0>: 当你重新启动一个构建，而另一个之前的构建仍在运行时，将询问你是否希望先停止当前构建。

<b0>Automatic response to setting a room parent via node drag</b0>: When you drag a room over another room in the resource tree and then release it, you will be shown a message asking if you wish to make the room a "child" of the room being dropped on.
<b0>通过节点拖动自动响应设置房间父级</b0>: 当您拖动房间到资源树中的另一个房间下，然后释放它，系统将显示一条消息，询问您是否希望让被拖动房间成为拖动位置所在房间的子房间。

<b0>Automatic response to turning off anonymous statistics</b0>: When you disable anonymous game statistics in the <a1>General Game options</a1>, you will be shown a warning message asking you to consider the option carefully.
<b0>自动响应关闭匿名统计</b0>: 当你在 <a1>常规游戏选项</a1> 中禁用匿名游戏统计信息时，会显示一条警告信息，询问你仔细考虑该选项。
<b0>Automatic response to updating layer depths</b0> - When you change layer depths a message is shown to warn you that doing this will also automatically update all the other layer depths.
<b0>自动响应更新层深度</b0> - 当更改图层深度时，会显示一条消息，提示您这样做也会自动更新其他所有图层的深度。
<b0>Automatic response to warning when attempting to debug YYC</b0>: The YYC target compiles to native code and as such cannot be debugged using the built in debugger.
<b0>尝试调试YYC时自动响应警告</b0>: YYC目标编译为本机代码，因此不能使用内置调试器进行调试。
<b0>Automatically Reload Changed Files</b0>: If this is checked then the IDE will automatically scan and check
<b0>自动重新载入变动文件（Automatically Reload Changed Files）</b0>：如果该选项被勾选，则IDE会自动扫描并检查
<b0>Automatically delete IDE cache on close</b0>: If this is checked then the IDE compiler cache folder will be removed when you quit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>关闭时自动删除IDE缓存目录</b0>: 如果勾选此选项，退出 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 时会删除IDE缓存目录。
<b0>Automatically delete asset cache on close</b0>: If this is checked then the asset compiler cache folder will be removed when you quit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>关闭时自动删除资产缓存目录</b0>: 如果勾选此选项，退出 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 时会删除资产编译器缓存目录。
<b0>Automatically delete temp directory on close</b0>: Checking this will force <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to automatically delete the Temp folder that it creates per project for compiling etc...
<b0>关闭时自动删除临时目录</b0>: 勾选此选项 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 会自动删除临时目录（如：编译等）。
<b0>Automatically enable source control</b0>: When this is checked, source control will be enabled for all new projects automatically.
<b0>自动启用源码控制</b0>: 选中此项，将自动为所有新项目启用源代码管理。
<b0>Automatically open source control output window</b0>: When this is checked, the source control output window will be shown automatically when something changes.
<b0>自动打开源码控制输出窗口</b0>: 勾选此选项，在某些修改时源码控制输出窗口会自动打开。
<b0>Automatically open syntax error window on detection</b0>: Enable or disable syntax error notification when compiling.
<b0>在错误检测时自动打开语法错误窗口</b0>: 编译时启用或禁用语法错误通知。
<b0>Automatically pop up Syntax Errors when an error occurs</b0>: Enable or disable syntax error notification when compiling.
<b0>当错误发生时自动弹出语法错误（Automatically pop up Syntax Errors when an error occurs）</b0>：编译时启用或禁用语法错误通知。

<b0>Automatically reload changed files</b0>: If this is checked then the IDE will automatically scan and check files to see if any of them have been changed outside of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> and reload them if they have.
<b0>自动重新加载更改的文件</b0>: 如果勾选该选项，IDE将自动扫描并检查文件是否在 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 之外的位置被修改，如果是则重新加载它们。
<b0>Background Image</b0>: This is the image file that will be used as the background for the different Workspaces.
<b0>背景图（Background Image）</b0>：该选项是被用于各个工作区下作为背景的图像文件。

<b0>Background colour in editor</b0>: While editing a sprite frame the image may be scaled in or out or may not fit the whole drawing in window, in which case a background colour will be shown which you can set here.
<b0>编辑器的背景色（Background colour in editor）</b0>：当编辑精灵帧的时候，图像可能会被放大或缩小，并且可能不会适应窗口中的整个绘制区域，在这种情况下，就会显示你所设置的背景色。
<b0>Background framerate (%)</b0>: The base IDE framerate modifier when <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> is not in focus (regardless of the power supply).
<b0>应用失去焦点时的背景帧率（%）</b0>: 当 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 失去焦点时IDE的频率。
<b0>Background</b0>: <i1> This section permits you to set the background colour for the main asset nodes in the Resource Tree.
<b0>背景</b0>: <i1> 此部分允许您设置资源树中主要资源节点的背景颜色。
<b0>Battery power framerate (%)</b0>: The base IDE framerate modifier when using battery to power the machine.
<b0>使用电池时帧率（%）</b0>: 当使用电池供电时，IDE的帧率。
<b0>Be careful with your while loops!</b0> You can easily make infinite loops, in which case your game will hang and not react to any user input anymore.
<b0>请小心你的while循环！</b0> 它很容易就能造成无限循环，在这种情况下你的游戏将被挂起并且不再响应任何的用户输入。
<b0>Canvas block size</b0> - When you have selected Block Pattern for the background, you can set the size of the individual block here.
<b0>透明背景块大小（块图案样式）</b0> - 当你的背景选择为方块图案时，可以在此处设置方块的大小。
<b0>Canvas primary colour</b0> - If you have Single Colour chosen for the background, then the colour used is this one.
<b0>透明背景颜色 1</b0> - 如果选择了单色模式，可以在这里选择单色的颜色。
<b0>Canvas secondary colour (block pattern style)</b0> - If you have Block Pattern chosen for the background, then the colour used to alternate with colour 1 (above) is this one.
<b0>透明背景颜色 2（块图案样式）</b0> - 如果选择了方块图案，那么与颜色 1 交替使用的颜色就是该颜色。
<b0>Canvas style</b0> - Here you set the "style" for the background, which can either be "<i1>Block Pattern</i1>" or "<i2>Single Colour</i2>".
<b0>透明背景样式（Canvas）</b0> - 设置背景的“样式”，可以为 "<i1>方块图案</i1>" 或 "<i2>单色模式</i2>"。
<b0>Certificate File</b0>: This section is where you specify the <t1>*.pem</t1> file that the Marketplace uses for certification of assets.
<b0>证书文件（Certificate File）</b0>：这个部分是你所指定给市场用于资源认证的<t1>*.pem</t1>文件。
<b0>Certificate Password</b0>: Here you must give a unique password for the certificate file to be created.
<b0>证书密码（Certificate Password）</b0>：在这里，你必须为即将创建的证书设置一个独立的密码。
<b0>Certificate Password</b0>: Here you must input the certificate password for the file selected above.
<b0>证书密码（Certificate Password）</b0>：在此处你必须输入上面所选文件的认证密码。
<b0>Chain Minimum Alpha</b0>: Sets the final alpha value after the fade out falloff point for the chain alpha.
<b0>连接线最小 Alpha 值</b0>: 设置在淡出衰减点之后的最终alpha值。
<b0>Chain fade out start distance (px)</b0>: Sets the distance from the parent window for the chain link to fade out from.
<b0>连接线淡出开始距离（像素）</b0>: 设置从连接的父窗口到开始淡出的距离。
<b0>Chain fade out stop distance (px)</b0>: Sets the distance from the parent window for the chain link to end fading out to.
<b0>连接线淡出停止距离（像素）</b0>: 设置从连接的父窗口到结束淡出的距离。
<b0>Check</b0>: Once you have filled in the above fields you should click this button to ensure that the password and file selection are correct and work together.
<b0>检查（Check）</b0>：一旦你已经填入了上述字段，你应该点击这个按钮来确保密码和所选文件是否正确以及是否能够一起运作。
<b0>Clean</b0> - <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> keeps a cache of files to help speed up compile time when testing.
<b0>清除</b0> - 测试时 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 会保存缓存文件以帮助加速编译。

<b0>Clear output window on compile start</b0>: By default the compiler window will clear all previous messages from the compile output window at the start of each build, however un-checking this will maintain previous compiler logs.
<b0>编译开始时清除输出窗口</b0>: 默认情况下编译器窗口会在每次构建开始时清除之前的编译输出窗口的所有信息，但是取消勾选此选项可以保留之前的编译器日志。

<b0>Clear output window on compile</b0>: By default the compiler window will clear all previous messages from the compile output window at the start of each build, however un-checking this will maintain previous compiler logs.
<b0>编译时清空输出窗口（Clear output window on compile）</b0>：默认地，编译窗口会在每次开始构建的时候清空窗口，而解除此项会保留之前的编译日志。
<b0>Code Completion Delay (ms)</b0> - The delay time (in milliseconds)
<b0>代码补全延迟（毫秒）</b0> - 延迟的时间（毫秒）
<b0>Colour Applied To Active Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are active.
<b0>激活的锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Active Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制激活的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Active Invalid Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are active but invalid.
<b0>活跃却无效的锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Active Invalid Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制激活但是无效的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To An Invalid Path</b0> - The colour to be used to highlight a path that is not valid.
<b0>用于一个无效路径的颜色（Colour Applied To An Invalid Path）</b0> - 用于高亮无效路径的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points.
<b0>锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制路径锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Highlighted Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points that have been highlighted (selected).
<b0>高亮锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Highlighted Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制高亮的锚点的颜色（选中）。
<b0>Colour Applied To Highlighted Path Segments</b0> - The colour to be used to highlight any selected path segments.
<b0>应用于高亮路径节点的颜色（Colour Applied To Highlighted Path Segments）</b0> - 用于高亮任何选中的路径节点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Invalid Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points.
<b0>无效锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Invalid Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制无效路径锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To Invalid Highlighted Anchor Points</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are highlighted but invalid.
<b0>应用于无效的高亮锚点的颜色（Colour Applied To Invalid Highlighted Anchor Points）</b0> - 用于绘制高亮但却是无效的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Colour Applied To The Path</b0> - The colour to be used to show the path as you edit it.
<b0>应用到路径的颜色（Colour Applied To The Path）</b0> - 编辑时，显示路径用的颜色。
<b0>Colour coding/code completion for obsolete functions</b0>: This will highlight any section of code that is obsolete.
<b0>为含有弃用的内容的代码提供语法高亮和自动补全</b0>：这将突出显示代码中的过时函数。
<b0>Colour of control lines</b0> - Set the colour for the lines linking the control points to the nodes.
<b0>控制线颜色（Colour of control lines）</b0> - 设置控制点与节点的连接线颜色。
<b0>Colour of control points</b0> - Set the colour for each of the control point "handles" on a node.
<b0>控制点颜色（Colour of control points）</b0> - 设置一个样条曲线上的“手柄调控点”颜色。
<b0>Colour of nodes</b0> - Set the colour for the different nodes on the spline/arc.
<b0>节点颜色（Colour of nodes）</b0> - 设置样条/弧线上各个路径节点的颜色。
<b0>Colour of selected nodes</b0> - Set the colour to be used for any selecetd nodes on the spline/arc.
<b0>选中的节点颜色（Colour of selected nodes）</b0> - 设置样条/弧线上所有被选中的节点的颜色。
<b0>Colour</b0>: The default colour for the text being written to the window.
<b0>颜色（Colour）</b0>：文本被写入该窗口所使用的默认颜色。

<b0>Control key must be held down for mouse wheel zoom</b0>: When this is checked all editors (and the main workspace) will have zoom enabled with <i1> + the mouse wheel <i2>, while un-checking it will enable zoom with <i3>only</i3> the mouse wheel <i4>.
<b0>必须按下Ctrl键来进行滚轮缩放（Control key must be held down for mouse wheel zoom）</b0>：当勾选此项时，所有编辑器以及工作区都必须使用<i1>+鼠标滚轮<i2>才能进行缩放，而解除此项则<i3>只</i3>需要鼠标滚轮<i4>就能进行缩放了。
<b0>Control point colour</b0> - Set the colour for each of the control point "handles" on an anchor point.
<b0>控制点颜色</b0> - 设置每个控制点“手柄”的颜色。
<b0>Convert To Drag and Drop / Code</b0> - Object events will be created using the method chosen when you created the project, either using code or using Drag and Drop actions.
<b0>转换为拖放/代码</b0> - 使用代码或使用拖放操作创建项目时使用的方法创建对象事件。
<b0>Create Executable</b0> - This will compile the current project and create an executable file (or files) for the target platform.
<b0>创建可执行文件（Create Executable）</b0> - 这将为目标平台编译当前项目并创建可执行文件。
<b0>Create Package</b0> - With this option you can open the <b1>Create Package Wizard</b1> to create a new asset package or tutorial for the Marketplace.
<b0>创建资源报（Create Package）</b0> - 使用该选项你可以打开 <b1>资源包创建向导（Create Package Wizard）</b1>来为市场创建一个新的资源包或教程。
<b0>Create</b0> - Create a new resource of the type you have clicked on to open the menu.
<b0>创建</b0> - 创建您打开菜单所点击类型的新资源。
<b0>Current Runtime Release Notes</b0> - Since the Runtime can update independently of the IDE, it has its own set of <a1>Runtime Release Notes</a1>.
<b0>当前运行库版本说明</b0> - 由于运行库可独立于IDE进行更新，因此它有自己的一套 <a1>运行库发行说明</a1>。
<b0>Cut / Copy / Paste Events</b0> - Cut, copy or paste the selected event.
<b0>剪切/复制/粘贴事件</b0> - 剪切，复制或粘贴所选事件。
<b0>DPI Override</b0>: This option lets you override the default DPI setting with your own.
<b0>DPI改写（DPI Override）</b0>：该选项允许用你自己的分辨率设定去覆盖默认分辨率设定。
<b0>Dark Red</b0> - The GPU flush, which is how long the GPU takes to clear images from memory
<b0>深红色</b0> - GPU 刷新，即 GPU 从存储器中清除图像所需的时间
<b0>Debug:</b0> From here you can pause or play the game being debugged, or you can toggle a breakpoint on or off.
<b0>Debug:</b0>在这里你可以暂停或者启动你正在调试的游戏，或者你也可以把断点切换成打开或者关闭的状态。
<b0>Debug</b0> - Run your current project for testing with the debugger so that you can see detailed performance information and debug any errors or issues you may have.
<b0>调试</b0> - 使用调试器调试运行你当前的项目，以便你可以看到详细的性能信息，并且调试任何错误及可能的问题。
<b0>Debugger port</b0>: This sets the port number for the Debug Module to use.
<b0>调试端口</b0>: 设置调试模块使用的端口号。
<b0>Default Animation Mode For New Sprites</b0>: This option permits you to set the default animation mode for sprites in the sprite editor.
<b0>新的精灵的默认动画模式（Default Animation Mode For New Sprites）</b0>：此选项允许你在精灵编辑器中设置默认的动画模式。
<b0>Default Audio Device</b0>: Here you can choose the default audio device for the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE to use.
<b0>默认音频设备</b0>：在此处你可以选择<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE所使用的默认音频设备
<b0>Default For Exit Confirmation</b0>: This option permits you to set whether a confirmation message should be shown when you exit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>退出确认时默认（Default For Exit Confirmation）</b0>：该选项允许你设置在退出<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>时是否显示确认信息。

<b0>Default For File Deletion</b0>: The default setting here is to show a message asking if you are sure you want to delete, but you can set this to "OK" so that all deletions are completed without this message as if you'd clicked okay already.
<b0>文件删除时默认进行（Default For File Deletion）</b0>：此处的默认选项是显示消息并询问你是否希望进行删除，但如果你将这项置为“OK”，那么删除时不会显示这个消息，就好像你已经点过确认按钮一样。
<b0>Default For Proxy Deletion</b0>: As above, this controls the message you are shown on deletion of any proxy files.
<b0>代理文件删除时默认进行（Default For Proxy Deletion）</b0>：同上，该项控制在删除代理文件时是否显示消息。

<b0>Default Loop Mode</b0>: The loop button in the Image Editor can be set to function in two different modes: either play once, where the animation will stop when it gets to the last frame, loop from the start, where the animation will go back to the first frame when it finishes, or ping pong, where the animation will go up through the images to the end and then back down through them again to the beginning.
<b0>默认循环模式（Default Loop Mode）</b0>：图像编辑器中的循环按钮可以设置两种功能模式：一种是单次播放（Play Once），这种情况下动画会在到达最后一帧时停止；另一个是从起点开始循环（Loop from the start），这种情况下动画会在结束后回到起点并继续播放；还有一个是往返播放（Ping pong），这种情况下动画会从头播放到尾再倒过来播放一遍回到开始。
<b0>Default Origin For New Sprites</b0>: This option permits you to set the default origin position for any new sprite resources that you create.
<b0>新的精灵的默认原点（Default Origin For New Sprites）</b0>：这个选项允许你为任何新创建的精灵设置默认的原点位置。

<b0>Default choice for resetting the project layout</b0>: When you select to reset the project layout (from the <a1>Layouts Menu</a1>) you will, by default, be shown a warning message about how this will close any open resource windows.
<b0>重置工程布局的默认选择（Default choice for resetting the project layout）</b0>当你（从<a1>布局菜单（Layouts Menu）</a1>）选择重置工程布局时，默认地会显示一个警告消息告诉你该操作将会关闭所有打开的资源窗口。
<b0>Default code window height</b0> - Set the default height (in pixels) for the code window to be when opened.
<b0>默认代码窗口高度</b0> - 设置当代码编辑器窗口打开时的默认高度（像素）。
<b0>Default code window width</b0> - Set the default width (in pixels) for the code window to be when opened.
<b0>默认代码窗口宽度</b0> - 设置当代码编辑器窗口打开时的默认宽度（像素）。
<b0>Default event content</b0>: Here you can edit the comments that are added by default in the code window for new events.
<b0>默认的事件内容</b0>: 在这里你可以编辑被添加到新事件的代码编辑器窗口的默认注释。

<b0>Default for Drag and Drop conversion to code</b0>: You can use the right mouse button <i1> within the Drag and Drop workspace to select the option to turn all Drag and Drop for that event into GML code.
<b0>默认设置DnD转换为代码（Default for Drag and Drop conversion to code）</b0>：你可以在DnD（ Drag and Drop）工作区使用鼠标右键 <i1>选择选项将所有的DnD事件转换为GML代码。
<b0>Default for automatically updating layer depths</b0> - When you change layer depths a message is shown to warn you that doing this will also automatically update all the other layer depths.
<b0>默认自动更新层深度（Default for automatically updating layer depths）</b0> - 当你更改层深度时，将会显示一条消息，警告你这样做也将会自动更新其它所有层的深认。

<b0>Default for closing non-empty workspace tab using keyboard shortcut</b0>: The keyboard shortcut mentioned above can be used to close any open tab, but sometimes you may accidentally close an empty tab that you require.
<b0>使用快捷键关闭非空工作区标签页时的默认处理（Default for closing non-empty workspace tab using keyboard shortcut）</b0>：前面所说的的键盘快捷键可以用来关闭任何打开的标签页，但有时候你可能会不小心关掉你所需要的标签页。
<b0>Default for committing changes on tool change</b0> - When you change draw tools after editing a frame, by default a message shows to ask if you want to commit the changes made.
<b0>工具更改时提交修改的默认处理（Default for committing changes on tool change）</b0> - 当你在（使用样条工具等）编辑一帧之后更改绘制工具，默认地会显示一个消息去询问你是否要提交当前的变动。
<b0>Default for deleting frames</b0> - When you delete a frame by default a message shows to ask if you are sure you want to do this.
<b0>删除帧时默认处理（Default for deleting frames）</b0> - 当你删除一个帧的时候，会默认地显示一个消息询问你是否确定要做这件事。

<b0>Default for opening multiple resources</b0>: As mentioned above in the general Resource Tree preferences, when you open multiple resources at once from the resource tree, you can get a warning if the number exceeds the number specified.
<b0>打开多个资源的默认设置（Default for opening multiple resources）</b0>：就如上面提到的，在资源树的基本偏好设置中，同时打开的超过指定的数目你会获得一个警告。
<b0>Default for parent room item deletion</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you delete an item that is part of a parent room (and so present in all child rooms).
<b0>默认为删除父房间项目（Default for parent room item deletion）</b0> - 在这里你可以选择当你删除的项目是父房间的一部分时（会出现在所有的子房间内）会发生什么。
<b0>Default for parent room layer deletion</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you delete a layer that is part of a parent room (and so present in all child rooms).
<b0>默认删除父房间层（Default for parent room layer deletion）</b0> - 在这里你可选择当你删除一个层，而它是一个父房间的一部分时（因此存在于所有的子房间），会发生什么。

<b0>Default for replacing images on strip import</b0> - When you select <i1>Import Strip</i1> from the <i2>Image</i2> drop down menu, you will get a message warning you that you will be overwriting any images already in the sprite resource, with the option to continue or not.
<b0>在导入长带图时候替换图像的默认处理（Default for replacing images on strip import）</b0> - 当你在<i2>图像（Image）</i2>下拉菜单中选择<i1>导入长带图（Import Strip）</i1>时，你会得到一个消息警告你这样会覆盖精灵资源中现存的所有图像，并提供给你两个选项选择继续进行还是不继续。
<b0>Default for resource deletion</b0>: When you delete a resource from the resource tree you normally get a warning asking if you are sure you want to proceed.
<b0>删除资源的默认设置（Default for resource deletion）</b0>：当你删除资源树的一个资源，通常你会得到一个警告，询问你是否想要继续。
<b0>Default for restarting a running build</b0>: When you restart a build and another previous one is still running, you will be asked whether you want to stop the current build first.
<b0>重新运行生成项时的默认处理（Default for restarting a running build）</b0>：当你在上一个生成版本还在运行的时候你重新开始生成时，你会被询问是否想要先中止当前的生成版本。
<b0>Default height of a new room</b0>: Sets the initial height that will be selected as the default for a new room.
<b0>新房间的默认高度（Default height of a new room）</b0>：设置初始高度也将作为新创建房间的默认高度。
<b0>Default layer depth spacing</b0>: When you create multiple layers in the room editor they are automatically assigned a depth based on their position within the layer list.
<b0>默认层深度间距</b0>: 当您在场景编辑器中创建多个层时，将根据层在列表中的位置自动分配深度。

<b0>Default message for converting Drag and Drop to GML</b0>: When you convert a Drag and Drop event or script into GML code, you will by default get a message warning you about what you are about to do and asking if you want to continue.
<b0>转换拖拽按钮为GML时默认该消息（Default message for converting Drag and Drop to GML）</b0>：当你酱拖拽按钮事件或脚本转换为GML代码时，默认地你会得到一个关于你要做什么并且询问你是否继续的警告消息。
<b0>Default room height</b0>: Sets the initial height that will be selected as the default for a new room.
<b0>默认房间高度</b0>: 设置新场景的初始高度。
<b0>Default room width</b0>: Sets the initial width that will be selected as the default for a new room.
<b0>默认房间宽度</b0>: 设置新场景的初始宽度。
<b0>Default size for DnD™ toolbox action thumbnails</b0>: This setting will be used to define the default size for all action icons in the toolbox (default 32px).
<b0>DnD™ 工具栏动作缩略图的默认尺寸</b0>: 这项设定将被用于定义工具栏中所有动作图标的默认大小（默认为32像素）。
<b0>Default size of toolbox Action thumbnails</b0>: This setting will be used to define the default size for all action icons in the toolbox (default 32px).
<b0>工具箱中动作按钮缩略图的默认尺寸（Default size of toolbox Action thumbnails）</b0>：这个设置用于定义工具箱中所有动作图标的默认大小。（默认为32像素）
<b0>Default sprite animation mode</b0>: This option permits you to set the default animation mode for sprites in the sprite editor.
<b0>默认精灵动画模式</b0>: 该选项允许您在精灵编辑器中为精灵设置默认动画模式。
<b0>Default sprite collision mask kind</b0>: This option permits you to set the default kind of collision mask to use for new sprites.
<b0>默认精灵碰撞盒类型</b0>: 此选项允许你设置用于新精灵的默认碰撞盒类型。
<b0>Default sprite height</b0>: This option permits you to set the default height for all new sprites created in the sprite editor.
<b0>默认精灵高度</b0>: 此选项允许您设置在精灵编辑器中创建的所有新精灵的默认高度。
<b0>Default sprite origin</b0>: This option permits you to set the default origin position for any new sprite resources that you create.
<b0>默认精灵原点</b0>: 此选项允许您为创建的所有新精灵资源设置默认的起始位置。
<b0>Default sprite width</b0>: This option permits you to set the default width for all new sprites created in the sprite editor.
<b0>默认精灵宽度</b0>: 此选项允许您设置在精灵编辑器中创建的所有新精灵的默认宽度。
<b0>Default width of a new room</b0>: Sets the initial width that will be selected as the default for a new room.
<b0>新房间的默认宽度（Default width of a new room）</b0>：设置初始的宽度作为新房间默认宽度。
<b0>Default zoom (%)</b0>: This sets the default zoom percentage for the resource tree when you start a new project.
<b0>默认缩放（%）</b0>: 设置启动新项目时资源树的默认缩放百分比。
<b0>Delete Asset Cache On Quit</b0>: If this is checked then the asset compiler cache folder will be removed when you quit <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>退出时删除资源缓存（Delete Asset Cache On Quit）</b0>：如果勾选此项，则在你退出<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>时候删除资源编译器缓存。.
<b0>Delete Asset Cache</b0>: Clicking this button will delete the compiler asset cache for the project.
<b0>删除资产缓存</b0>：点击该按钮将会删除该工程的资源缓存。
<b0>删除事件</b0> - 删除事件（或事件）。
<b0>Delete IDE Cache</b0>: Clicking this button will delete the IDE cache.
<b0>删除IDE缓存</b0>: 点击该按钮将会删除IDE缓存。
<b0>Delete Temp Folder</b0>: Clicking this button will delete the temp folder for the project.
<b0>删除临时目录</b0>：点击该按钮将会删除该工程的临时文件夹。
<b0>Delete</b0> - Delete the resource from the project (this will completely remove it, <i1>unless</i1> you are in a project view other than the default - see below).
<b0>删除</b0> - 从项目中删除资源（将会完全删除，<i1>除非</i1> 您在设置中修改了默认值- 请参见下文）。

<b0>Disable IDE Transitions</b0>: The <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE has a number of animated transitions for things like opening windows etc... however they are not to everyone's taste and you may experience a performance boost if they are disabled on older or underpowered machines if they are disabled.
<b0>禁用IDE切换效果（Disable IDE Transitions）</b0>：<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的IDE有一些动画切换效果。例如打开窗口等……然而这些效果并不是所有人的菜并且如果在老式或者低功耗机器上禁用这些效果你也可能得到性能的提升。

<b0>Disable IDE transition animations</b0>: The <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE has a number of animated transitions for things like opening windows etc... however they are not to everyone's taste and you may experience a performance boost if they are disabled on older or underpowered machines if they are disabled.
<b0>禁用IDE过渡动画</b0>: <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE 在打开窗口等情况会有过渡动画，然而并不是每个人都喜欢过渡动画，如果在旧电脑或性能不足的电脑上禁用该选项，可能可以体验到性能的提升。
<b0>Dismiss dragging resources into a locked or invisible layer error</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you drag a resource onto a layer that has been locked or is flagged as invisible.
<b0>忽略拖拽资源到锁定或不可见层的错误（Dismiss dragging resources into a locked or invisible layer error）</b0> - 在这里你可以选择当你拖拽一个资源到房间层而这个层已经锁定或者不可见时会发生什么。

<b0>Dismiss dragging resources with multiple or no selected layers</b0> - Here you can choose what happens when you drag a resource onto the room editor when you have selected multiple layers in the layer editor (or have not selected any layer at all).
<b0>忽略拖拽资源到多层或未选中层的错误（Dismiss dragging resources with multiple or no selected layers）</b0> - 在这里你可以选择当你拖拽一个资源到房间编辑器中，此时选中了多个层或者没有选中任何层时会发生什么。

<b0>Dismiss group selected warning</b0> - If you select multiple layers in the layer editor and then try to draw or edit then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it is not possible.
<b0>忽略选定组警告（Dismiss group selected warning）</b0> - 当你在图层编辑器中选择多个涂层并开始绘制或编辑的时候，编辑器会弹出一个消息告诉你这样不可以。

<b0>Dismiss invalid resource being dragged into room error</b0> - If you try to add a resource to a layer that is not designated as being for that resource type (like adding a sprite to a path layer), then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it can't be done.
<b0>忽略无效资源拖拽到房间的错误（Dismiss invalid resource being dragged into room error）</b0> - 如果你尝试添加一个资源到一个层，但是那个层不是为那个资源类型设计的（如果添加一个精灵到路径层），那么默认你将看到一条消息，通知你不能这样做。
<b0>Dismiss item locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete an item it happens to be locked, you will be shown a message by default.
<b0>解除项目锁定警告（Dismiss item locked warning）</b0> - 如果你尝试删除一条项目，而它碰巧被锁定，默认，你将看到一条消息。

<b0>Dismiss item's owner layer locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete an item on a layer and the layer happens to be locked (even if the item is not), then you will be shown a message by default to inform you that it can't be done.
<b0>解除项目所属层的锁定的警告（Dismiss item's owner layer locked warning）</b0> - 如果你删除层中的一个项目，碰巧层被锁定了（即使该项目没有被锁定），然后默认你将看到一条消息，通知你不能这样做。
<b0>Dismiss layer is locked warning</b0> - If you try to edit a locked layer you'll get a message by default informing you that you can't do this.
<b0>忽略图层锁定警告（Dismiss layer is locked warning）</b0> - 如果你在尝试去编辑一个锁定的图层，那么你会默认地得到一个消息告诉你你无法这样做。
<b0>Dismiss layer locked warning</b0> - If you try to delete a layer in the room and it happens to be locked, you will be shown a message by default.
<b0>解除层锁定警告（Dismiss layer locked warning）</b0> - 如果你尝试删除一房间层，而它碰巧被锁定，默认情况你将看到一条消息。
<b0>Display Grid</b0> - If this is checked then the Image Editor will open with the image grid on.
<b0>显示网格</b0> - 勾选此项则图像编辑器会自动带上网格地打开图像。
<b0>Display Grid</b0> - This option will toggle on or off the room grid when you first open a room.
<b0>显示网格（Display Grid）</b0> - 首次打开一个房间，这个选项将切换房间网格的显示。

<b0>Display argument descriptions in status bar</b0>: If this is checked then any descriptions you have given your custom scripts using the JSDoc notation will be shown in the status bar at the bottom of the editor window.
<b0>在状态栏中显示参数描述</b0>：勾选该选项之后你在自定义脚本中使用JSDoc标记给出的描述都会在编辑器窗口底部的状态栏中显示出来。

<b0>Display argument types in status bar</b0>: This option relates to when you are using your own custom scripts and have used JSDoc notation to identify the different arguments, etc... (see <a1>here</a1> for more information).
<b0>在状态栏中显示参数类型</b0>：该选项关系到在你使用你自己的被JSDoc标注过的自定义脚本（Script）时是否显示各种参数等……（详情请见 <a1>这里</a1>）
<b0>Display grid</b0> - This option will toggle on or off the room grid when you first open a room.
<b0>显示网格</b0> - 当您首次打开场景时，此选项可控制默认打开或关闭场景网格。

<b0>Display only currently open windows</b0>: Enabling this will make the Recent Windows list remove those items that are no longer open in a workspace (ie: closing any window will remove it from the list too).
<b0>仅显示当前打开的窗口</b0>: 启用该选项时，最近窗口列表会删除不再在工作区中打开的项（即：关闭窗口会从列表中删除这些项）。

<b0>Distance tab must be dragged to un-maximise the desktop</b0>: When you drag a workspace tab away from its default position within the IDE, if there is only one workspace active at that time then the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> window will un-maximise and move with the mouse (if you have more than one workspace active a new instance of the IDE will be created to hold the workspace).

<b0>还原窗口所需要拖拽标签页的距离（Distance tab must be dragged to un-maximise the desktop）</b0>：当你将一个工作区标签从IDE中的默认位置拖拽出来时，如果与此同时只有一个活动工作区，则<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的窗口会被还原并跟随鼠标移动（如果你有多个活动工作区，则会创建一个新的IDE实例窗口来承载这个工作区）。

<b0>DnD™ node overview visibility mode</b0>: A node "overview" is the short descriptive text that appears beside certain actions in the Action Workspace, for example this <b1>Destroy Instance</b1> action: <i2> You can choose to enable these always, enable them only if the action is collapsed (the default setting), or disable them altogether.
<b0>DnD™ 节点概述可见模式</b0>: 节点“概述”是出现在动作工作区中的某些操作旁边的简短描述性文本，例如 <b1>Destroy Instance</b1> 这个动作： <i2> 你可以选择总是启用、仅在动作折叠时显示（默认设置）或完全禁用。

<b0>DnD™ toolbox default location</b0>: By default the DnD™ toolbox (where all the different action libraries are held) is placed on the right of the Editor, but you can use this option to have it default to the left.
<b0>DnD™ 工具栏默认位置</b0>: 默认情况下 DnD™ 工具栏 (其中保存了所有不同的动作库) 位于编辑器的右侧，但是你可以使用此选项将其默认设置为左侧。
<b0>Document line limit</b0>: Set the maximum number of lines for any given editor document.
<b0>文档行限制（<=0 表示不限）</b0>：设置任意给定的编辑器文档的行数的最大数目。

<b0>Draw thin selection outline</b0>: If this is checked then the outline for selections will be an absolute 1px in width, regardless of the scale of the image, while having it un-checked will make the selection outline a relative 1px in width and scale with the image.
<b0>绘制细的选区边框（Draw thin selection outline）</b0>：如果你勾选此项，则选区的边框将会是无视图像缩放的绝对的1像素宽，而解除此选项则使得边框为相对于图像缩放的1像素宽。
<b0>重复事件</b0> - 复制所选事件。
<b0>Duplicate</b0> - Create a duplicate of the resource that has been clicked.
<b0>复制</b0> - 创建所点击资源的副本。

<b0>Editor background colour</b0>: While editing a sprite frame the image may be scaled in or out or may not fit the whole drawing in window, in which case a background colour will be shown which you can set here.
<b0>编辑器背景颜色</b0>: 在编辑精灵帧时，图像可能被放大或缩小，或者可能没有填满整个绘制窗口，这种情况下，你可以在这里设置背景颜色。
<b0>Email to commit as</b0>: The email that is associated with this Git identity.
<b0>提交的邮箱地址</b0>：与此Git身份关联的邮箱。
<b0>Enable DPI Override</b0>: This option lets you override the default DPI setting with your own.
<b0>启用DPI改写</b0>: 此选项允许你自己改写默认的DPI设置。
<b0>Enable Mask Overlay For Point Insertion</b0> - Enable or disable the mask overlay option.
<b0>为点插入启用蒙版覆盖（Enable Mask Overlay For Point Insertion）</b0> - 启用或禁用蒙版覆盖选项。
<b0>Enable adding brackets () to functions</b0>: Enable or disable the automatic addition of brackets () when you use the autocomplete.
<b0>启用函数添加括号()</b0>：当使用自动补全时启用或者禁用自动添加括号()。
<b0>Enable code completion</b0>: Enable or disable the code completion window.
<b0>启用代码自动补全</b0>：启用或者禁用代码补全窗口。
<b0>Enable colour coding</b0>: Enable or disable colour coding for the editor.
<b0>启用颜色代码（语法高亮）</b0>：启用或禁用编辑器的颜色编码。
<b0>Enable notifications</b0>: Checking this will enable the IDE to show notifications about new runtimes, etc...
<b0>启用消息通知</b0>: 勾选此项IDE将在有新的运行时等情况显示通知。
<b0>Enable real-time debugging</b0>: Checking this option will permit you to debug your game projects in real time as you run them from the IDE.
<b0>应用实时调试</b0>: 此选项允许你从IDE运行游戏项目时实时调试游戏项目。
<b0>退出（Exit）</b0> - 退出 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 到桌面。
<b0>Export Project</b0> - This will export the project as a single <t1>*.yyz</t1> file.
<b0>导出项目（Export Project）</b0> - 该选项将会把项目导出为一个单独的<t1>*.yyz</t1>文件。
<b0>FPS</b0> - This is the "Frames per Second" of your game, and basically shows how fast your game is running.
<b0>FPS</b0> - 这是你的游戏的“每秒帧数”，基本上代表了你的游戏的运行速度。
<b0>File watcher frequency (ms)</b0>: This is the frequency that the file watcher will run at when on desktop (or a docked laptop).
<b0>文件监视频率（毫秒）</b0>: 文件监视器运行的频率。
<b0>File:</b0> Here you can attempt to <i1>reconnect</i1> the debug module to your game should the connection be lost, or exit the debug module (which will not exit your game, only the module).
<b0>File:</b0>当你的游戏和调试模块连接断掉的时候，你可以在此尝试<i1>重连接</i1>，或者也可以在此选择退出调试模块。（不过这样不会退出游戏，仅仅是调试模块而已）
<b0>Font Name</b0>: The name of the font to use (available fonts will depend on those installed on your system).
<b0>字体名称（Font Name）</b0>：所使用的字体名称（所可用的字体取决于安装在你系统上的字体）。
<b0>Gadget</b0> - Gadget shortcuts are very specific and will only work when using a single gadget (the colour picker, for example).
<b0>部件</b0> - 部件快捷键是仅针对于单独一个控件部件（例如，取色器）生效的快捷键
<b0>GameMaker Community</b0> - This will open the <a1>GameMaker Community forums</a1> in your browser.
<b0>GameMaker 社区</b0> - 在浏览器中打开 <a1>GameMaker 交流论坛</a1>。
<b0>Generate Project Images</b0> - Opens the <a1>Generate Project Images</a1> window.
<b0>生成项目图</b0> - 打开 <a1>生成项目图</a1> 窗口。
<b0>Global</b0> - Global shortcuts are those that work no matter where you are in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE, unless your focus is on a specific window or gadget which overrides it.
<b0>全局</b0> - 全局快捷键是那些你在 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE 中无论什么位置都能生效的快捷键，除非你选择了一个覆盖了它的某个窗口或部件.
<b0>Go to the Marketplace</b0> - Open the Marketplace window where you can browse for assets.
<b0>前往市场（Go to the Marketplace）</b0> - 打开市场窗口，在这个窗口里你可以浏览资源。
<b0>Green</b0> - Input / Output processing (ie: keyboard, mouse, gamepad, networking etc...)
<b0>绿色</b0> - 输入/输出处理（即：键盘，鼠标，游戏手柄，网络等）
<b0>Grey</b0> - The time required to clear screen each draw step
<b0>灰色</b0> - 清除屏幕每个绘制步骤所需的时间
<b0>Greyscale</b0> - Desaturate the image by a determined amount.
<b0>灰阶（Greyscale）</b0> - Desaturate the image by a determined amount.
<b0>Grid horizontal spacing (px)</b0> - This value sets the spacing for the horizontal lines of the image grid.
<b0>网格水平间距（像素）</b0> - 设置图片网格的水平线条间距。
<b0>Grid horizontal spacing (px)</b0> - This will set the horizontal space for gird cells of the room grid in pixels.
<b0>网格水平间距（像素）</b0> - 这将以像素为单位设置场景网格的单元格水平空间。
<b0>Grid line Colour</b0> - Here you can set the colour (including alpha value) for the image grid.
<b0>网格线颜色</b0> - 在这里你可以设置网格线的颜色（包括透明度）。
<b0>Grid line colour</b0> - This option permits you to set the colour (including the alpha component) of the room grid lines.
<b0>网格线颜色</b0> - 此选项允许您设置场景网格线的颜色（包括 Alpha 值）。
<b0>Grid vertical spacing (px)</b0> - This value sets the spacing for the vertical lines of the image grid.
<b0>网格垂直间距（像素）</b0> - 设置图片网格的垂直线条间距。
<b0>Grid vertical spacing (px)</b0> - This will set the vertical space for gird cells of the room grid in pixels.
<b0>网格垂直间距（像素）</b0> - 这将以像素为单位设置场景网格的单元格垂直空间。

<b0>HTML5</b0> - If you have chosen to build HTML5, then an <t1>index.html</t1> file (this is the default name, but you can give your own name too in the Platform Preferences) along with a folder containing your games files will be created and saved to the specified location.
<b0>HTML5</b0> - 如果您选择构建 HTML5，则会使用<t1>index.html</t1> 文件（这是默认名称，您也可以在“平台首选项”中改为自己想要的名称），并将创建包含游戏文件的文件夹并将其保存到指定的位置。
<b0>Help manual port</b0>: This sets the port number for the manual micro web server to use.
<b0>帮助文档端口</b0>: 设置访问文档微型网络服务器时使用哪个端口。
<b0>Hide DnD™ node overview panel</b0>: Here you can choose to hide the overview panel of the Action Code Editor.
<b0>隐藏 DnD™ 节点概述面板</b0>: 使用该选项你可以隐藏动作代码编辑器的概述面板。
<b0>Highlight Colour For Inherited Tiles</b0>: Sets the highlight colour for a tile that has been inherited from a parent room.
<b0>继承图块的高亮颜色（Highlight Colour For Inherited Tiles）</b0>：对于已经继承自一个父房间的图块，设置它的高亮颜色。
<b0>Highlight selection matches</b0>: This will lightly highlight any section of code that is duplicated elsewhere.
<b0>高亮选区匹配</b0>: 这将轻轻地突出显示其他地方重复的所有代码段。

<b0>Highlight symbol pairs</b0>: This will highlight any pair of symbols in a section of code when one symbol is selected, for example, if you select the first bracket on a code block "{" the corresponding bracket "}" will be highlighted too.
<b0>高亮显示成对符号</b0>：当选中一个符号时，这将突出显示任何成对的符号，比如，如果你选中一个代码块的第一个括号“{”，对应的括号“}”也会高亮。
<b0>Highlight words which match selection</b0>: This will lightly highlight any section of code that is duplicated elsewhere.
<b0>高亮选区文字</b0>：这将稍微高亮选中的代码。
<b0>Highlighted path segment colour</b0> - The colour to be used to highlight any selected path segments.
<b0>高亮路径段颜色</b0> - 用于设置突出显示所选路径段的颜色。
<b0>Horizontal pixel spacing</b0> - This value sets the spacing for the horizontal lines of the image grid.
<b0>水平像素间隔（Horizontal Pixel Spacing）</b0> - 该值设置图像编辑器网格的水平线间距。
<b0>Horizontal pixel spacing</b0> - This will set the horizontal space for gird cells of the room grid in pixels.
<b0>水平像素间距（Horizontal pixel spacing）</b0> - 这将以像素为单位设置房间网格的单元格水平间距。
<b0>Horizontal separator colour</b0>: The colour of the bar that separates each discreet resource type in the tree.
<b0>水平分割线颜色</b0>: 在树中分割每个离散资源类型的线条的颜色。
<b0>How Many Segments Should Render Chains Have?</b0>: Here you can set the maximum number of segments for render chains.
<b0>连接线需要渲染成多少段？（How Many Segments Should Render Chains Have?）</b0>：此处你可以设置渲染连接线所使用的最大段数。
<b0>IDE Language</b0>: This option permits you to select the language for the IDE from the list of options supplied.
<b0>IDE 语言</b0>: 此选项允许你从提供的选项列表中选择IDE语言。
<b0>IDE Skin</b0>: Here you can select from the different skins that the IDE can use.
<b0>IDE 皮肤</b0>: 在这里，你可以选择IDE的不同皮肤。
<b0>IDE cache directory</b0>: The location for saving the IDE cache.
<b0>IDE 缓存目录</b0>: 保存IDE缓存的目录位置。
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> Bookmarks are <b1>not</b1> saved with with the project or when the IDE is closed.
<b0>重要!</b0> 书签 <b1>不</b1> 会与项目一起保存，当 IDE 关闭时也不会保存。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> Due to the restrictions of the various NDAs associated with the console exports, there is no information about setting up or programming for these targets within the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> manual.
<b0>重要!</b0> 由于与控制台导出相关的各种保密协议的限制，在 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 手册中没有关于为这些目标平台设置或编程的信息.
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> Exporting YYZ projects is <b1>not</b1> available with the Trial Licence of the product.
<b0>重要！</b0> 导出YYZ项目在试用版（Trial License）产品中 <b1>不</b1> 可用。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If the global variable you are getting does not exist then the function will return the keyword <t1>undefined</t1> and you may get errors that will stop the game from functioning, so if in doubt use the function <a2><t3>variable_global_exists</t3></a2> first.
<b0>重要！</b0>如果你要取得的全局变量并不存在，那么该函数将会返回关键字<t1>undefined</t1>并且你可能会得到错误，阻止游戏的运转，因此如果你不够确定的话请先使用<a2><t3>variable_global_exists</t3></a2>函数。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If you have been using a Trial Licence for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> and then buy one of the other licences (Creator, Desktop, Amazon Fire, Mobile, UWP, Web or Console) then you <b2>will need to log out of the IDE and restart <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3></b2>.
<b0>重要!</b0> 如果你为GameMaker Studio 2 使用了试用许可，并且购买了其他许可之一 (Creator, 桌面端, Amazon Fire, 移动端, UWP, 网页端或控制台) 那么你 <b2>需要在 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> IDE 登出账号并重启</b2>.

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If you have been using a Trial Licence for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> and then buy one of the other licences (Desktop, Mobile, UWP, Web or Console) then you <b2>may</b2> need to log out of the IDE and then restart <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and log back in again to make sure that the new licence is applied correctly (although this should happen automatically).
<b0>重要！</b0> 如果你已经使用一个 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的试用版许可证，然后买了一个其它许可证中的一个（桌面版、移动版、UWP、网页版或者控制台），然后你<b2>可能</b2>需要登出 IDE，接着重启 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> 之后再次登录以确保新的许可证正确应用（尽管这应该会自动生效）。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> If you have been using a Trial Licence for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> and then buy one of the other licences (Desktop, Mobile, UWP, Web or Console) then you will <b2>may</b2> to log out of the IDE and then restart <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and log back in again to make sure that the new licence is applied correctly (although this should happen automatically).
<b0>重要！</b0> 如果你已经在使用一个 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的试用版许可证，然后买一个其它的许可证（桌面版、移动版、UWP、网页版或者控制台），然后你<b2>可能</b2> 需要登出IDE，接着重启<i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3>，之后再次登录以确保新的许可证正确应用（尽管这应该会自动生效）。
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> Importing old projects and YYZ projects is <b1>not</b1> available with the Trial Licence of the product.
<b0>重要！</b0> 导入旧版项目和YYZ项目在试用版（Trial License）产品中不可用。

<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> In a game made with <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>, the characters, monsters, balls, walls, etc... are all <b2>instances</b2> copied from a basic object template that is found in the resource tree and then placed in a room.
<b0>重要！</b0> 在用 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 制作的游戏中，角色，怪物，球，墙等等都是从资源树中找到的基本物体模板中复制的 <b2>实例</b2>，然后放置在一个房间中。
<b0>IMPORTANT!</b0> This function is <b1>not</b1> available with the Trial Licence of the product.
<b0>重要！</b0>该函数在试用版（Trial License）产品中<b1>不</b1>可用。
<b0>IMPORTANT</b0>: It is recommended that you always clear the cache before creating the executable for any target platform.
<b0>重要</b0>：建议您在为任何目标平台创建可执行文件之前，始终先清除缓存。
<b0>Icon</b0>: <i1> This section permits you to set the colour and alpha for the folder icons used to denote the different resource tree asset types.
<b0>图标</b0>: <i1> 此部分允许您设置用于表示不同资源树资源类型的文件夹图标的颜色和 alpha值。
<b0>Image Scaling</b0>: This controls how the background image will be scaled within the different workspaces.
<b0>图像尺度（Image Scaling）</b0>：该选项控制了背景图像在各个工作区下如何被缩放。
<b0>Immediately Open New Resources</b0>: If this is checked, every time you create a new resource in the Resource Tree, the corresponding resource editor will be opened automatically.
<b0>立即打开新资源（Immediately Open New Resources）</b0>：如果此项被勾选，每次你在资源树创建新资源的时候，相应的资源编辑器会被自动打开。
<b0>Import Extension</b0> - Import an extension to your project (only available on the <b1>Extensions</b1> resource).
<b0>导入扩展</b0> - 导入扩展资源到您的项目（仅适用 <b1>扩展</b1> 资源）

<b0>Import Project</b0> - If you have a project made with the <b1><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 1.4</b1> software from YoYo Games, you can select this option to import either the <t3>*.gmx</t3> or the <t4>*.gmz</t4> file.
<b0>导入项目（Import Project）</b0> - 如果你有使用来自YoYo Games的<b1><i2>GameMaker Studio</i2> 1.4</b1>软件制作的项目，您可以选择该选项来导入<t3>*.gmx</t3>或<t4>*.gmz</t4>文件。

<b0>Import Project</b0> - If you have a project made with the <b1><i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 1.4</b1> software from YoYo Games, you can select this option to import either the <t3>*.gmx</t3> or the <t4>*.gmz</t4> file.
<b0>导入项目</b0> - 如果你有使用来自 YoYo Games 的 <b1><i2>GameMaker: Studio</i2> 1.4</b1> 软件制作的项目，您可以选择该选项来导入 <t3>*.gmx</t3> 或 <t4>*.gmz</t4> 文件。

<b0>Initial default draw colour for new projects</b0>: When you use a font or draw a shape using the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> functions or DnD™ actions without specifying a colour, the colour set here is the one that will be used.
<b0>新项目的初始默认绘制颜色</b0>：当你使用 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的函数或拖拽按钮（DnD™）动作调用字体或绘制形状时若没有指定绘制颜色，则会使用此处的颜色。

<b0>Insert path point precision (px)</b0> - This sets the precision value (in pixels) for inserting points on a path, ie: the mouse must be within this range to insert the point rather than add a new one.
<b0>插入路径点精度（像素）</b0> - 设置在路径上插入点的精度值（以像素为单位），即：鼠标必须在此精度范围内才能插入点，而不是添加新的点。
<b0>Invalid anchor points colour</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points.
<b0>无效锚点颜色</b0> - 设置用于绘制路径无效锚点的颜色。
<b0>Invalid path colour</b0> - The colour to be used to highlight a path that is not valid.
<b0>无效路径颜色</b0> - 用于设置突出显示无效路径的颜色。
<b0>JavaScript</b0>: The JavaScript target will only be available for a few targets, like the HTML5 target, and sets the game to be compiled to pure JavaScript.
<b0>JavaScript</b0>：JavaScript只能用于几种目标，例如HTML5，并将游戏编译为纯JavaScript 代码。
<b0>Keep tabs</b0>: If checked, this will keep tab key presses as tab characters - '\t' - in the editor, while unchecked means that tabs are converted into spaces.
<b0>保持tab键缩进对齐</b0>：如果选中， 这将使编辑器中按下tab键作为tab字符-‘\t’，而不选中则表示tabs转化为空格?。

<b0>Knowledge Base</b0> - This will take you to the <a1><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> Help Center</a1> where you can find articles on platform setup, known issues, using <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> and a number of other things.
<b0>知识库</b0> - 这将带您进入 <a1><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 帮助中心</a1>，在这里您可以使用 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> 和其他一些功能查找有关平台设置，已知问题的文章。

<b0>Label</b0>: <i1> The "label" is the text is used to describe or name the node or item in the resource tree, and here you can change the colour of the text as well as the font and styling to be used for it.
<b0>标签</b0>: <i1> “标签”是用于描述或命名资源树中的节点或项目的文本，此处可以更改文本的颜色以及字体和样式。
<b0>Laptop file watcher frequency (ms)</b0>: This is the frequency that the file watcher will run at when in laptop mode.
<b0>笔记本电脑文件监视频率（毫秒）</b0>: 文件监视器在笔记本模式下运行的频率。
<b0>Layer Editor</b0>: Everything in a room is placed on <i1>layers</i1>, and there are different layer types that you can choose from (more on this later).
<b0>层编辑器</b0>: 房间中的所有东西都放在 <i1>层</i1>上，而且有不同的层类型可以选择（稍后会详细介绍）。
<b0>Layer Properties</b0>: Each layer that you add to the room will have its own properties, and those properties will change depending on the layer type.
<b0>层属性</b0>: 您添加到房间的每个层都具有自己的属性，并且这些属性将根据层类型而改变。
<b0>Line Colour</b0> - Here you can set the colour (including alpha value) for the image grid.
<b0>网格线颜色（Line Colour）</b0> - 在此处你可以设置图像网格的颜色（包括透明度值）。
<b0>Line Colour</b0> - This option permits you to set the colour (including the alpha component) of the room grid lines.
<b0>线条颜色（Line Colour）</b0> - 这个选项允许你设置房间网格线的颜色（包括透明度分量）。
<b0>Load Layout</b0> - This will open a file explorer where you can select a previously saved layout <t1>*.xml</t1> file for loading.
<b0>载入布局（Load Layout）</b0> - 该选项会打开一个文件资源管理器，在这里你可以选择载入之前被保存过的 <t1>*.xml</t1> 布局文件。
<b0>Logout on exit</b0>: If this option is checked then the IDE will automatically log out the user session when <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> is closed.
<b0>退出时登出</b0>: 如果勾选该选项那么当你关闭 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 时会登出账号。
<b0>Logout</b0> - Selecting this will log you out of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>注销（Logout）</b0> - 选择该项将会让你登出 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>。
<b0>Mac OS</b0> - The Mac OS target will build either an <t1>*.app</t1> file or a <t2>*.pkg</t2> file, depending on whether you want to later upload it to the Mac App Store or not.
<b0>Mac OS</b0> - Mac OS 将构建 <t1>*.app</t1>文件或 <t2>*.pkg</t2>文件，具体取决于您是否要将其上传到Mac App Store。
<b0>Mask Overlay Colour</b0> - Set the overlay colour for masks if they are enabled (see above).
<b0>蒙版遮罩颜色（Mask Overlay Colour</b0> - 如果启用于蒙版覆盖，设置遮罩的颜色。
<b0>Mask overlay colour</b0> - Set the overlay colour for masks if they are enabled (see above).
<b0>蒙版覆盖区域颜色</b0> - 如果启用蒙版，请设置蒙版的覆盖颜色（见上文）。
<b0>Match indent on new lines</b0>: Enable or disable auto-indentation for your code.
<b0>在另起行保持缩进</b0>：启用或者禁用你代码的自动缩进。
<b0>Maximum amount of recently used actions</b0>: In the action toolbox there is a library at the top which holds the actions you have most recently used.
<b0>最近使用动作的最大数量（Maximum amount of recently used actions）</b0>：在动作工具箱的顶端有一个库，其持有你最近使用过的动作按钮。
<b0>Maximum number of recently used actions to display</b0>: In the action toolbox there is a library at the top which holds the actions you have most recently used.
<b0>最近使用动作的最大显示数目</b0>: 在动作工具栏的顶部有一个最近使用动作的收藏夹。

<b0>Maximum number of resources open simultaneously before warning</b0>: You can select multiple resources for opening at a time by using <i1> + <i2> to select them and then right clicking <i3> and choosing <i4>open all</i4>.
<b0>发生警告前同时打开资源的最大数目（Maximum number of resources open simultaneously before warning）</b0>：你可以使用<i1> + <i2>同时选择多个资源然后右键点击<i3>并选择<i4>打开全部（open all）</i4>一次性打开。

<b0>Maximum number of resources open simultaneously without warning</b0>: You can select multiple resources for opening at a time by using <i1>/<i2> + <i3> to select them and then right clicking <i4> and choosing <i5>open all</i5>.
<b0>在没有警告的情况下同时打开的最大资源数</b0>: 您可以使用 <i1>/<i2> + <i3> 一次选择多个资源，然后单击 <i4> 并选择<i5>全部打开</i5>。
<b0>Maximum number of search results to display</b0>: This option controls the maximum number of returned results when you use the Go To search window.
<b0>要显示的最大搜索结果数</b0>：该选项控制着你使用前往搜索窗口时返回搜索结果的最大数量。
<b0>Maximum parallel compile jobs</b0>: This value sets the <i1>maximum</i1> number of CPU cores to dedicate to compiling a project.
<b0>最大并行编译作业</b0>: 该值设置编译时使用CPU核心的 <i1>最大</i1> 值。
<b0>Maximum size for DnD™ toolbox action thumbnails</b0>: At the bottom of the Action Toolbox you have a slider for changing the size of the Drag and Drop icons.
<b0>DnD™ 工具栏动作缩略图的最大尺寸</b0>: 在动作工具栏的底部有一个滑块来改变拖拽图标的大小。
<b0>Maximum size of toolbox Action thumbnails</b0>: At the bottom of the Action Toolbox you have a slider for changing the size of the Drag and Drop icons.
<b0>工具箱中动作按钮的缩略图最大尺寸（Maximum size of toolbox Action thumbnails）</b0>：在动作按钮工具箱的底部你会看到一个滑条来改变拖拽按钮的图标大小。
<b0>Maximum windows to display</b0>: This sets the maximum number of previously opened windows that will be shown within the Recent Windows list.
<b0>可显示窗口的最大数量</b0>: 设置最近窗口列表中显示之前打开窗口的最大数量。
<b0>Maximum zoom (%)</b0>: This sets the maximum zoom value permitted for the resource tree.
<b0>最大缩放倍数（%）</b0>: 设置资源树允许的最大缩放值。
<b0>Minimum code window height</b0> - Set the minimum height (in pixels) permitted by the code window.
<b0>最小代码窗口高度</b0> - 设置代码编辑器窗口的最小高度（像素）。
<b0>Minimum code window width</b0> - Set the minimum width (in pixels) permitted by the code window.
<b0>最小代码窗口宽度</b0> - 设置代码编辑器窗口的最小宽度（像素）。
<b0>Minimum size for DnD™ toolbox action thumbnails</b0>: At the bottom of the Action Toolbox you have a slider for changing the size of the Drag and Drop icons.
<b0>DnD™ 工具栏动作缩略图的最小尺寸</b0>: 在动作工具栏的底部有一个滑块来改变拖拽图标的大小。
<b0>Minimum size of toolbox Action thumbnails</b0>: At the bottom of the Action Toolbox you have a slider for changing the size of the Drag and Drop icons.
<b0>工具箱中动作按钮的缩略图最小尺寸（Minimum size of toolbox Action thumbnails）</b0>：在动作按钮工具箱的底部你会看到一个滑条来改变拖拽按钮的图标大小。
<b0>Minimum zoom (%)</b0>: This sets the minimum zoom value permitted for the resource tree.
<b0>最小缩放倍数（%）</b0>: 设置资源树允许的最小缩放值。

<b0>Minimum zoom level for interacting with window contents (%)</b0>: This option controls the zoom cut-off point at which the mouse will no longer be able to interact with workspace windows (ie: add nodes, drag windows, etc...).
<b0>与窗口内容交互的最小缩放级别（%）</b0>: 此选项设置鼠标不再能与工作区窗口交互的距离（如：添加节点、拖拽窗口等）。

<b0>Minimum zoom level to allow mouse interaction with window contents</b0>: This option controls the zoom cut-off point at which the mouse will no longer be able to interact with workspace windows (ie: add nodes, drag windows, etc...).
<b0>允许鼠标与窗口内容互动的最小缩放级别（Minimum zoom level to allow mouse interaction with window contents）</b0>：该选项控制缩放的中断点，缩放级别低于该点时鼠标酱不再与工作区内的窗口进行互动（例如：增加节点、拖拽窗口等……）。
<b0>Miscellaneous Options</b0>: <i1> These options affect certain global colour properties for the resource tree:
<b0>杂项</b0>: <i1> 这些选项影响资源树的某些全局颜色属性：
<b0>Mouse down time to start dragging nodes (ms)</b0>: When you click on a node and drag it, you will be repositioning the node within the action code.
<b0>鼠标按下到开始拖动节点所需的时间（毫秒）</b0>: 当你点击一个节点并拖拽它时，你将重新定位动作代码中的节点。

<b0>Mouse wheel zoom requires Ctrl key</b0>: When this is checked all editors (and the main workspace) will have zoom enabled with <i1>/<i2> + the mouse wheel <i3>, while un-checking it will enable zoom with <i4>only</i4> the mouse wheel <i5>.
<b0>鼠标滚轮缩放需要 Ctrl 键</b0>: 勾选此选项所有编辑器（和主工作区）都需要使用 <i1>/<i2> + 鼠标滚轮 <i3> 进行缩放，否则 <i4>只</i4> 需要使用鼠标滚轮 <i5> 进行缩放。
<b0>Mouse-over anchor point colour</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are active.
<b0>鼠标悬停的锚点颜色</b0> - 设置用于绘制活动锚点的颜色。
<b0>Mouse-over invalid anchor point colour</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are active but invalid.
<b0>鼠标悬停的无效锚点颜色</b0> - 设置用于绘制活动但无效的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Move focused windows to top</b0>: When this is enabled and you click on any item in the Recent Window list, the selected item will be moved to the top of the list.
<b0>将焦点窗口移至顶部</b0>: 启用该选项并点击最近窗口列表中的任一项时，选定的项将被移动到列表的顶部。
<b0>My Account</b0> - This option will open your default web browser and take you to your YoYo Account page.
<b0>我的帐户（My Account）</b0> - 该选项将会在你的默认网页浏览器上打开您的 YoYo Account（YYA）帐户页面。
<b0>My Account</b0> - sign in to your YoYo Account (see <a1>here</a1> for more details)
<b0>我的帐户（My Accounts）</b0> - 登录到你的YoYo帐户（详情参见<a1>这里</a1>）
<b0>My Library</b0> - View your current Marketplace content library.
<b0>我的库（My Library）</b0> - 查看你当前的市场内容库。
<b0>My Purchase History</b0> - This option will open a browser and take you to the account page for the logged in user so you can see the purchase history for that account.
<b0>我的购买历史记录（My Purchase History）</b0> - 该选项将会打开一个浏览器并带你到你的账户页面，在这个页面里你可以看到你为此账户购买的历史记录。

<b0>NOTE:</b0> Due to the modular nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> there are certain things that are not included in this user manual, particularly those aspects of setting up and connecting the different devices that can be supported.
<b0>注意：</b0> 由于 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的模块性质，也有一些不包括在手册之内，特别是那些可支持的不同设备的设置和连接。
<b0>NOTE:</b0> Due to the way that this works internally, passing arrays to scripts may affect performance, especially if the array is very large.
<b0>注意：</b0> 出于这个内在机制，向脚本传递数组将影响运行效率，尤其是数组非常大时。

<b0>NOTE:</b0> If you are resizing the application surface, these changes will not be registered until the start of the next draw frame, meaning that calling the <a1><t2>surface_get_width()</t2></a1> or <a3><t4>surface_get_height()</t4></a3> functions in the same event or step will return the previous values.
<b0>注：</b0>如果你重置应用表面层的大小，它不会马上发生改变，直至下一个绘制帧，这意味着在同一个事件或者步事件中使用 <a1><t2>surface_get_width()</t2></a1> 或者 <a3><t4>surface_get_height()</t4></a3> 函数将返回之前的值。
<b0>NOTE:</b0> If your HTML5 game uses a custom <t1>index.html</t1> and that sets the canvas to a fixed position then this function will have no effect on the window position.
<b0>注意:</b0> 如果你的 HTML5 游戏使用用户自定义的<t1>index.html</t1> ，并且设置画布（canvas）至固定的位置，那么这个函数在窗口位置将无效。

<b0>NOTE:</b0> Many of the watch windows (like Global, Local or Watches) will <b1>not</b1> update while the game is running, and will require that you pause the game or set a breakpoint before they are updated.
<b0>注意：</b0>许多监视窗口（例如全局，局部，或监视）<b1>并不会</b1>在游戏运行时更新，它们需要你暂停游戏或者在它们更新前设置断点。

tu.note: otherwise your game graphics will be corrupted or degraded 怎么翻译经较好呢

tuv.seg: <b0>NOTE:</b0> On Windows8 SurfaceRT devices, there is a canvas limit of 2048x2048, which means the drawing canvas cannot go above those dimensions (neither with views, nor by setting the game window directly) otherwise your game graphics will be corrupted or degraded.
<b0>注：</b0> Windows8 SurfaceRT 设备限制了画布大小为 2048x2048，这意味着绘制的画布不能超过这个尺寸（视野或者直接设置游戏窗口都不可以），否则游戏画面将不堪忍受或降级。

<b0>NOTE:</b0> texture swaps and vertex batches will never be zero and will normally show values of 2 or 3, since even with an empty room an no objects <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> still has to draw and batch things.

<b0>NOTE</b0>: A particle emitter, once created, remains resident in the system memory for the duration of the game, and so if you need to recreate it at any point (for example, if you call the <a1>Restart Game</a1> action), then you <b2>must destroy the current particle emitter</b2> otherwise you get a memory leak.

<b0>注意</b0>： A particle emitter, once created, remains resident in the system memory for the duration of the game, and so if you need to recreate it at any point (for example, if you call the <a1>Restart Game</a1> action), then you <b2>must destroy the current particle emitter</b2> otherwise you get a memory leak.

<b0>NOTE</b0>: A particle system, once created, remains resident in the system memory for the duration of the game, and so if you need to recreate it at any point (for example, if you call the <a1>Restart Game</a1> action), then you <b2>must destroy the current system</b2> otherwise you get a memory leak.

<b0>NOTE</b0>: A particle type, once created, remains resident in the system memory for the duration of the game, and so if you need to recreate it at any point (for example, if you call the <a1>Restart Game</a1> action), then you <b2>must destroy the current particle type</b2> otherwise you get a memory leak.

<b0>注意</b0>： A particle type, once created, remains resident in the system memory for the duration of the game, and so if you need to recreate it at any point (for example, if you call the <a1>Restart Game</a1> action), then you <b2>must destroy the current particle type</b2> otherwise you get a memory leak.

<b0>NOTE</b0>: A sensor fixture will fire off the collision event when the collision <b1>first occurs only</b1>, meaning you don't get a stream of collision events as the two bodies continue to overlap (which is what would traditionally occur).
<b0>注意</ b0>：当碰撞<b1>仅发生</b1>时，传感器夹具将触发碰撞事件，这意味着当两个物体继续重叠时，不会遇到碰撞事件流（这是传统上会发生的）。
