<b0>New Drag and Drop Project</b0>: This will create a new project in which the <a1>Object Editor</a1> (and any other editors that permit code) will be set up to use the <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> <b3>Drag and Drop</b3> interface.
<b0>新建拖拽按钮项目（New Drag and Drop Project）</b0>: 这将创建一个新的项目，其中 <a1>物体编辑器（Object Editor）</a1> (以及允许代码的其他编辑器) 将被设置为使用 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> <b3>拖拽按钮（Drag and Drop）</b3> 界面。
<b0>New GameMaker Language Project</b0>: This will create a project where the default programming is done using the <b1>GameMaker Language</b1> (GML).
<b0>新建GML工程文件（New GameMaker Language Project）</b0>: 这将创建一个项目，默认程序使用的是<b1>GameMaker Language</b1> (GML).
<b0>New Project</b0> - This is for creating a new project from scratch in <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
<b0>新建项目（New Project）</b0> - 该选项可以在 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 中创建一个全新的项目（工程）
<b0>Node selection highlight</b0>: This is the colour that will be used to highlight any selected nodes within the resource tree.
<b0>节点选择高亮</b0>: 用于突出资源树中选定节点的颜色。
<b0>Notification timeout (ms)</b0>: This sets the length of time (in milliseconds) that a notification is shown for.
<b0>通知超时（毫秒）</b0>: 此选项设置通知显示的时长（毫秒）。

<b0>Object double click opens all object events</b0>: By default double clicking <i1> on any resource will open that resource for editing, but often when dealing with objects, after the initial setup when you create the new resource, you open it to edit the events only rather than the object properties.
<b0>双击物体打开所有物体的事件</b0>: 默认情况下，双击 <i1> 任何资源都将打开该资源的编辑器，但对于精灵，在创建新资源并初始设置后，双击打开它进入编辑图像界面而不是编辑精灵属性。
<b0>打开帮助文档</b0> - 打开帮助文档。
<b0>Open Project In Explorer</b0> - This will open the save location of the currently loaded project in the OS file explorer.
<b0>在资源管理器中打开项目</b0> - 该选项将会在操作系统的文件资源管理器中打开保存当前被载入项目的位置。
<b0>Open Project</b0> - This will open the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> file explorer for you to select a previously created <t2>*.yyp</t2> project file for loading.
<b0>打开项目</b0> - 该选项会打开 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的文件浏览器来供你选择以前创建过的 <t2>*.yyp</t2> 项目文件并载入。
<b0>Open Properties</b0> - Open the resource properties editor for the clicked resource (note that you can double click <i1> too).
<b0>打开属性</b0> - 打开所点击资源类型的资源属性编辑器（请注意，您也可以双击 <i1>）。
<b0>Open automatically on Project load</b0>: When enabled, the Recent Windows list will be shown when you load a new project.
<b0>在项目加载时自动打开</b0>: 启用该选项，将在加载新项目时显示最近窗口列表。

<b0>Open event scripts as tabs in same window</b0> - When adding code or Drag and Drop to an event, the code window is chained to the event window, and when this option is checked any further events that are opened for editing will be added to the same window as tabs along the top.
<b0>在同一个窗口以标签的形式打开事件脚本</b0> - 添加脚本或者拖拽到一个事件中时，代码窗口将链接到事件窗口，然而当这个选项被勾选时，任何之后打开编辑的事件将添加到同一个窗口中，沿着窗口的顶部依次添加。
<b0>Open in Explorer</b0> - This will open the file explorer on the location of the file that has been stored for the resource in your project folder.
<b0>在资源管理器中打开</b0> - 打开文件资源管理器，该文件位于项目文件夹中资源文件的位置。
<b0>Open linked scripts as tabs in same window</b0> - When you have multiple linked scripts and open them, by default they will be grouped n the same window as tabs.
<b0>在同一个窗口以标签的形式打开链接的脚本</b0> - 当你拥有多个链接的脚本并且打开它们，默认它们将分组 在相同的窗口中以标签的形式打开。

<b0>Open new moments for edit on creation</b0>: Normally when you add a new moment to a timeline, <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will automatically open the editor for you to add your code or Drag and Drop to it.
<b0>创建时立即打开新的时刻点开始编辑</b0>: 通常，当您向时间轴添加新的时刻时，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 将自动打开编辑器，以添加代码或拖放模块到其中。
<b0>Open new resources for edit on creation</b0>: If this is checked, every time you create a new resource in the Resource Tree, the corresponding resource editor will be opened automatically.
<b0>创建时总是打开新资源的编辑窗口</b0>: 如果勾选该选项，每次在资源树中创建新资源，都会自动打开资源编辑器。

<b0>Open new resources for edit on dragging files into IDE</b0>: Certain resources (like sprites or sounds) can be dragged onto the main Workspace in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE and will be detected and added as a new resource in the Resource Tree.
<b0>在将文件拖入IDE时打开新资源进行编辑</b0>: 某些资源（如精灵或声音）可以拖放到 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE 的主工作区中，并将添加到资源树中作为新资源使用。
<b0>Open object events in full screen editor</b0> - Checking this option will make object event code editors open automatically in a new workspace.
<b0>在全屏编辑器中打开物体事件</b0> - 勾选此项将自动在新的工作区打开物体事件代码。
<b0>Open scripts in full screen editor</b0> - Checking this option will make script resources open automatically in a new workspace.
<b0>在全屏编辑器中打开脚本</b0> - 勾选此项将让脚本自动在新的工作区打开。
<b0>Open shaders in full screen editor</b0> - Checking this option will make shader resources open automatically in a new workspace.
<b0>在全屏编辑器中打开着色器</b0> -勾选此项将使着色器自动在新的工作区打开。

tu.note: 此处翻译需斟酌。

tuv.seg: <b0>Open the image editor when double clicking on a sprite resource</b0>: By default double clicking <i1> on any resource will open that resource for editing, but often when dealing with sprites, after the initial setup when you create the new resource, you open it to edit the image rather than the sprite properties.
<b0>双击精灵资源打开图像编辑器（Open the image editor when double clicking on a sprite resource）</b0>：默认双击<i1>任何资源都将打开编辑，但是经常在处理精灵的时候，你创建新的资源的初始化设置之后，你打开它编辑图像而不是精灵属性。

<b0>Opt-in To Feedback Surveys</b0>: When this option is checked, you are telling <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> that you wish to participate in feedback surveys, meaning that occaisionally while working a message will be shown about the area you are working on and request a rating and feedback.
<b0>选择性反馈调查</b0>: 当勾选此选项，意味着你告诉 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 你希望参与反馈调查，这意味着在工作时将显示关于你正在工作的区域的信息，并请求评级和反馈。
<b0>Options for Diff Tool</b0>: In this field you can add any extra commands to be run whenever you use the Diff Tool.
<b0>差异工具选项</b0>: 在此字段你可以添加任何额外的命令，在使用差异工具时都将运行。
<b0>Options for Merge Tool</b0>: In this field you can add any extra commands to be run whenever you use the Merge Tool.
<b0>合并工具选项</b0>：在此字段你可以添加任何额外的命令，在使用合并工具时都将运行。
<b0>Orange</b0> - Debug update time, which is only normally visible when you use the debug module
<b0>橙色</b0> - 调试更新时间，在使用调试模块时通常只能看到该部分
<b0>Pan text editor into view on focus</b0> - When you open a text editor from an object event, selecting this option will automatically pan the workspace to bring the editor to within the bounds.
<b0>平移文本编辑器进入焦点视图</b0> - 从物体事件打开文本编辑器时，打开此选项将自动平移工作区以使编辑器处于可视范围内。
<b0>Password for username</b0>: Here you must enter the password associated with the username that you give above.
<b0>用户密码（Password for username）</b0>：在这里，你必须输入上面提供的用户名关联的密码。
<b0>Path Rotation Sensitivity</b0> - Set the sensitivity for rotating paths.
<b0>路径旋转敏感度（Path Rotation Sensitivity）</b0> - 设置路径旋转的敏感度。
<b0>Path Scale Sensitivity</b0> - Set the sensitivity for scaling paths.
<b0>路径放大的敏感度</b0> - 设置放大路径的敏感度。
<b0>Path colour</b0> - The colour to be used to show the path as you edit it.
<b0>路径颜色</b0> - 设置在编辑路径时用于显示路径的颜色。
<b0>Path to Diff Tool</b0>: Here you specify the full file path to the Git diff tool.
<b0>差异工具位置</b0>: 在此处指定 Git 差异工具的完整文件路径。
<b0>Path to Merge Tool</b0>: Here you specify the full file path to the Git merge tool.
<b0>合并工具位置</b0>：在此处指定 Git 合并工具的完整文件路径。

<b0>Path to external editor/viewer for SWF files</b0>: If you are working with SWF format sprites, you can set this to the path of your preferred viewer/editor and when you click the <i1>Edit Image</i1> button in the Sprite Editor then it will open the given program.
<b0>SWF文件的外部编辑器/查看器（Path to external editor/viewer for SWF files）</b0>：如果你要处理SWF类型的精灵，你可以将该选项设置为你喜欢的查看器/编辑器的路径，并且当你在精灵编辑器（Sprite Editor）中点击<i1>编辑精灵（Edit Sprite）</i1>按钮的时候，它会打开被给定的程序。

<b0>Path to external editor/viewer for Spine files</b0>: If you are working with Spine format sprites, you can set this to the path of your preferred viewer/editor and when you click the <i1>Edit Image</i1> button in the Sprite Editor then it will open the given program.
<b0>Spine文件的外部编辑器/查看器（Path to external editor/viewer for Spine files）</b0>：如果你要处理Spine类型的精灵，你可以将该选项设置为你喜欢的查看器/编辑器的路径，并且当你在精灵编辑器（Sprite Editor）中点击<i1>编辑精灵（Edit Sprite）</i1>按钮的时候，它会打开被给定的程序。
<b0>Persistent</b0> - A persistent object is one that does not go away when the room is changed, but rather it "persists" and is carried over into the new room.
<b0>持久化</b0> - 持久化物体是房间改变时不会消失的物体，而是“持续存在”并被转移到新房间中。
<b0>Point size</b0> - Set the size of the different anchor points and control points to be used.
<b0>点大小</b0> - 设置不同锚点和控制点的大小。
<b0>Port for Debugger to use</b0>: This sets the port number for the Debug Module to use.
<b0>调试器使用的端口（Port for Debugger to use）</b0>：该选项设置调试模块所使用的网络端口。
<b0>Port number to use for the web server</b0>: This sets the port number for the micro web server to use.
<b0>网络服务器所使用的端口（Port number to use for the web server）</b0>：该选项设置了供MWS使用的端口号。
<b0>Preferences</b0> - Selecting this will take you to the <a1>Preferences Windows</a1> where you can set up how <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>looks and feels.
<b0>偏好设置（Preferences）</b0> - 选择该项将会带你到 <a1>偏好设置（Preferences）窗口</a1>，在这里你可以设置 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 的外观和操作感。
<b0>Publisher Name</b0>: This is the name that will be used as the Publisher name for the asset.
<b0>发布者名称（Publisher Name）</b0>：此处名称将用于资源发布者的名字。
<b0>Recent Projects</b0> - You can use this option to view recently used projects.
<b0>最近项目（Recent Projects）</b0> - 您可以使用该选项来查看近期使用过的项目。
<b0>Red</b0> - The update speed of the step event
<b0>红色</b0> - 步事件的更新速度
<b0>Release Notes</b0> - This will open the <a1>Release Notes</a1> for <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> in your browser.
<b0>版本说明</b0> - 该选项会在你的浏览器中打开 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 的 <a1>版本发行信息</a1>。
<b0>Rename</b0> - Rename the resource or the group folder.
<b0>重命名</b0> - 重命名资源或资源组文件夹。
<b0>Report A Bug</b0> - Should you find any bugs or have any issues while using <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> you can <a2>report them here</a2>.
<b0>报告 BUG</b0> - 如果您在使用 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 时发现任何错误或感觉存在任何问题，您可以 <a2>在此处提交</a2>。
<b0>Required SDKs</b0> - Due to the cross-platform nature of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> a number of 3rd party SDK's are required.
<b0>必需的 SDK</b0> - 由于<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>跨平台开发的本性，有一些第三方的开发工具包（SDK）是必需的。
<b0>Reset Layout</b0> - This will reset the current IDE layout to the default settings.
<b0>重置布局（Reset Layout）</b0> - 该选项会将IDE布局重置为默认设定。

<b0>Resource font can scale above 100%</b0>: When you select this option and then change the resource item size scale, then you can force <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to increase the text size as well as the icon size for items in the resource tree when set to greater than 100%.
<b0>字体资源可以放大到 100% 以上</b0>: 若您打开此选项，然后更改资源项目大小，当设置为大于100％时您可以强制 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 放大文本以及资源树中项目的图标。

<b0>Resource font can scale below 100%</b0>: When you select this option and then change the resource item size scale, then you can force <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to reduce the text size as well as the icon size for items in the resource tree when set to less than 100%.
<b0>字体资源可以缩小到 100% 以下</b0>: 若您打开此选项，然后更改资源项目大小，当设置为小于100％时您可以强制 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 缩小资源树中的文本以及图标。
<b0>Restore Default</b0>: If you have changed the background image to be something other than the default image, you can restore the default using this button at any time.
<b0>恢复默认（Restore Default）</b0>：如果你改变了背景图而不是使用默认图像，你可以随时通过这个按钮来重置为默认图像
<b0>Room Properties</b0>: Rooms have a number of properties too, and these can be set here.
<b0>房间属性</b0>: 房间也有一些属性，可以在这里设置。
<b0>Run</b0> - Run your current project on the chosen target platform for testing.
<b0>运行</b0> - 在选中的平台上运行你当前的项目用于测试。
<b0>Save Layout</b0> - This will open a file explorer where you can name and save the current IDE layout as an <t1>*.xml</t1> file.
<b0>保存布局（Save Layout）</b0> - 该选项会打开一个文件资源管理器，在这里你可以命名并保存当前IDE布局为一个 <t1>*.xml</t1> 文件。
<b0>Save Project As</b0> - Same as above, only you specify the location and the new name of the project.
<b0>另存项目为（Save Project As）</b0> - 同上，只是你需要另存的新位置及新名称。
<b0>Save Project</b0> - This will save your game to the same location as you defined when you created the project (or where you opened it from).
<b0>保存项目（Save Project）</b0> - 该选项将会保存你的游戏到你创建项目时候所定义的位置。（或者是你打开它的位置）
<b0>Scroll lock time (ms)</b0>: This option deals with the time that <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> should wait between scrolling windows that are overlapping.
<b0>滚动锁定时间（毫秒）</b0>: 此选项设置 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 应该在重叠的滚动窗口之间等待的时间。
<b0>Scroll speed</b0>: This controls the scrolling speed within the different workspaces.
<b0>滚动速度</b0>: 控制不同工作区内的滚动速度。

<b0>Search and replace</b0> - This will open a search window which permits you to search through your entire code (including room creation code, scripts, and events) for a given input - see below for further information.
<b0>查找与替换（Search and replace）</b0> - 它会打开一个搜索窗口，使你能够在整个代码（包括房间创建时代码、脚本以及事件）中查找所输入内容 - 更多信息参见下文。
<b0>Select the IDE skin to use</b0>: Here you can select from the different skins that the IDE can use.
<b0>选择使用的IDE皮肤（Select the IDE skin to use）</b0>：此处你可以选择IDE所能使用的各种皮肤。
<b0>Selected anchor point colour</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the path anchor points that have been highlighted (selected).
<b0>选中的锚点颜色</b0> - 设置用于绘制已突出显示（选择）的路径锚点的颜色。
<b0>Selected invalid anchor point colour</b0> - The colour to be used to draw the anchor points that are highlighted but invalid.
<b0>选中的无效锚点颜色</b0> - 设置用于绘制突出显示但无效的锚点的颜色。
<b0>Selected point colour</b0> - Set the colour to be used for any selected anchor points on the spline/arc.
<b0>选定点颜色</b0> - 设置选定锚点的颜色。
<b0>Selection frame colour for locked items in the room</b0>: Sets the colour of the frame that surrounds a selection for assets that have been locked.
<b0>房间内锁定的项目的选择框颜色（Selection frame colour for locked items in the room）</b0>：设置环绕被锁定的资源的选择框的颜色。
<b0>Selection outline colour 1</b0>: The section outline is a dashed line that alternates between two colours.
<b0>选区边框颜色 1（Selection outline colour 1）</b0>：选区边框是一条两种颜色交替出现的虚线。
<b0>Selection outline colour 2</b0>: The section outline is a dashed line that alternates between two colours.
<b0>选区边框颜色 2（Selection outline colour 2）</b0>：选区边框是一条两种颜色交替出现的虚线。
<b0>Selection outline primary colour</b0>: The section outline is a dashed line that alternates between two colours.
<b0>选中轮廓颜色 1</b0>: 截面轮廓是两种颜色之间交替的虚线。
<b0>Selection outline secondary colour</b0>: The section outline is a dashed line that alternates between two colours.
<b0>选中轮廓颜色 2</b0>: 截面轮廓是两种颜色之间交替的虚线。
<b0>Should Background Images Be Shown</b0>: This option controls whether the selected background image should be shown or not.
<b0>是否应该显示背景图（Should Background Images Be Shown）</b0>：该选项控制所选的背景图是否应该被显示。

<b0>Should new toolboxes collapse it you have a floating toolbox?</b0>: This option (which is <i1>on</i1> by default) will collapse the toolbox dock in any new editors that are open if you have "pulled" a toolbox out of an event to become a floating window.
<b0>当你有一个浮动的工具箱时是否将其折叠？（Should new toolboxes collapse it you have a floating toolbox?）</b0>：当你将一个工具箱“拉”至一个事件之外并成为一个浮动的窗口时，这个选项（默认为<i1>开</i1>）将会在任何新编辑器中折叠工具箱栏。
<b0>Should the overview panel be collapsed by default?</b0>: Here you can choose to hide the overview panel of the Action Code Editor.
<b0>概览面板是否默认被折叠？（Should the overview panel be collapsed by default?）</b0>：在这里你可以选择是否隐藏动作代码编辑器。
<b0>Show Remote Worker Installer</b0> - This will open a file explorer window on the location of the installer for the Remote Worker tool (see <a1>here</a1> for more information on Remote Workers).
<b0>显示远程工作者安装程序</b0> - 这将在远程工作者工具的安装程序的位置上打开文件资源管理器窗口（有关远程工作人员的详细信息，请参阅 <a1>此处</a1>）。

<b0>Show US spelling for system functions</b0>: By default <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> uses English spelling for functions, for example <t2>draw_text_colour</t2>, however this may not be exactly what you ar4e used to and so you can switch to US spellings using this option, so that the functions become <t3>draw_text_color</t3>, for example.

<b0>显示系统函数的美式拼写（Show US spelling for system functions）</b0>：默认地，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>会显示函数的英式拼写，例如<t2>draw_text_colour</t2>，然而这可能不是你所习惯的拼写风格，因此你可以使用这个选项切换到美式拼写，这样一来，就会显示成<t3>draw_text_color</t3>了。

<b0>Show US spelling for system functions</b0>: By default <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> uses GB English spelling for functions, for example <t2>draw_text_colour</t2>, however this may not be exactly what you are used to and so you can switch to US spellings using this option, so that the functions become <t3>draw_text_color</t3>, for example.
<b0>显示系统函数的美式拼写</b0>: 默认情况下 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 使用英式英语拼写，例如 <t2>draw_text_colour</t2> ，然而你可能并不习惯，因此你可以切换到美式拼写，函数就会变成 <t3>draw_text_color</t3>。
<b0>Show Whitespace</b0>: Display "." to show whitespace (see image below).
<b0>显示空白区域（彩色连续的英文句号）</b0>：显示“显示空白”（看下图）。

<b0>Show a message when exceeding physics vertex limit</b0>: This option can be used to control the pop up message that is shown when you exceed the permitted vertex number in the physics shape editor.
<b0>当超过物理顶点限制显示一个消息（Show a message when exceeding physics vertex limit）</b0>：在物体形状编辑器中，当你超过允许的顶点数目限制时，这个选项将用来控制信息是否显示。
<b0>Show all compiler commands in compile window during compilation</b0>: This is checked by default and forces the compiler to show all relevant commands in the compile window.
<b0>编译时在编译窗口中显示所有编译指令（Show all compiler commands in compile window during compilation）</b0>：该选项默认被勾选，并强制编译器在编译窗口中显示出所有的相关指令。
<b0>Show all verbose compiler commands</b0>: Checking this will force the compiler to show extra commands related to the compilation process.
<b0>显示所有详细的编译指令（Show all verbose compiler commands）</b0>：勾选该项会强制编译器显示与编译进程相关的更多指令。
<b0>Show background images on workspaces</b0>: This option controls whether the selected background image should be shown or not.
<b0>在工作区上显示背景图片</b0>: 此选项控制所选背景图片是否显示。
<b0>Show compiler commands in compile output</b0>: This is checked by default and forces the compiler to show all relevant commands in the compile window.
<b0>在编译输出中显示编译器命令</b0>: 此选项默认勾选，此时编译器在编译窗口中会显示所有相关命令。

<b0>Show default help comment in new events?</b0>: By default this option is enabled and all it does is add a simple comment into the <i1>code editor</i1> for all new events to remind you that you can add your code there.
<b0>新的事件显示默认的注释？（Show default help comment in new events?）</b0>：默认启用，它要做的是对于所有的新创建事件添加简单的注释到<i1>代码编辑器</i1>中，提醒你可以在这里添加代码。
<b0>Show group node icons</b0>: Enable or disable the icon representation of each resource type being displayed beside the resource name.
<b0>显示组节点图标</b0>: 启用或禁用资源名称旁边显示的每个资源类型的图标。
<b0>Show horizontal separators</b0>: Here you can enable/disable the horizontal separators between different asset types in the resource tree.
<b0>显示水平分割线</b0>: 您可以在此处启用/禁用资源树中不同资源类型之间的水平分隔符。
<b0>Show line numbers</b0>: Whether to show the line numbers down the left or not.
<b0>显示行号</b0>：是否在最左侧显示行数。

<b0>Show package in explorer on build completion</b0>: Checking this will make <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> open the OS explorer window at the location where the final executable package has been created.
<b0>构建完成时在 资源管理器中显示程序包</b0>: 勾选此选项时，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 会在方程可执行文件包被创建时打开系统资源管理器窗口。

<b0>Show room views</b0>: If you have views active within a room, this is shown by an outline where the view boundaries would be within the room, and the visibility of this area can be toggled using the dedicated button in the editor itself.
<b0>显示房间视野</b0>: 如果您在场景内观看视图，视图边界会在场景内显示，并且可以使用编辑器上的按钮切换该区域的边界的可见性。
<b0>Show tab lines</b0>: Display "...." to show tabbed space.
<b0>显示tab对齐纵线</b0>：显示“....”以显示选项卡式的空间（原文有误，实际测试应该显示很多坚线，坚线间隔一个tab空间）。
<b0>Show the compile window during compilation</b0>: By default the compile window will be shown when you compile your projects, even if the compile doc is closed (it will open for the compile).
<b0>在编译期间显示编译窗口</b0>：默认地，编译窗口会在你编译项目的时候被显示出来，即时在编译停靠栏已经关闭的时候（编译的时候再打开）。
<b0>Show tree lines</b0>: Here you can enable/disable the tree lines that are shown to the side of assets in the resource tree.
<b0>显示树状线</b0>: 你可以在此处启用/禁用在资源树中的资源一侧显示树状线。
<b0>Show verbose compiler output</b0>: Checking this will force the compiler to show extra commands related to the compilation process.
<b0>显示详细的编译器输出</b0>: 勾选此选项会显示与编译进程相关的额外命令。
<b0>Show welcome screen on startup</b0>: This is on by default and simply tells <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to show a brief splash screen when you start the program.
<b0>在启动时显示欢迎页面</b0>：该选项默认为开，并且只是要求<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>在启动程序的时候显示一个简短的启动画面。
<b0>Size of points</b0> - Set the size of the different nodes and control points to be used.
<b0>点大小（Size of points）</b0> - 设置各个节点与控制点的大小。
<b0>Size</b0>: The size to set the font to for the given output window.
<b0>大小（Size）</b0>: 用于所给定的输出窗口的字体大小。

<b0>Slow double click time (ms)</b0>: Some areas of the IDE require a slower double click to work correctly, for example when renaming a resource (a fast double click will open the resource editor, while a slow double click will permit you to rename it).
<b0>双击延迟时间（毫秒）</b0>: IDE中的某些位置要求一次较慢的双击才能发挥作用，比如重命名一个资源（快速双击会打开该资源的编辑器，而慢双击才允许你为它重命名）。
<b0>Snap To Grid</b0> - If this is checked then the image editor will automatically snap certain tools to the image grid.
<b0>对齐网格</b0> - 如果勾选此项，图像编辑器就会自动地将某些工具吸附到网格上。
<b0>Snap to grid</b0> - With this option you can set whether a room will have assets snap to the room grid by default or not when a room is initially opened.
<b0>对齐到网格</b0> - 使用这个选项你可以设置当一个房间初始化打开时是否默认将资源对齐到房间网格。
<b0>Social Media Icons</b0> - these take you to the various YoYo Games social media sites where you can keep up to date with news about <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>
<b0>社会媒体图标（Social Media Icons）</b0> - 这些将你带到各种YoYo Games的社会媒体网站，那里有 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>到目前为止最新的消息。
<b0>混音器</b0> - 查看 <a1>混音器</a1> 窗口。
<b0>声音（Sounds）</b0> - 10 （不允许使用音频缓冲区）

<b0>Sprite double click opens image editor</b0>: By default double clicking <i1> on any resource will open that resource for editing, but often when dealing with sprites, after the initial setup when you create the new resource, you open it to edit the image rather than the sprite properties.
<b0>双击精灵打开图片编辑器</b0>: 默认情况下，双击 <i1> 任何资源都将打开该资源的编辑器，但对于精灵，在创建新资源并初始设置后，双击打开它进入编辑图像界面而不是编辑精灵属性。
<b0>Sprites</b0> - 20 (no dynamic loading permitted, no SWF or Spine sprites permitted)
<b0>精灵（Sprites）</b0> - 20 （不允许动态载入，不允许使用SWF或Spine精灵）
<b0>Start Page</b0> - This will open a new Start Page workspace.
<b0>起始页</b0> - 该选项会打开一个新的起始页工作区
<b0>Style</b0>: The font style to use, like <b1>bold</b1> or <i2>italics</i2> (note that not all windows will permit the same styles and it will also depend on the font used).
<b0>字体样式（Style）</b0>：所使用的字体样式，比如<b1>粗体（Bold）</b1>或<i2>斜体（Italic）</i2>（请注意，不是所有窗口都会允许相同的字体样式，并且这也取决于所使用的字体）。
<b0>Support Forums</b0> - Clicking this will take you to the <a1>Official <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> Support Forums</a1> on the <b3>YoYo Games Knowledge Base</b3>.
<b0>论坛支持（Support Forums）</b0> - 点击该选项将会带您到<a1><b3>YoYo Games知识库</b3><i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>官方支持论坛</a1>。
<b0>Syntax checking delay (ms)</b0> - The delay time (in milliseconds) before the syntax checker runs.
<b0>语法检查延迟（毫秒）</b0> - 语法检查之前延迟的时间（毫秒）。

<b0>Tab drag distance to un-maximise desktop (px)</b0>: When you drag a workspace tab away from its default position within the IDE, if there is only one workspace active at that time then the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> window will un-maximise and move with the mouse (if you have more than one workspace active a new instance of the IDE will be created to hold the workspace).
<b0>非最大化桌面的选项卡拖动距离（像素）</b0>: 当你将工作区选项卡从IDE默认位置拖离时，如果此时只有一个工作区处于活动状态，那么 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 窗口将取消最大化，并随着鼠标移动（如果有多个工作区处于活动状态，将创建新的IDE实例来保持工作区）。
<b0>Tab size</b0>: The number of character spaces that pressing "Tab" should indent the code.
<b0>单次Tab大小</b0>：按下“tab”键应该缩进代码的字符空格数量。
<b0>Tangent line colour</b0> - Set the colour for the lines linking the control points to the anchors.
<b0>切线颜色</b0> - 为连接控制点到锚点的线条设置颜色。
<b0>Temp Location</b0>: The location for saving all the temporary folders.
<b0>临时文件位置（Temp Location）</b0>：该位置用于存储所有的临时文件夹。
<b0>Temp directory</b0>: The location for saving all the temporary folders.
<b0>临时目录</b0>: 储存所有临时文件夹的位置。
<b0>纹理组</b0> - 查看 <a1>纹理组</a1> 窗口。

<b0>Texture Swaps</b0> - This number shows how many times your game is swapping textures per game frame (the time it takes <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> to run all events is a game tick, and the number of game ticks per second is set by the room speed).
<b0>纹理交换</b0> - 这个数字显示你的游戏每个游戏帧（该时间是 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 运行所有事件的统一时间，每秒钟的游戏帧数由房间速度决定）交换纹理的次数。

<b0>The Precision (in pixels) Required To Insert Point On A Path Segment</b0> - This sets the precision value (in pixels) for inserting points on a path, ie: the mouse must be within this range to insert the point rather than add a new one.
<b0>在路径节点插入点的精度（像素）</b0> - 这个设置在路径上插入点的精度值（以像素为单位），即鼠标必须在范围内才能插入点，而不是添加新点。
<b0>The amount of spacing for depth between layers</b0>: When you create multiple layers in the room editor they are automatically assigned a depth based on their position within the layer list.
<b0>层之间深度的间距（The amount of spacing for depth between layers）</b0>：房间编辑器创建多个层时，将会基于层列表的位置自动绑定一个深度。
<b0>The background colour to be shown behind autotiling tiles</b0>: This option sets the background colour within the tile set editor in the section for creating Auto Tiles.
<b0>自动图块背景颜色</b0>: 此选项用来在创建自动图块的部分中设置图块集编辑器中的背景颜色。
<b0>The chain alpha at the falloff stop distance</b0>: Sets the final alpha value after the fade out falloff point for the chain alpha.
<b0>衰减停止距离的链条透明度（The chain alpha at the falloff stop distance）</b0>：设置链条透明度淡出衰减点的最终透明度的值。
<b0>The colour for the default background layer added to new rooms</b0>: Sets the initial colour that will be selected as the default for a new background layer.
<b0>添加到新房间的默认背景层颜色（The colour for the default background layer added to new rooms）</b0>：设置初始的颜色，选择作为默认新的背景层的颜色。

<b0>The degree range allowed when looking for a window using shortcuts</b0>: Within a workspace you can have multiple windows open for different objects and resources, and so to move around quickly between them you can use the <a1>keyboard shortcut</a1> <i2> + <i3> + <t4><Arrow Keys></t4> to move between them.
<b0>使用快捷键浏览窗口时允许的角度范围（The degree range allowed when looking for a window using shortcuts）</b0>在一个工作区内你可能会打开多个不同物体和资源的窗口，并且为了快速地在它们之间移动，你会使用<a1>键盘快捷键</a1> <i2> + <i3> + <t4><方向键></t4>来在他们之间切换移动。

tu.note: 此处翻译需斟酌。

tuv.seg: <b0>The distance in pixels that the chain alpha begins to fade out</b0>: Sets the distance from the parent window for the chain link to fade out from.
<b0>链条透明度开始淡出的像素距离（The distance in pixels that the chain alpha begins to fade out）</b0>：设置链条开始淡出的与父窗口的距离。
<b0>The distance in pixels that the chain alpha stops fading out</b0>: Sets the distance from the parent window for the chain link to end fading out to.
<b0>链条透明度停止淡出的像素距离（The distance in pixels that the chain alpha stops fading out）</b0>：设置链条连接结束淡出的与父窗口的距离。

<b0>The initial setting for the Show Views button on opening a room</b0>: If you have views active within a room, this is shown by an outline where the view boundaries would be within the room, and the visibility of this area can be toggled using the dedicated button in the editor itself.
<b0>打开的房间显示视野按钮的初始化设置（The initial setting for the Show Views button on opening a room）</b0>：如果一个房间里有激活的视野，这个可以通过房间里视野边界框可以看出来，这个区域是否可见可以通过专用的按钮进行切换。
<b0>The link colour for workspace chains</b0>: This is the colour that will be used to display chains between workspace elements.
<b0>工作区中连接线的颜色（The link colour for workspace chains）</b0>：该颜色被用于显示工作区元素之间的连接线。

<b0>The padding between two columns in a chain</b0>: Workspace elements are often "chained" to each other (for example, the Code Editor is chained to the Event Editor is chained to the Object Editor), and this option permits you to set the horizontal distance between any two chained windows.
<b0>连接线所连接两个栏目的间隔宽度（The padding between two columns in a chain）</b0>：工作区中的元素彼此之间通常被“连锁”起来（比如说，代码编辑器会被连接到事件编辑器，而事件编辑器再被连接到物体编辑器，这样就形成一个工作链（Work Chain）），那么该选项就允许你设置任意两个相连窗口的之间的水平距离。

<b0>The padding between two rows in a chain</b0>: As mentioned above, workspace elements are often "chained" to each other and this option permits you to set the vertical distance between any two chained windows.
<b0>工作链的行距The padding between two rows in a chain</b0>：如前所述，工作区元素彼此通常都是被“连锁”起来的，该选项允许你设置任意两个相连窗口的纵向距离。
<b0>The properties frame colour for locked items in the room</b0>: Sets the colour of the frame that surrounds the asset properties that have been locked.
<b0>房间里锁定项目的属性框的颜色（The properties frame colour for locked items in the room）</b0>： 设置环绕被锁定的资源的属性框的颜色。
<b0>The properties frame colour for unlocked items in the room</b0>: Sets the colour of the frame that surrounds the asset properties in the room editor that have not been locked.
<b0>房间内未锁定项目的选择框的颜色（The properties frame colour for unlocked items in the room）</b0>：设置房间编辑器中环绕未锁定的资源的选择框的颜色。

<b0>Tile Sets</b0> are created from sprites, but they are also classified as a separate resources since the way that <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> handles them is a bit different to both sprites and objects.
<b0>图块集</b0> 是以精灵为基础创建的，但是它们被分类为独立的资源，因为 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 处理图块集的方式与精灵以及物体有点不同。
<b0>Time in milliseconds to hold the mouse down to drag nodes</b0>: When you click on a node and drag it, you will be repositioning the node within the action code.
<b0>按住鼠标到拖动节点所需的毫秒时间（Time in milliseconds to hold the mouse down to drag nodes）</b0>：当你点击一个节点并拖拽时，你就会在动作代码中改变节点的位置。
<b0>Time in seconds to lock scrolling to a gadget</b0>: This option deals with the time that <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> should wait between scrolling windows that are overlapping.
<b0>锁定部件滚动状态的时间（Time in seconds to lock scrolling to a gadget）###此处原文给的是秒（Seconds），但IDE中给出的是毫秒（milliseconds），因此Seconds被略过###</b0>：该选项用于处理<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>在两个交叠窗口之间滚动的等待时间。
<b0>时间轴（Timelines）</b0> - 2 （不允许创建动态时间轴）
<b0>To-do List</b0> - Opens the <a1>To-do List</a1> editor window.
<b0>To-do 列表</b0> - 打开 <a1>To-do 列表</a1> 编辑器窗口。
<b0>Transparent background block size</b0> - When you have selected Block Pattern for the background, you can set the size of the individual block here.
<b0>透明背景块大小（Transparent background block size）</b0> - 当你选择方块图案作为背景时，你可以在这里设置每个方块的尺寸。
<b0>Transparent background colour 1</b0> - If you have Single Colour chosen for the background, then the colour used is this one.
<b0>透明背景色 1（Transparent background colour 1）</b0> - 如果你为背景选择了单色模式，那么就会使用这个颜色。
<b0>Transparent background colour 2</b0> - If you have Block Pattern chosen for the background, then the colour used to alternate with colour 1 (above) is this one.
<b0>透明背景色 2（Transparent background colour 2）</b0> - 如果你选择了方块图案作为背景，那么这个颜色就是与颜色 1（上文所述）相交替搭配的另一个颜色。
<b0>Transparent background style</b0> - Here you set the "style" for the background, which can either be "<i1>Block Pattern</i1>" or "<i2>Single Colour</i2>".
<b0>透明背景样式（Transparent background style）</b0> - 这里你可以设置透明背景的显示“样式”，可以为<i1>方块图案（Block Pattern）</i1>，也可以为<i2>单色模式（Single Colour）</i2>。
<b0>Tree line colour</b0>: The colour that will be used to draw the tree lines between different resource nodes.
<b0>树状线颜色</b0>: 将用于绘制不同资源节点之间的树状线的颜色。
<b0>Ubuntu (Linux)</b0> - Ubuntu (Linux) apps can be compiled as <t1>*.zip</t1> files.
<b0>Ubuntu (Linux)</b0> - Ubuntu（Linux）应用程序可以编译为 * .zip 文件。
<b0>Undo / Redo Stack Limit</b0>: Here you can set the Undo/Redo stack limit.
<b0>撤消/重做堆栈限制（<0 无限制）</b0>：在这里你可以设置撤消/重做的堆栈限制。
<b0>Update Existing Package</b0> - This option will open the <b1>Update Package Wizard</b1> so you can update an existing Marketplace package that you have previously created.
<b0>更新现有的资源包</b0> - 该选项将会打开 <b1>资源包更新向导（Update Package Wizard）</b1>以便你能够更新一个现有的市场资源包。
<b0>Use an external browser for help</b0>: If this is checked then opening the help file will open it using the default browser for your system.
<b0>使用外部浏览器获取帮助</b0>: 如果勾选此选项将使用系统默认浏览器打开帮助文档。
<b0>Use external browser for help</b0>: If this is checked then opening the help file will open it using the default browser for your system.
<b0>使用外部浏览器打开帮助文件（Use external browser for help）</b0>：如果勾选此项，则以后会使用你系统上的默认浏览器打开帮助文件。

<b0>Username to commit as</b0>: Here you must enter the username that you will be using to do any commits to Git with (this must be the same as the username specified when you set up your Git repository).
<b0>提交的用户名</b0>：在这里你必须输入你将做任何提交到Gi时所使用的用户名（它必须同Git仓库所指定的用户名一致）。
<b0>VM</b0>: The VM (Virtual Machine) target uses a generic <i1>runner</i1> for each platform and then interprets the code for your game.
<b0>虚拟机</b0>：虚拟机使用每个平台的通用 <i1>运行</i1> 程序来编译您的游戏代码。
<b0>Verbose Logging</b0>: Enable verbose logging for the Git output log.
<b0>启用详细日志记录（Verbose Logging）</b0>：Git 启用详细日志记录输出日志。
<b0>Vertex Batches</b0> - This is how many times the game is sending off texture batches to the GPU per game frame, and (as with Texture Swaps) you want this to be as low as possible.
<b0>顶点批次</b0> - 这是每个游戏帧游戏将纹理批次发送到GPU的次数，以及（与纹理交换）一样，您会希望这个值尽可能低。
<b0>Vertical pixel spacing</b0> - This value sets the spacing for the vertical lines of the image grid.
<b0>垂直像素间隔（Vertical Pixel Spacing）</b0> - 该值设置图像编辑器网格的垂直线间距。
<b0>Vertical pixel spacing</b0> - This will set the vertical space for gird cells of the room grid in pixels.
<b0>垂直像素间距（Vertical pixel spacing）</b0> - 这将以像素为单位设置房间网格的单元格垂直间距。
<b0>WARNING!:</b0> If the array has over 32,000 entries this function will return an erroneous value and should not be used.
<b0>警告！：</b0>如果该数组具有32000个以上的元素，该函数将会返回一个无法使用的错误的值。
<b0>Welcome Page</b0> - This will open athe initial welcome page slide show in a new workspace.
<b0>欢迎页</b0> - 该选项将会在一个新的工作区内打开一个初始欢迎滑动页面。

<b0>What is the default Toolbox location?</b0>: By default the DnD toolbox (where all the different action libraries are held) is placed on the right of the Editor, but you can use this option to have it default to the left.
<b0>默认状态下工具箱的位置？（What is the default Toolbox location?）</b0>：默认状态下DnD的工具箱（持有各种动作库）会出现在编辑器的右侧，但是你可以使用这个选项来让他出现在左侧。

<b0>When does the overview appear next to a node?</b0>: A node "overview" is the short descriptive text that appears beside certain actions in the Action Workspace, for example this <b1>Destroy Instance</b1> action: <i2> You can choose to enable these always, enable them only if the action is collapsed (the default setting), or disable them altogether.
<b0>概览图什么时候出现在节点的旁边？（When does the overview appear next to a node?）</b0>：一个节点的“概览”是出现在某个动作工作区中某个动作旁边的一段简短的描述性文字，比如这个<b1>销毁实例（Destroy Instance）</b1>动作：你可以选择启用一直显示、启用它们在动作块折叠时候显示（默认）或者是禁止它们显示。
<b0>Whether we should reset back to 1:1 when moving between windows using shortcuts</b0>: As mentioned above, you can skip from window to window within the workspace using keyboard shortcuts.
<b0>使用快捷键在窗口间移动时，我们是否应该重置回1:1（Whether we should reset back to 1:1 when moving between windows using shortcuts）</b0>：如前所述，你可以在工作区中通过使用键盘快捷键在窗口之间跳转。
<b0>White</b0> - GPU left over time, which is the time spent waiting for the GPU to finish the rendering of the frame before the next one can start
<b0>白色</b0> - GPU 剩余时间，这是 GPU 在下一个画面可以开始渲染之前完成当前画面渲染所花费的时间
<b0>Window:</b0> This menu contains options for the various sub-windows that you can create for debugging.
<b0>Window:</b0>在这个菜单中包含你能在调试的时候生成的多种子窗口的选项。
<b0>Window</b0> - Window shortcuts are those that are specific to a single window or tab, unless a gadget shortcut overrides it.
<b0>窗口</b0> - 窗口快捷键是那些专门用于单独窗口或标签页的快捷键，除非部件的快捷键覆盖了该快捷键。
<b0>Windows UWP</b0> - For Windows UWP, <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will create an <t2>*.appx</t2> package which can then be uploaded to the Windows Store.
<b0>Windows UWP</b0> - 对于 Windows UWP，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 将创建 <t2>*.appx</t2> 包，然后可以将其上传到 Windows Store。

<b0>Windows</b0> - Compiling for the general Windows OS will first request that you choose between creating an <i1>Installer</i1> or a <i2>Zip</i2> package, where the installer will be a single executable that will install your game, and the Zip file will be a single zip format compressed file with all your game files stored within (the files will need extracted for the game to run).
<b0>Windows</b0> - 一般Windows操作系统的编译首先会要求您在创建 <i1>安装程序</i1> 或 <i2>Zip</i2> 程序包之间进行选择，安装程序将是安装游戏的单个可执行程序，Zip 文件将是单个的 zip 格式压缩文件， 其中包含所有的游戏文件（游戏运行时文件需要从其中提取）。

<b0>Workspace chain column padding (px)</b0>: Workspace elements are often "chained" to each other (for example, the Code Editor is chained to the Event Editor is chained to the Object Editor), and this option permits you to set the horizontal distance between any two chained windows.
<b0>工作区连接线的面板之间的列间隔量（像素）</b0>: 工作区元素通常彼此“连接”（例如，代码编辑器连接到事件编辑器，而事件编辑器连接到物体编辑器），该选项设置任何两个连接窗口之间的水平距离。
<b0>Workspace chain link colour</b0>: This is the colour that will be used to display chains between workspace elements.
<b0>工作区连接线颜色</b0>: 设置工作区连接线的颜色。
<b0>Workspace chain rendering segment count</b0>: Here you can set the maximum number of segments for render chains.
<b0>工作区连接线渲染段数量</b0>: 这里可以设置渲染工作区连接线的最大段数。

<b0>Workspace chain row padding (px)</b0>: As mentioned above, workspace elements are often "chained" to each other and this option permits you to set the vertical distance between any two chained windows.
<b0>工作区连接线的面板之间的行间隔量（像素）</b0>: 如上所述，工作区元素通常彼此“连接”，该选项设置任何两个连接窗口之间的垂直距离。
<b0>Workspace chains can overlap</b0>: When enabled this option will permit workspace chains to cross and overlap.
<b0>允许工作区连接线交叉</b0>: 当启用该选项时允许工作区连接线交叉和重叠。

<b0>Workspace keyboard navigation degree range</b0>: Within a workspace you can have multiple windows open for different objects and resources, and so to move around quickly between them you can use the <a1>keyboard shortcut</a1> <i2>/<i3> + <i4> + <t5><Arrow Keys></t5> to move between them.
<b0>工作区键盘导航度范围</b0>: 在工作区中，你可以为不同的物体和资源打开多个窗口，因此为了在它们之间快速移动，可以使用 <a1>键盘快捷键</a1> <i2>/<i3> + <i4> + <t5><方向键></t5> 在它们之间移动。
<b0>Workspace keyboard navigation resets zoom</b0>: As mentioned above, you can skip from window to window within the workspace using keyboard shortcuts.
<b0>工作区键盘导航会重置缩放</b0>: 如上所述，可以使用键盘快捷键在工作区内的窗口间跳动。

<b0>YYC</b0>: The YYC (YoYo Compiler) takes the normal <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> output and compiles it into <i2>native</i2> code for the target platform, "stripping out" unneeded functions and performing a host of other optimisation techniques to create a smaller and performance enhanced executable.
<b0>YYC</b0>：YYC（YoYo编译器）采用 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 输出，并将其编译为 <i2>本地</i2> 代码，“剥离”一些不需要的功能，并执行大量的优化技术来创建更小和性能更强的可执行文件
<b0>Yellow</b0> - The time required for the draw event
<b0>黄色</b0> - 绘制事件所需的时间
<b0>YoYo Games</b0> - takes you to the main <a1>YoYo Games</a1> website
<b0>YoYo Games</b0> -将你带到<a1>YoYo Games</a1> 官方网站。
<b0>YoYoGames 官网</b0> - 打开 <a1>YoYo Games 主页</a1>。
<b0>a++</b0> will increment the variable but return the value before it was incremented.
<b0>a++</b0> 递增变量但是返回增加前的值。
<b0>iOS</b0> - Compiling to iOS will create an <t1>xarchive</t1> file which is then used in Xtools to create the final iOS package.
<b0>iOS</b0> - 编译到 iOS 将创建一个 <t1>xarchive</t1> 文件，然后在 Xtools 中创建最终的 iOS 包。
<b0>|, &, ^, <<, >></b0>: You can perform bitwise operations with these, where | = bitwise or, & = bitwise and, ^ = bitwise xor, << = shift left, >> = shift right.
<b0>|, &, ^, <<, >></b0>：你可以使用这些进行位运算， | = 位运算“或”，& = 位运算“与”， ^ = 位运算“异或”， << = 左移， >> = 右移。
<b2>You cannot update assets that have already been uploaded unless the updated package is signed using the same certificate that the original was created with</b2>.
<b2>除非使用之前创建的相同的证书，你不能已经上传的资源。</b2>.
<i0> This will open a window similar to the one above.
<i0><Optional></i0> The horizontal scaling factor (use -1 to reset to default).
<i0><可选></i0> 水平缩放因数（使用-1重置为默认）
<i0><Optional></i0> The vertical scaling factor (use -1 to reset to default).
<i0><可选></i0> 垂直缩放因数（使用-1重置为默认）。
<i0><Optional></i0> The x offset position for drawing.
<i0><Optional></i0> The y offset position for drawing.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 兼容 <t1>WAV</t1>、 <t2>MP3</t2> 和 <t3>OGG</t3> 格式的声音文件。<br4>
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> can also be used in a college environment.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 也可以使用于大学教育。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> comes as a Free version to start with, and then you can buy different upgrades depending on your needs.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 最开始是以试用版许可信息启动的，而后你可以依据你的需求购买升级包。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> comes with a Trial Licence to start with, and then you can buy different upgrades depending on your needs.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 最开始是以试用版许可信息启动的，而后你可以依据你的需求购买升级包。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> devs often use the function <t1>place_free()</t1>, and then when a collision is found, try to slowly move the object out by either looping around an x or y position (or something) while continuing to execute that function, or by using the <t2>move_outside_all()</t2> function.<br3>
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 的开发者们经常使用 <t1>place_free()</t1> 函数，当发生碰撞时，尝试通过在 x 或 y位置(或其他位置)上循环缓慢移动对象，同时继续执行该函数，或者使用更为方便的 <t2>move_outside_all()</t2> 函数。<br3>

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> is a tool designed to empower you and your team to make new and innovative games as well as prototype ideas in the fastest and most intuitive way possible across multiple target platforms.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 是一个游戏开发工具， 旨在让您和您的团队根据游戏设计的思路以最快，最直观的方式制作游戏，并且能跨平台开发。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> is innovative in a number of ways as you'll see, so we hope that this section will give you enough knowledge to dive in and get started without too many issues...<br1>
正如你所见，<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 在许多方面都具有创新性，因此我们希望这部分能够向你提供足够的知识，以深入了解GMS2并开始工作，而不会遇到太多问题...<br1>
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> is more than just an IDE and has a number of different runtime tools that it uses behind the scenes to build you games for the different target platforms available.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>不仅有一个IDE，还有一些在幕后运作的不同的运行工具来将你的游戏构建到各种可用平台上。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> itself has no special requirements other than those listed on the <a1>Installing</a1> page and will install any required dependencies the first time you install the product as part of the package.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 除了那些列举在<a1>安装</a1>页面里的东西外本身没有什么特殊要求，并且一旦你安装了本产品的会安装任何要求的依赖项作为包的一部分。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> permits you to specify what <i1>type</i1> of project it is that you wish to create, and you can pick and choose based on your coding knowledge or habits.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 允许您指定希望创建的项目类型，你可以根据你的编码知识或习惯来选择。
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> splits game time into <i1>steps</i1> with the game speed defining how many of these steps there are supposed to be per second.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 将游戏时间分成若干个 <i1>步</i1>，游戏速度定义了每秒应该执行的步数量。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> stores images, sounds, scripts etc... between use in a cache so as to save time when testing your game as it will only re-compile those things that have been changed before testing.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 将图像，声音，脚本等存储在缓存中，以便在测试游戏时节省时间，因此它只会在测试之前重新编译已更改的内容。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> works with cycles of these events - from the moment a room is started to the moment it is finished there is a game loop running where every <b1>step</b1> (a step is a moment in game time, governed by the room speed setting) a series of events are run or checked, and you can choose to place code or DnD actions in your objects that respond to these events.
<i0> GameMaker Studio 2 </i0>适用于这些事件的周期 - 从房间开始到完成之时，每个<b1>步骤</b1>（一步是在游戏时间的一瞬间，由房间速度设置控制），一系列事件被运行或检查，您可以选择将代码或DnD操作放置在响应这些事件的对象中。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>的IDE接受鼠标和键盘输入，并且你可以选择一个或另一个或者两者都用来实现更多操作。通常你可以点击鼠标左键<i1>选择任何东西 <i2>/使用<i3> + <i4> 选中多个项目，按住 <i5>拖拽项目到不同的停靠栏或者工作区，以及这个 <i6> 可以打开特定的右键菜单。请注意，如果你在macOS系统上运行<i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> ，并且使用单按钮鼠标，请 <i8> + <i9> 获取鼠标右键单击 <i10>。

<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 的IDE接受鼠标和键盘输入，并且你可以选择一个或另一个或者两者都用来实现更多操作。通常你可以点击鼠标左键<i1>选择任何东西 <i2>/使用<i3> + <i4> 选中多个项目，按住 <i5>拖拽项目到不同的停靠栏或者工作区，以及这个 <i6> 可以打开特定的右键菜单。请注意，如果你在macOS系统上运行<i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> ，并且使用单按钮鼠标，请 <i8> + <i9> 获取鼠标右键单击 <i10>。
<i1> We won't go into too much depth about the tools available here - for that we have the <a2>Image Editor</a2> section of the manual - but briefly you have:
<i1> 我们不会深入介绍这里所提供的工具 - 在手册中的 <a2>图像编辑器</a2> 部分有详细说明 - 但是会简要说明一下：
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> can have several different runtime tools installed at any one time and you can set which one to use from this preference.
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 可以在任何一个时间安装几个不同的运行库工具，并且你可以从偏好设置中设置使用哪一个。

<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> works with cycles of these events - from the moment a room is started to the moment it is finished there is a game loop running where every step (a step is a moment in game time, governed by the game speed setting) a series of events are run, and you can choose to place code or DnD™ actions in your instances that respond to these events.
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 根据这些事件组成的循环来进行工作 - 一个房间从开始到完成，即为一个游戏循环运行，每一步（游戏时间的一个步骤，由游戏速度控制） 一系列事件将会运行，您可以选择将代码或拖放模块放入响应这些事件的实例中。
<i2> The above image has two views with two view ports, each one drawn at different positions.
<i2> 上面的图片输出了两个视野，每一个绘制在不同的位置。
<i2> You can add a resource to the resource tree by right clicking <i3> on it and selecting the <b4>Create</b4> option from the pop-up menu (for full details on this pop-up menu, see below).
<i2> 您可以通过右键单击 <i3> 资源树来添加资源，然后从弹出菜单中选择 <b4>创建</b4> 选项（有关此弹出菜单的详细信息，请参阅下文）。

<i2><b3>注：</b3> 如果你已经在重置游戏窗口大小（例如切换全屏到窗口），并且希望新的窗口屏幕居中，你应该使用一个<b4>alarm[0]（计时器）</b4> 来调用这个函数，至少在窗口更改 one step（一步）之后，否则可能会出现问题。</i2><br5>

<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 支持以下着色器语言：

<i3> 在 Windows 的编译选项中如果选中标记为 <i4>记住打包选项</i4> 的框，则 <i5>GameMaker Studio 2</i5> 将记住所有关于编译器的选择（可以在 <a6>Windows 首选项</a6> 重置或更改）。

<i6><b7>注意：</b7>该函数仅适用于HTML5、Windows、MacOS、Windows 8 (JS)以及Tizen (JS)模块。</i6><br8>
<t7>MP3</t7> and <t8>OGG</t8> files should be used for background music or any effect that plays over a longer period of time or that has a rather large file size.
<t7>MP3</t7> 和 <t8>OGG</t8> 格式的文件则适合存储背景音乐以及一些需要长时间播放的声音。

A 2D array needs to be initialised before use, the same as a 1D array, and can hold real numbers, strings and constants, just like any other variable, making them ideal candidates for any game that needs to store large amounts of data in an easily accessible way (remember, you can loop through an array easily).
二维数组在使用前同样也需要初始化，和其它的变量一样，也可以存储实数、字符串和常量。在需要便捷地储存大量数据时，二维数组是一个理想的选择（记住，数组中循环非常方便）。
A Remote Worker with this name already exists.
已存在具有此名称的远程工作者。
A Runtime download is already in progress.
运行库下载已经在进行中。
A basic game in <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will require a room to run in, and usually at least one object and a sprite, although you'll likely use a lot more!
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 中的游戏至少需要一个房间来运行，至少存在一个物体和一个精灵，当然你不止会使用一个！
A boolean is simply a value that can either be <t0>true</t0> or <t1>false</t1>.
A branch to execute in a switch if the case is true.
Switch分支中当满足情形时所执行的分支。
A breakpoint is a place in your game code that you wish it to stop at so you can see what's going on.
断点是你游戏代码中你需要暂停的地方，这样你就能观察到底发生了什么。
A breakpoint is a point in the game loop where you want the debug module to pause and let you step through the actual game code a line at a time.
断点是游戏循环中您希望调试模块暂停，并让您手动遍历实际游戏代码的一个点。
A brief description of the data being stored.
所存储数据的简要说明。
A conflict was encountered, but the gamer chose to ignore it
遇到冲突,但玩家选择忽略它。
A default switch case for when no other case is matched.
当没有其他情形匹配时的默认情形。
A dimension input has been set along with both the associated anchors
已经设置了一个维度的输入，连同关联的锚点A dimension input has been set along with both the associated anchors
A dimension input has been set along with both the associated anchors, the dimension input will be ignored
大小已经设置与关联的锚点一致，大小的输入将被忽略。

'{1}'
the style will continue to be saved in
'{2}'

样式名为“{0}”的副本被发现在
'{1}'
样式将继续保存在
'{2}'
A file with the same name already exists.
A function has been given the wrong number of arguments when a certain number were expected
A general description of what the script does.
A generic loop that continues until a Break action is hit.
遇到跳出动作（Break）之前会持续执行的常规循环。
A gesture event (Tap, Drag, Flick, Pinch or Rotate)
手势事件（轻敲、拖动、划动、捏合或旋转）
A great many things are different between GameMaker Studio 2 and <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 1.4, and so your older projects may need some tweaking for them to work.
<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>和 <i1>GameMaker Studio 1.4</i1>之间存在很多差异，因此你的旧版项目可能需要一些调整之后才能运作。
A great many things are different between GameMaker Studio 2 and GameMaker: Studio 1.4, and so your older projects may need some tweaking for them to work.
GameMaker Studio 2 和 GameMaker Studio 1.4 之间存在很多差异，因此你的旧版项目可能需要一些调整之后才能运作。
A group cannot be a child of itself.
一个组不可以是自身的子级。
A local push notification is local to the device that the game is installed on, and requires no backend server.
本地通知由安装游戏的设备直接推送，并不需要后端服务器。
A parent reliant anchor (bottom or right) has been set with no parent gadget
一个父依赖锚点（右底）已经被设置为没有父组件?
A parent reliant anchor (bottom or right) has been set with no parent gadget, try setting the dimension instead
一个父依赖锚点 (底部或右部) 已被设置为没有父部件，作为替代，请尝试设置大小。
A physics shape cannot have more than 8 points.
物理形状不能超过8个点。
A pointer is a data type that "points" to a memory location.
指针是一个“指向”一个内存位置（Memory Location）的一种数据类型
A previous compile error has caused the compiler parse tree to not be created and thus the compiler has no program data to compile
先前的编译错误导致编译器解析树无法创建，因此编译器没有要编译的程序数据
A script has been called that the compiler does not recognise (this error is usually thrown by empty script resource references since the compiler will strip out these resources on compile)
调用了一个编译器无法识别的脚本（这个错误通常由空的脚本资源引用引发，因为编译器在编译时会删除这些资源）
A script resource is a collection of codes you have written to create your own function.
脚本资源是一个你自己创建的功能函数的代码集合。
A self-contained loop structure with initialise, condition and increment statements.
一个带有初值、条件和步进语句的完备的循环结构。

A sprite like this is usually a <t10>PNG</t10> format file, but <i11>GameMaker Studio 2</i11> will also accept vector sprites in <t12>SWF</t12> format, and <b13>Spine</b13> sprites in <t14>JSON</t14> (with their accompanying texture atlas file).<br15>
像上图这样的精灵通常是一个 <t10>PNG</t10> 格式的文件，但是 <i11> GameMaker Studio 2</i11> 也兼容 <t12>SWF</t12> 格式的矢量精灵和 <t14>JSON</t14> 格式的 <b13>Spine</b13> 精灵（及其伴随的atlas条状图像）。<br15>

A step, is basically the loop that runs constantly with all the events being checked and triggered as necessary while the game runs, so as you can imagine, the Step Event is an event that is checked every single step of the game while the instance exists.
一个步，是一个所有事件在游戏运行时被检查和触发的基础循环运行，所以你可以想到，步事件是一个每一步都会被检查和触发一遍的事件。
A string is simply any text that has been placed in quotation marks (either '...' or "...").
一个字符串就是简单地使用引号（可以是'...'也可以是"..."）括起来的任意一段文本。
A texture ({1}x{2}) exceeds the maximum supported dimension ({3}x{3}) and cannot be loaded.
纹理 ({1}x{2}) 超过最大支持的尺寸 ({3}x{3}) ，不能加载。
A tilemap layer is a layer that permits you to add tiles from any of the tile set resources that you have created and will be set up automatically to use a grid the size of the tile set cells.
图块映射层是一个允许您从任何已创建的图块集资源添加图块的层，并将自动设置为使用图块集单元格大小的网格。
A typical object with events and code will look like this:
一个具有事件和代码的典型物体如下图所示：

0 （或者大于0的值） 代表成功(见下文)的返回, “resultString” 中包含返回的消息数据。
A view with this name already exists.
已经存在此名称的视图。
A/B Testing Using The Command Line
使用命令行进行 A/B 测试
Mac 上的 ADB 路径

tu.note: 位置：游戏选项 （游戏全局设置 ggs）- 主要设置 - 插件 add-ons Add-ons应该怎么翻译？

tuv.seg: Add/remove a breakpoint to the line the cursor is on
在光标所在行安插/移除一个断点
Adding a sound is as simple as clicking the add sound button <i0> and then browsing in the file explorer that opens to the file you want t use.
添加声音非常简单，只需单击 <i0> 添加声音按钮，然后在打开的文件浏览器中浏览您要使用的文件。
Adding an event will open either the code editor or the Drag and Drop editor, depending what type of project you are creating.
添加事件将打开代码编辑器或拖拽编辑器，具体取决于您创建的项目类型。
Adding something to the event tells <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> "I want to control what you draw for instances of this object" and it completely over-rides the default draw.
向事件添加一些内容告诉 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> “我想控制你为这个物体的实例绘制的内容”，它会完全覆盖默认的绘制。
附加组件需要额外的许可证?
Affected frames have been removed from the sprite.
已从精灵中删除受影响的帧。

After any updates have been installed, you will be required to supply the licence details for your <b3>YoYo Games Account</b3> (see <a4>here</a4>) before being able to use the product, meaning that the first time you use <i5>GameMaker Studio 2</i5> you <b6>must have an internet connection</b6>.
在所有更新都安装后，在使用产品之前你将会被要求为你的<b3>YoYoGames 账户</b3>（参见这<a4>这里</a4>）提供许可的详细信息，这意味着初次使用<i5>GameMaker Studio 2</i5>的时候，你<b6>必须联网</b6>
After building a package highlight it in an explorer window
创建包后在资源管理器窗口中高亮显示。
After having created a tile set, you need to add the tiles to your room, which is done by creating a tilemap layer.
在创建了一个图块集之后，您需要将图块添加到您的房间，此行为是通过创建一个图块映射层来完成的。
After logging in and starting a new project, <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> will take you to the initial <b1>workspace</b1> with some basic windows docked to the IDE.
登录并开启一个新项目之后, <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 会带你到最开始的 <b1>工作区</b1> ，一些基本的窗口停靠在 IDE上.
After setting up the Merge Tool, you can then set up the <i0>User Identity</i0> with these options:
设置完合并工具后，你可以使用这些选项设置<i0>用户身份（User Identity）</i0>：

After setting up the User Identity, you can then add a new username/password combination for authentication by clicking the button labelled <b0>Add new User/Pass authentication</b0>, which will open the following window with different fields for you to fill in:
设置好用户身份后，您可以通过点击<b0>添加新用户/通过认证</b0>的按钮添加新的用户名/密码组合进行身份验证，这将打开以下窗口，您可以在此填写字段。
After the initial login, you should be able to use the product offline, however it will periodically require that you connect to verify the login account.
经过初始登录后，你应该就可以离线地使用本产品了，但是它会定期地要求你联网来验证登录账户。
Again, all the bits move on one, and that multiples by 2.
所有的位都左移 1 位，这是乘以 2 的情况。
Alias must be longer than 5 characters
Alias password must be longer than 5 characters
别名密码必须长于5个字符
All cells within the grid will then contain this value, which can be a real number or a string.
所有在这个栅格中的单元格接下来都会包含这个值，可以是一个实数或者一个字符串。
All games have to have sound effects, and most also have music, which means that you need to be able to add them to your game in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.
所有游戏都必须有音效，大多数游戏还有音乐，这意味着你需要在 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 中为游戏添加音效以及音乐。

All games that you make in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> need at least one room to run (but can have many, many more) , and a room is basically a space where you place instances of the objects that make up your game and where the action of the game will take place.
您在 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 中所做的游戏至少需要一个空间来运行（当然可以不止一个），一个房间是一个基础空间，您可以在其中放置组成游戏的物体的实例，这里也是实例的事件触发和实现的场所。

All games that you make in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> need at least one room to run (but can have many, many more) , and a room is just a space where you place instances of the objects that make up your game as well as tiles and any other graphical resources.
所有在 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 中制作的游戏至少拥有一个房间（但可以有更多），而房间只是一个空间，您可以在其中放置构成游戏的物体的实例以及图块和任何其他图形资源。
All objects have a set of properties which you can specify in the object editor, like the sprite, whether it uses physics or not, or whether it is a "child" object of another one.
所有物体都有一组可在对象编辑器中被设置的属性，例如链接精灵，是否使用物理规则，或者设置为其他对象的子对象。
All real numbers are stored as 32bit floating point values (even integer values), so you may experience slight rounding errors when dealing with these.
所有的实数都被存储为一个32位的浮点数（即使是个整数），因此在处理这些数据的时候你可能会遇到一些轻微的舍入误差（Rounding Errors）。

All sprites (and all other resources) must have a name given to them so that you (and <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>) can identify them easily, although you should note that this name is really just a variable which holds an ID value that "points" to the resource, in this case a sprite.
所有的精灵（以及其他资源）必须有一个自己的名字，以便你（和 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>）可以很容易地识别它们，但是你应该注意到这个名字实际上只是一个变量，它保存着一个 ID 值“点对点” 连接到资源，在目前情况下是连接到一个精灵。
除Windows 8 (JS)以外的所有目标平台

All targets come with two compile options, one is the <b0>VM</b0> that uses a runner and interpreted code and the other which is the <b1>YYC</b1> (YoYo Compiler) which creates native code and a compiled executable.
所有目标平台都有两个编译选项：一个是<b0>VM</b0>，它使用一个运行器来解释代码；另一个是<b1>YYC</b1>，是创建本机代码并编译可执行程序。
All the bits in this case have moved to the left by one, making it move from the 3rd bit, to the 4th, and changing the value from 4 to 8.
这里所有的位都向左移动了 1 位，使它从 3 位变成 4 位，值从 4 变成 8。
All the characters, monsters, balls, walls, etc... are all objects you create in the resource tree.
所有的角色，怪物，球，墙壁等都是您在资源树中创建的物体。
All this makes the whole collision code monumentally faster, and lets you spend the CPU time where you really need it.
所有这些都使得整个碰撞代码非常快，并且允许您在真正需要的地方花费 CPU 时间。
All this script does is check to see if an instance has the same object_index as a given object and would be called simply as:
该脚本所做的事情无非就是检测实例是否具有和所给定object一致的object_index，并且可以简化调用为：
All values that are passed into a script are assigned the following <b2>built-in</b2> variables:
所有值都被传入脚本，并且被赋给了如下的<b2>内置</b2>变量：
Allow Menu and Dock in Fullscreen
允许菜单和停靠栏全屏化
Allow empty tabs to be closed via the keyboard shortcut
允许通过键盘快捷键关闭空的选项卡
Allow label font to scale above 100%
允许标签字体缩放 100%以上
Allow label font to scale below 100%
允许标签字体在100%以下缩放
Allow menu and dock in fullscreen
全屏时允许菜单和停靠栏
允许玩家调整窗口大小
允许工作区连接线交叉
允许的 Web服务器 IP
允许的 Web服务器 IP/主机名/CIDR IP 范围
Already a resource with name '{0}' - please rename it before importing the extension
已经存在资源名 '{0}' - 导入这个扩展之前请重命名它
Also note that if you deactivate a persistent object, it will no longer pass from one room to another unless re-activated before the Room End event is triggered.
另请注意，如果您停用持久性对象，它将不会再从一个房间传递到另一个房间，除非在客户端事件触发之前重新启动。
Also note that while the image above shows a full wall tile set with 47 tiles, you may not need so many as you can rotate and flip tiles when placing them in the room editor later.
还要注意的是，虽然上面的图片显示了一个镶满 47 块图块的完整墙面砖，但您可能不需要这么多，因为稍后将它们放置在房间编辑器中时，您可以旋转和翻转图块。

Also note that you can set the default Packaging Option from the <a8>UWP Preferences</a8>) so that <i9>GameMaker Studio 2</i9> remembers the choice for all future compiles (meaning this options window will not be shown).
另请注意，您可以在 <a8>UWP 首选项</a8> 中设置默认打包选项，以便 <i9>GameMaker Studio 2</i9> 记住所有编译器的选择（同时意味着此选项窗口将不会显示）。
Also, the break is not required, and if there is no break statement the execution simply continues with the code for the next case statement.
同样，“break”也不是必须的，没有它时，简单的继续到下一个case语句。
Also, the following unary operators exist:
还存在以下一元运算符：
Always do full install of APK
Always immediately open newly created resources
总是立即打开新创建的资源
Always open new resources created by dropping files into the IDE
总是立即打开拖拽到IDE的资源
An Intel Dual Core i3 processor
一个 Intel 双核 i3 处理器
An Intel Quad Core i5 processor
一个 Intel 四核 i5 处理器
An anchor or dimension has been set to percentage with no parent gadget
已经设置了一个锚点或者尺寸，其值百分比于没有父的小工具。An anchor or dimension has been set to percentage with no parent gadget
An anchor or dimension has been set to percentage with no parent gadget, try using pixel instead
锚点或者尺寸被设置为父部件的百分比，但是并没有设置父部件。将尝试用像素值代替。
An array is a special data type that can be used to hold multiple values.
数组是一个特殊的数据类型，它们可以用来存储多个值。
An array or two can make it much easier to create a good menu system.
如果有一两个数组的话，创造一个良好的菜单系统就不是什么难事了。
An assignment simply stores a value in a variable and has the form:
赋值语句把一个值赋予一个变量，其格式如下：
An enum is an "enumerator", and it essentially permits you to create your own limited data type with a list of constant values.
一个枚举也成为一个枚举器（Enumerator），它们允许你使用常量值列表创建自己的有限的数据类型。
An error has occurred in the game.
An error occurred while trying to download the manual
尝试下载帮助文档时发生错误
An example of how your final command should look would be:
最后的命令看起来应该是这样的：

An expression can be a simple value but can also be more complicated, so, rather than assigning a value to a variable, one can also add a value to the current value of the variable using <b0>+=</b0>, for example:
其中，表达式（expression）可以是一个值，也可以是复杂的代数式，除了将一个值赋给一个变量，还可以使用 <b0>“+=”</b0>在变量存储的值上加一个值，比如：
An extension file with the same name already exists.
同名扩展文件已经存在。
An image in the {0} file failed to load.
{0} 文件中的一个图像加载失败。

平铺的图像（水平或者垂直）边缘挨着另一侧边缘添加(?)。
An open project is required to import assets.\nDo you want to create a new project or open an existing project now?
导入资产需要一个打开的项目。\n 现在你想创建一个新项目或者打开一个已存在的项目吗？
An overview will appear here when you add an action
当你增加一个动作，这里将出现一个概述
An update is available for this asset.
An updated runtime is available in {0}!
And now in your Event Editor you'll see this:
现在在您的活动编辑器中，您将看到：

实际完成的动画放置在游戏中看起来是这样的：<br6>

And you can find a full explanation of all the different parts of the <b0>Object Editor</b0> here:
你可以在这里找到 <b0>物体编辑器</b0> 所有部分的完整解释：
Android SDK Not Valid - Invalid JDK
Android SDK 无效 - JDK 无效
Android SDK Not Valid - Missing Keystore
Android SDK 无效 - 丢失密钥库
Another example of parenting would be if you have a game where you want to create 10 different looking objects and have them all behave in the same way.
育儿的另一个例子是，如果你有一个游戏，你想要创建10个不同寻找的对象，并使它们都以相同的方式行事。

Another important feature of workspaces is that you can click <i0> on the tab and - still holding the mouse button <i1> down - drag it off of the main IDE window into its own individual window, making it very easy to organise things if you are using - for example - multiple displays.
工作空间的另一个重要特点是您可以点击 <i0> 标签，并且按住鼠标按钮 <i1> - 将其从主 IDE 窗口拖出到自己的电脑桌面中，使其便于组织， 例如您正在使用多个显示器。
Another important thing to do know is how to set the <b0>collision mask</b0> for the sprite.
另一个重要的事情是知道如何设置精灵的 <b0>碰撞盒</b0> 。
Another method for navigating the workspace is to use <b0>Bookmarks</b0>.
导航工作区的另一种使用方法是使用 <b0>书签</b0>。
Another thing you can do with surfaces is use them as textures to be manipulated, or to create sprites "on the fly", or to create complex overlays.
另外就是使用表面作为需要操作的纹理贴图，或者创建“在飞”的精灵，或者创建复杂的叠加。
Any other negative number means a synchronisation failure
Any type of collision mask other than rectangle will be slower to resolve, but when making a small, simple game it's not usually an issue.
除矩形以外的其他类型的碰撞盒设置相对较慢，但是当制作一个小而简单的游戏时，这通常不是问题。

Anything under 0 is essentially infinite (limited by the memory available) while positive values will limit the stack to that number, removing any action at the tail of the stack if the limit is reached.
0或者低于0表示不限（受可用内存限制），而正数将限制堆栈为指定的数值，如果达到限制将删除堆栈尾部的动作。

Apart from creating your own assets and code for your projects, you also have access to the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> <b1>Marketplace</b1> where you can download both free and paid assets to be added to your projects.
除了为你的项目创建你自己的资源和代码以外，你也可以通过 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 的 <b1>市场（Marketplace）</b1>来下载免费的和付费的资源并将其添加到你的项目中。
Apart from the coloured bars, there are also a few values at the top.
除了彩色的显示条，顶部还有几个值。
Apart from the options above there are also two sub-categories for the code and dialog editor preferences (shown together below as the preferences are exactly the same for both):
除了上述选项之外，还有两个子类别用于代码和对话框编辑器偏好设置（在下面一起显示是因为他们的偏好设置完全相同）：
Apart from these compile errors, you can also get syntax errors.
除了这些编译错误，您还可以获得语法错误。
Apart from these drop down menus, you also have a series of buttons along the top with which you can control certain aspects of your game and the Debug Modules interaction with it.
除了这些下拉菜单，窗口上你还有一排按钮来控制你游戏中的方方面面，让游戏与调试模块产生互动。
Append this to an if-statement to execute code when the condition evaluates to false.
将此附加到if语句，在条件求值为false时执行此代码。
Apply a transformation to tile data.
将变换应用于图块数据。
Apply friction to the instance's movement.
对实例的移动应用阻力。

Arrays are essential for making RPGs, because instead of having a jumble of variables, you just have a few lines, which you can refer back to at any time.
制作RPG游戏时数组是基础的用法，仅需数行，替代使用混乱的变量，并且可以随时可以重新提及。
Arrays created in this way will have each entry initialised to 0 unless you specify an (optional) initialisation value.
以这种方式创建的数组中每一元素的都会被初始化为0，除非你指定了初始值（可选）。
Arrays may seem confusing at first, but they can be extremely useful and are an essential part of making games.
数组在一开始看来可能不容易理解，但是它们在游戏制作的过程中是非常有用的也是不可或缺的一部分。

As a very simple example, in the past multiplying by 32 might have taken several CPU cycles to execute, while a simple binary operation to do the same thing would have taken only 1.
一个非常简单的例子，过去乘以 32 可能需要几个 CPU 周期来执行，而简单的二进制运算同样的事情只需要一次。

As an additional tool for debugging compiled games, there are certain <b0>command line parameters</b0> that can be used when you run the final game package on Window.
作为调试编译游戏的附加工具，当您在Window上运行最终游戏包时，可以使用某些 <b0>命令行参数</b0>。

As before, each number points to a position within the array, only this time each position has an "a" <i0>and</i0> "b" coordinate.

As explained in the section on <a0>Configurations</a0>, you can store certain details for compiling your game as <b1>Configs</b1>.
如 <a0>配置</a0> 部分所述，您可以将游戏编译的某些详细信息储存为 <b1>配置</b1>。
As explained in the section on <a2>Resources</a2>, a sprite is an image that can be animated (although it doesn't have to be) and then drawn to the screen.
如 <a2>资源</a2> 部分所述，精灵是一个图像， 可以是动画（不一定必须是），然后绘制到屏幕上。
As indicated, wherever you use a parent object, this also applies to the descendants (or "children").
如所示，无论何处使用父对象，这也适用于后代（或“子”）。
As long as the expression is true, the statement (which can also be a code block) is executed.
只要表达式（expression）是true，这些语句（statement）（也可以是语句块）就会被反复执行。

As machines have gotten more complex, they have also reduced the time many complex instructions take to run so that now, a 32x32 bit multiply might well only take 1 cycle - same as the binary operator.
因为机器已经变足够复杂了，这也减少了很多复杂指令的运行时间，一个 32 x 32 位乘法可能也只需要一个周期 - 同二进制运算一样的效率。
As mentioned above, all normal drawing in your game is done on the <i0>application surface</i0>, and this surface can be changed and manipulated just like a normal surface.
正如上面提过的，所有普通绘制都是在<i0>应用表面层</i0>里进行的，这个表面可以像通常的表面层一样改变或控制。
As mentioned above, you can pass a number of arguments to a script, and it will use these to perform the task you have written it for.
如前所述，你可以向一个脚本传递（Pass）一些参数，然后它就会用这些参数来执行你为它所编写的任务。
As such, a sprite is an image drawn using the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> Image Editor, or made with any external drawing program and imported into <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
因此，精灵使用 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 图像编辑器来绘制图像，或使用外部绘图程序制作并导入到 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 中。

As the name implies, this window will show all instance variables, local variables and built in variables associated with the instance currently being stepped through in the Source window (if an instance is being referenced using the keyword "other" or the <t0>with</t0> statement, then this window will show that instances properties instead).
顾名思义，这个窗口会显示所有实例变量，局部变量和与当前源代码窗口中按步跳过的实例的内置变量。（如果一个实例是用关键词“other”或者<t0>with</t0>语句引用来的，那么这个窗口中会显示该实例的属性）。

As you can see, it can be "split" into 64x64pixel chunks, which would then placed into the room editor.<br6>

As you can see, the initial workspace is on a tab at the top of the screen (and you can rename it by double clicking the tab), but you can create further workspaces for the project by clicking the <i0> to the side, giving you multiple possible workspaces for any single project.

As you can see, where there is a bit in each value, the bit is kept, and where there is a mix or 0's and 1's these are reset to 0.
如你所见，相同位的值一样时，值将保留（都为 1，则为 1），而值是混合的，一个是 0，一个是 1，则为0（一个不为 1，则为 0）。

Basically a tile set is a single image that <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> will break into separate sections based on the values you give for the various settings.
基本上，一个基础图块就是一个单一图像，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 将根据您所设置的各种值将图像拆分成不同的基础图块。
Basically it's a two-part program that runs directly on the graphics card itself, making it very fast since the GPU is doing all the work and freeing up CPU cycles for your game code.
基本上它是由两个程序组成，直接运行在显卡上，所以在GPU运行所有工作以及为游戏代码释放CPU周期时速度非常快。
Basically, events are discreet moments in the game loop where things are made to happen based on what you have programmed for them.
基本上，事件是游戏循环中根据你为它们所做的设计发生事情的重要时刻。
Basically, these are discreet moments in the game loop where things are made to happen based on what you have programmed for them.
基本上，这些是在游戏循环中谨慎的时刻，根据您为他们编程的内容，事情发生。
Be aware that this may have broken your project, as the command was not successful and you have chosen not to retry it.
请注意，这可能会破坏您的项目，因为命令不成功并且您已选择不重试它。
Be aware too that there are many aspects to making games and that they are all equally important: game-play, graphics, sounds, user interaction, etc...
你也要意识到，要制作一款优秀的游戏还包含许多方面：游戏性，美术，音乐，用户交互等....
Be careful with your do loops, as you can easily make them loop forever, in which case your game will hang and not react to any user input anymore.
注意这是一个循环，可能会出现死循环，游戏将会挂起不响应输入。

Before continuing however it is worth noting that if you have set a proxy in your <a0>Windows Internet Options</a0>, and it doesn't require a username/password, then it should just "as is" and you probably will not be required to set up the proxy in <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
在继续之前，如果你已经在 <a0>Windows Internet 选项</a0>设置了代理，并且它不需要用户名和密码，那么你不需要在 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 设置代理。

By Default a new room will always contain a background layer, but you can remove it if you don't need it.
默认情况下，新的房间将始终包含背景层，但是如果您不需要，可以将其删除。
By Default a new room will always contain an instance layer, but you can remove it if you don't need it.
默认情况下，一个新的房间将会包含一个实例层，如果你不需要它，你可以删除它。

By assigning objects to a positive collision group (ie: three objects are all in group "<b3>2</b3>") you are telling <i4>GameMaker Studio 2</i4> that instances of these objects should <i5>always collide</i5>, even if they have nothing in their collision event, obeying the physical properties that you have assigned them and the room they are in.
通过将对象分配给一个正面的碰撞组（即：三个对象全部在组“<b3> 2 </b3>”中）你正在告诉<i4> GameMaker Studio 2 </i4>这些对象的实例应该是<i5>总是碰撞</i5>，即使他们在碰撞事件中没有任何东西，服从你分配的物理属性和他们所在的空间。
By changing the 31 we can align to anything we like – as long as it's a power of 2.
通过与 31 进行与非运算，我们可以对齐到任何我们喜欢的地方——只要它是 2 的倍数。
By checking this box, you are telling GameMaker Studio 2 to basically "ignore" the physical properties of the object, but still return a collision event with the objects around it.
通过选中此框，您正在告诉GameMaker Studio 2基本上“忽略”对象的物理属性，但仍会返回与其周围的对象的碰撞事件。

点击精灵框上的鼠标左键<i0>，<b1>资源浏览器</b1>将显示资源树中所有可用的精灵列表：<i2>

Clicking <b0>Resources</b0> will open up a list of all the resources in the <a1>Resource Tree</a1> that you can create, and selecting any one of them will create that resource for you, and focus the workspace on the editor window for that resource.
单击 <b0>资源</b0> 将打开 <a1>资源树</a1> 中可以创建的所有资源类型的列表，选择任何一个将为您创建该资源，并将工作区焦点放在该资源的编辑器窗口上。
Clicking on any of the resources shown on the list will open it in the current workspace or focus the workspace on it if it is already open.
单击列表中显示的任一资源将在当前工作空间中打开它，如果已经在工作区中打开，则会把工作区的焦点放在其上。

Clicking on the <b7>Modify Collision Shape</b7> button will open the following chained window to edit the shape: <i8> This looks similar to the <a9>Path Editor</a9>, and functions in much the same way.
点击<b7>修改碰撞形状</b7>按钮将打开以下链接窗口来编辑形状：<i8>这看起来类似于<a9>路径编辑器</ a9>，并且功能大致相同。
Clicking this will initiate the download and installation of the selected runtime (a status bar will be shown in the top right of the IDE).
点击这个将初始化下载并安装选中的运行库（IDE顶部靠右将显示一个状态条）。
Clicking this will open up the <a0>Main Game Options Editor</a0>.

Clicking this will refresh the project list from the Marketplace so you can check to see if anything has been updated and get the latest versions.
单击将从市场刷新项目列表，以便您可以检查，看看是否有任何已更新，并获得最新版本。
Clicking this will remove the selected runtime from your hard drive.
点击这个将从硬盘中删除选中的运行库。
Clicking this will take you to a <a2>support forum article</a2> that details what you need on a per-platform basis.
点击该选项将会带你到一个 <a2>服务支持论坛的文章</a2>，里面详细阐述了对于每个平台基底你所需要的东西。
Clicking this will test-run your current project along with the debug module.
单击此项将和调试模块一起测试运行当前项目。使用它来测试和调试你的游戏。
Clicking this will test-run your project on the chosen target platform.
单击此项将在所选目标平台上测试运行您的项目。
Clicking this will toggle the view between the tutorials or demos you own and those that you have installed.
单击此按钮可以在你所拥有和那些已安装的教程视图之间进行切换。

关闭当前已开启的ini文件。

tuv.seg: 编译错误窗口字体设置
Compile times may take longer and you should always clear the compiler cache before building any final complete asset package for a target platform.
编译时间可能会很长长，您应该注意清除编译器缓存，然后再为目标平台构建最终的完整资源包。
Compiling your game can mean one of two things: compiling it for testing, or compiling it to create an <i0>asset package</i0> for a specific target platform.
编译游戏意味着以下两种情况之一：编译它进行测试，或编译它以创建特定目标平台的 <i0>资源包</i0> 。
Compiling your game project to any target platform will require that you have set up the correct build tools (see <a0>here</a0>) and also filled in the appropriate <a1>Platform Preferences</a1>.
将游戏项目编译到对应目标平台需要您的构建工具设置正确（请参阅 <a0>此处</a0>），并填写相应的 <a1>平台首选项</a1>。
Compressing data structures is a good thing, because if you use less memory, you get less cache misses, and your code just runs faster.
压缩数据结构是一件非常好的事情，因为如果你使用的内存越少，缓存丢失的也就越少，而你的代码就可以运行地更快。
Computers only multiply in 2s, and to do more it'll break a number apart, and then add all the results together.
计算机只能在 2 以内相乘，为了乘以更大的数，它会先将数字分开，然后将所有结果加在一起。

Conversely, if you have objects with a negative collision group (ie: four objects assigned "<b6>-1</b6>"), you are telling <i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> that these should <i8>never collide</i8>, and any collision events between them will be ignored.
相反，如果您的对象具有负面的碰撞组（即：分配了“<b6> -1 </b6>”的四个对象），则说明<i7> GameMaker Studio 2 </i7>碰撞</ i>，并且它们之间的任何碰撞事件将被忽略。

Damping is also much cheaper to simulate than friction, but please note that damping is not a replacement for friction; the two effects can, and should, be used together.
模拟阻尼比摩擦要便宜得多，但请注意，阻尼不是摩擦的替代品;这两个效果可以而且应该一起使用。
Damping is used to reduce the physics world velocity of an instance, and differs from friction in that friction only occurs when two instances with collision shapes (fixtures) are in contact.
阻尼用于降低实例的物理世界速度，并且与摩擦不同，因为摩擦力仅在碰撞形状（弹性）的两个实例接触时才发生。

Depth ordering is from highest to lowest, so that the lower the depth the nearer the "camera" and the higher the depth the further away.
深度排序是从最高到最低，所以深度越接近“相机”，深度越远。

Essentially they save the current configuration of the different game options and export options for the resource tree, meaning you can have a specific configuration for Android, another for Windows, etc....
本质上，它们保存了资源树的不同游戏选项和导出选项的配置，这意味着您可以对 Android 平台进行特定配置，而另一种用于 Windows 平台等。

Essentially, When you're scrolling in window "A", the cursor might hover over another scrollable area in window "B", so this preference defines how long you have to wait after you stop scrolling "A" before you can then scroll "B", so you don't accidentally start scrolling different panels.
必要地，当你滚动窗口“A”时，光标可能会悬停在另一个可滚动的窗口“B”的部分区域上，因此这个设置定义了在你停止滚动“A”窗口之后需要多长时间你才能滚动“B”窗口，这样你就不会不小心地滚动到别的面板了。

Essentially, a <i2>tile</i2> is simply a graphical resource that gets drawn to the screen with very little CPU/GPU overhead, making them ideal for designing any static items in levels, and a <i3>tile set</i3> is a collection of tiles created together in one sprite.
从本质上讲，<i2>图块</i2>只是一个简单的图形资源，只需要很少的 CPU / GPU 运算就可以绘制到屏幕上，这使得它们成为设计制作所有静态项目的理想选择，<i3>图块集</i3> 是在一个精灵中统一创建的图块的集合。

For example, if you have a 200 x 150 pixel window, and the player stretches the window by dragging the borders, the final window size may be 400 x 300 pixels, but the drawing canvas is STILL 200 x 150, which gives a blurred image as the pixel ratio is now 1:2.
比如，你的窗口是 200 x 150 像素，玩家拖动边界拉伸窗口，最后窗口可能会是400 x 300 像素，但是绘制画布仍然是 200 x 150，因为像素缩放比例为1:2，图像变得模糊。

例如，如果焦点在资源树窗口，额外菜单项将出现“<a1>资源（Resource）</a1>”。
For example, let's say bit 1 is an "active" flag, and bit 3 is a "visible" flag.
例如，我们假设 1 号位标记“活跃”，3 号位标记“可见”。

For example, let's say we want a counter that simply counts from 0 to 1 and back to 0 (toggling between 0 and 1), we could add one and do an IF to see if it's gotten to 2, and then reset it back to 1.
例如，我们要一个计数器，简单的从 0 数到 1 然后回到 0（0 和 1之间切换），我们可以递增 1，使用“IF”检查是否获得 2，然后重新设置为 1。
For example, let's take the case above, but this time clear them.
比如，还是上面的例子，这次是清除他们。

For example, maybe you are working on interactions between the player and several enemy objects, so you'd have the player on it's own workspace and the enemy objects in another, and perhaps another workspace only to show the scripts that both use.
例如，也许你正在研究玩家和多个敌人之间的相互作用，所以你会有玩家在自己的工作区而敌人的物体在另一个，也许另一个工作区域只显示脚本或者两者都显示。

For example, say you have a platform game with multiple worlds - you could create a "World View" of the resource tree with folders called "World 1", "World 2", etc... and then drag the sprites, tilesets, instances and rooms associated with each world into the required folders.
例如，假设您有一个具有多世界的平台游戏 - 您可以使用名为 “World 1”，“World 2” 等的文件夹创建资源树的 “World View”，然后拖动精灵，图块集， 与每个世界相关联的实例和房间到所需的文件夹。
For example, say you want to have an enemy create a number of instances when it dies, like some gold, an explosion and some blood as well as play a sound.
例如，假设你想让一个敌人在死的时候创造一些实例，比如掉一些金子，产生爆炸或者流血效果，以及发出一些声音。
For example, the following 10 images form a sprite for a character who is waving his arms while skydiving.<br2>
例如，以下10张图像就形成一个精灵，是一个跳伞时挥舞着双臂的角色。<br2>
For example, the following program creates five balls at random positions.
比如说，下面的程序将会在随机位置创建5个球。

For example, you can use surfaces to "catch" instances, which can then be destroyed, and in this way you can create a decal effect where the sprite for the instance is displayed on the surface as if it still existed, permitting graphical effects like debris, blood, etc... without any real processing overhead.
例如，您可以使用表面来“捕捉”实例，然后摧毁它，并以这种方式，在表面(surfaces)上，实例的精灵显示的位置，创建一个贴花效果，就好像它仍然存在一样，以此来制作一些图像效果，如碎片，血液等.. 这上面没有任何真实的处理进程。
For example, you may have a top down game where the main sprite has a rectangular collision mask, but to make collisions smoother a circular mask may be better.
例如，你可能有一个自上而下的游戏，主要的精灵有一个矩形的碰撞掩模，但是使碰撞更平滑的圆形面具可能会更好。
For example, you may have two displays with the same resolution of 400 x 800, but display 1 has a dpi of 60 and display 2 has a dpi of 30.
比如，你可能有两个显示器，它们有相同的分辨率400 x 800，但是显示器1是60dpi，而显示器2是30dpi。

Friction is the force that resists the relative motion of material elements sliding against each other, which in the GameMaker Studio 2 physics world, translates as the loss of momentum caused by the collision of two instances with fixtures bound to them.
摩擦是抵抗物质元素彼此滑动的相对运动的力量，在GameMaker Studio 2物理世界中，由于两个实例与固定装置之间的撞击而造成的动量损失，这种力量将会转化为物理因素。

您可以在此创建和编辑游戏使用的资源，以及生成和更改配置。
