如果它们随后停止重叠和重叠，则会触发另一个碰撞事件。
If this is un-checked, they will open in a window chained to the object event editor.
如果未勾选，将在物体事件编辑器相关的窗口中打开。
If this is un-checked, they will open in a window within the current workspace.
如果没有勾选上，将在当前工作区的窗口中打开。

If we are moving right, and we've moved into a collision block, then as we know everything is aligned to 32, so we need to also align the sprite to a 32 pixel boundary - preferably the one to the left - so the sprite is moved OUT of the collision.
如果我们正在向右移动，然后我们已经移动到了一个碰撞块，并且我们知道一切都是对齐到 32 的，所以我们也需要使精灵对齐到 32 像素的边界——最好是左边的，然后精灵就会移出碰撞块。
If we had 64 1000000, then it becomes this... 1000000 & 0111111 which DOES leave us 0, so it's TRUE.
如果是 64（1000000），那么它就变成了...1000000 & 0111111，计算结果为 0，所以会返回 TRUE。
If we perform an AND of this, and it comes out "not zero", then we know if the key can open the door.
如果我们执行一个与运算，结果 "不为0 "，那么我们就知道这把钥匙可以开门了。
If we start doing values outside of the range of a byte (which can store numbers from 0 to 255), it does start to get a little harder to track.
如果我们开始造一个字节（存储 0 至 255 之间的数字）以外的值，难度会开始变大。
If we wanted the key to open door 1 and 3, then the key would have the MASK of 5 (which is 101 in binary).
如果我们想让钥匙打开 1 号门和 3 号门，那么钥匙的掩码是 5 (二进制是 101)。
If we wanted to align to the right, then we'd do the above, but then add 32 to move it into the next tile.
如果我们想对齐到右边，那么我们会做上面的操作，然后加上 32 将其移动到下一个图块中。
If we wanted to set the second bit, we would do this:
如果我们想要设置第二个位，我们要这样做：
If we were doing this in assembler, we actually get BOTH values in one divide, but you don't get this in high level languages (well… not very often), and so you have to do all the work twice.
假如我们是在汇编语言（Assembler）上完成这件事，我们实际上会在一次除法当中同时得到这两个值，但是在高级语言中你不会得到这种结果（应该说，不是很常见），并且因此你必须做两次所有的工作。
If you also want to execute the parent event you can call the so-called "inherited" event using the appropriate action or code.
如果还要执行父事件，可以使用相应的操作或代码调用所谓的“继承”事件。

If you are a more experienced programmer, then you can use the propriety scripting language <b2>GML</b2> to create your games, or you can even combine both and call GML functions with (and from) DnD™ actions, giving you a great deal of flexibility when it comes to how you write things.
如果你是一个更有经验的程序员，你更适合使用脚本语言 <b2>GML</b2> 创建你的游戏，或者你甚至可以结合两者，使用DnD™动作调用函数，在你写代码的时候，给你极大的灵活性。
If you are new to using a scripting language then it is recommended that you start with the GML Overview, otherwise just use the reference guide to check up on function names when required:
如果你是脚本使用的新手，建议从GML概述开始，不然只需要使用参考指南去查找所需要的函数名就可以了：
If you are using <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> on a laptop, then you will have a further option at the top of the IDE for <b1>Laptop Mode</b1>:
如果你正在一个笔记本电脑上使用<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>，那么在IDE的顶端会有一个选项为<b1>笔记本模式（Laptop Mode）</b1>：
If you are using the Arc Tool <i0> then here you can set the different colours used to draw the node properties:
如果你使用了弧线工具（Arc Tool）<i0>那么你可以在这里设置用于绘制节点属性的各种颜色：
If you choose "No", then frame edition will be silently cancelled when you change tools.
如果你选“否”（No），则帧编辑器会在你改变工具时静默地取消修改。
If you choose manual you will be able to set the bounding box values left, right, top and bottom.
如果您选择手动，您将能够设置左上右下的边界框值。
If you click <i2> on, for example, the Resource Tree tab at the top and drag it to the left of the current workspace, you will see that it becomes a free floating window.
例如，如果您单击 <i2> 顶部的“资源树”选项卡并将其拖动到当前工作空间的左侧，您将看到它成为一个自由浮动窗口。
If you click on it, you will be asked to supply a file, and then once that is done you should click on OK.
如果你点击它，会要求你提供一个文件。
If you click the <b2>Windows</b2> option, you will be shown a list of all the currently open windows within the workspace and you can select any of them to have the workspace focus on that window.
如果您单击 <b2>窗口</b2> 选项，将会显示工作区中所有打开窗口的列表，您可以选择其中任何一个来将工作区焦点放在该窗口上。
If you close the output window and wish to recover it you can use the <a7>Windows Menu</a7>.
如果您关闭了输出窗口并希望恢复，可以使用 <a7>窗口菜单</a7> （来恢复）。
If you close the resources window and wish to recover it you can use the <a5>Windows Menu</a5>.<br6>
如果关闭资源窗口并希望恢复，可以使用 <a5>窗口菜单</a5>。<br6>

If you do not have an appropriate sprite yet, you can click <i0> on the New Sprite button <i1> to create a new sprite resource and edit it as you wish, just as if you had created the resource through the standard resource create options, only now it will automatically be assigned to the object that you had open when you started to create it.
如果你还没有合适的精灵，你可以点击 <i0> 创建精灵按钮 <i1> 来创建一个新的精灵资源并按照你的意愿来进行编辑，就像你通过标准资源创建选项来创建资源一样，只是现在它会自动分配给您开始创建前所打开的物体。

If you do not use this function (the default setting) then the GUI layer will be positioned with its (0,0) point at the same position as that for the application surface (the area where your game is being drawn) and the width and height will be stretched to fit the this surface, such that setting a GUI width of 256px with this function when the application surface is 512px would stretch those 256 pixels to fit, effectively making the pixels twice as large.
如果你没有使用这个函数 (默认设置)， GUI层将被放置在同应用表面（游戏绘制的区域）一样的 (0,0)位置，宽度和高度将被拉伸以适合这个表面层，使用这个函数这样设置时宽度为256px的 GUI，当应用表面层是512px时，将会拉伸256像素为表面层的大小，使得像素放大两倍。
If you do nothing else at this point, when you run your game you will simply get a blank screen as all drawing is being done on the surface, but the surface itself is not being drawn anywhere.
如果不做到这一步，运行游戏时将会简单的获得一个空白的屏幕，因为所有的绘制都是在表面里完成的，但是表面层并不会在任何地方绘制出来。
If you do supply the extra value for initialising the array, then all indices within the new array will be set to that instead of 0, but note that the function will take longer to run.
如果你额外提供了一个值用于初始化这个数组，那么新数组中的所有索引元素都将被设置为该值而非0，但请注意，这样一来函数也将需要花费更多的时间来运行。
If you don't have a certificate, you can create one:
如果没有证书，请创建一个：

If you fire off a series of <t1>cloud_</t1> requests then you need to know which one you are getting the reply to, and so you would use this value to compare to the value you stored when you originally sent the request to find the right one.
如果你发送了一系列的 <t1>cloud_</t1> 请求，你需要知道被回应的是哪一个，所以你要用这个值来和发送时存储的值进行比较来找到你需要的请求。
If you have <b0>rectangular</b0> mask, then you can move any of the four corners, but the corresponding ones will adjust position automatically to always maintain a rectangle
如果您有<b0>矩形</b0>掩码，则可以移动四个角中的任何一个，但相应的角将自动调整位置，以始终保持矩形
If you have a <b0>circular</b0> mask, then you can only pull any of the path points to make the circle diameter larger or smaller
如果您有一个<b0>圆形</b0>遮罩，则只能拉任何路径点，使圆直径更大或更小
If you have a <b0>custom</b0> (polygon) mask, it must have a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 8 points to it, and it must be convex (see image below).
如果您有一个<b0>自定义</b0>（多边形）掩码，它必须至少为3，最多为8个点，并且必须为凸面（请参见下图）。

If you have a previously created certificate then you can click the file browser button here and add it in to the forum, but if you do <i2>not</i2> have a certificate and wish to make one, then you should omit any information here and instead click to the <b3>Create New Certificate</b3> button explained below.
如果你之前创建了一个整数那么你可以点击此处的文件浏览按钮来将其添加到社区当中，但如果你<i2>没有</i2>证书文件而想要有一个，那么你应该忽略此处所有信息而去点击下文将要解释的<b3>创建新证书（Create New Certificate）</b3>按钮
If you have initialised any buffers in your game, then this window will show you the buffer data.
如果你在游戏中初始化了缓冲器，这个窗口会给你显示缓冲数据。
If you have not previously made a certificate file for using the Marketplace, then you should click the button labelled <b0>Create New Certificate</b0> at the bottom of this form.
如果你之前没有为市场创建一个证书文件的话，那么你需要点击表单底部标有<b0>创建新证书（Create New Certificate）</b0>按钮。
If you have not turned on Source Control, you can find it in Main Options.
如果尚未打开“源码管理”，则可以在“主选项”中找到它。

If you have selected more than the number specified in this option, then you will be shown a warning, since having too many resources open at one time can cause issues with performance on lower end machines.
如果你选中的数目超过选项中的数目，你将会看到警告信息，因为同时打开太多的资源在低配电脑上会出出一些性能上的问题。
If you mouse over them then you can see the full project name and path, and clicking <i0> will open the project.
如果将鼠标移到上方，你可以看到完整的项目名称和路径，点击 <i0> 将打开这个项目。
If you need to check things more carefully, you can run the game in <b0>Debug Mode</b0> by clicking the debug run button <i1>.
如果您需要更详细地检查，可以通过单击调试运行按钮在<b0>调试模式</b0> 下运行游戏。<i1>
If you remember from earlier, using a 1 will set the first bit.
如果你还记得之前的情况，使用一个 1 将设置第一个位。
If you require Proxy Support for your installation of GameMaker Studio 2, this can be added simply by clicking the <b0>Proxy</b0>.
如果你需要为 GameMaker Studio 2 设置代理，可以点击 <b0>代理</b0> 来添加。
If you set this option to "OK" then no message will be shown and the edition will silently fail.
如果设置此项为“是”（OK），则不会显示该消息，并且无法做这样的编辑。

If you think about any rotating object in the "real world", unless it has a motor or is in space, it slows down over time due to the influence of external forces (like friction with the air around it).
如果您考虑“现实世界”中的任何旋转物体，除非有电机或空间，否则由于外力（如与其周围的空气的摩擦）的影响，它会随着时间的推移而减慢。

If you use this function to change the size of the game window, the contents of the window will be scaled to fit with a 1:1 ratio to the background canvas which will keep the image crisp and clear (although scaled if the window is other than the room or view size).
如果你使用这个函数改变游戏窗口口的大小，窗口内容将与背景画布以1：1的比例进行调整，以保持图像的清晰和明确（尽管缩放窗口不同于房间或视野）。
If you want a more in-depth guide as to how to use the different editors listed here, then you should check out the section of the manual that explains them in more detail here:
如果您想要更深入地了解如何使用这里列出的不同编辑器，那么您应该在这里查看说明手册里说明更详细的部分：
If you want to know more about the advanced functions of the Tile Set Editor, then see the <a0>relevant section of the manual</a0>.
如果您想了解更多关于图块集编辑器的高级功能的信息，请 <a0>参阅手册的相关章节</a0>。
If you want to remove a bookmark, you simply need to select the bookmarked window or code line and then repeat the <i0> + <i1> + <t2>NumberKey[0 - 9]</t2> that you used to create it.
如果要删除书签，只需要选择已加书签的窗口或代码行，然后重复用于创建书签的组合键 <i0> + <i1> + <t2>小键盘[0 - 9]</t2> 即可。
If you wish to go back to the default behaviour (ie: no mimimum), then use a value of -1.<br0>
如果想要回到默认的情况（比如没有最小值限制），只要使用值-1就可以。<br0>
If your proxy does require a username and/or password, then you'll need to add them in to the fields shown in the window above.
如果你的代理需要用户名和密码，那么请将它们填入上图字段中。

If, after changing the options here to customise <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> to your own tastes, you wish to back up the preferences that you have set you need to go to the folder <t1><b2>%AppData%/GameMakerStudio2/<your_account_name>/</b2></t1> and then copy the following two files to a safe place:
如果，在依据你的个人喜好改动过这里的选项来自定义<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>之后，你希望备份你所设定的偏好设置，那么你需要前往文件夹<t1><b2>%AppData%/GameMakerStudio2/<your_account_name>/</b2></t1>，并将下面两个文件复制到比较安全的位置：
Import all resources to a new project
将所有资源导入到一个新项目
Import image and convert to Tilemap
导入图片并转化为图块地图（Tilemap）。
Import marketplace package assets instead of adding a datafile?
导入市场扩展包资产而不是添加一个数据文件？
Import the project instead of adding a datafile?
导入项目而不是添加一个数据文件？
ImportHandler: Unable to find parent project for {0}.
导入处理器（ImportHandler）：找不到 {0} 的父级项目。
Imported image is a different size from the canvas
导入的图像与画布的大小不同
Imported layer depths for room(s) '{0}' were not adequately spaced.
房间“{0}”的导入层的深度之间没有足够的间隔。
Imported layer depths for rooms listed below are not adequately spaced.
下面列出的房间的导入层的深度之间没有足够的间距。
Importing files to a sprite is not an undoable action.
导入文件到精灵中是一个不可撤消的操作。
Importing projects is not supported in GameMaker Studio 2 Trial
GameMaker Studio 2 试用版不支持导入项目
Importing projects is not supported in the Trial version of GameMaker Studio 2.
GameMaker Studio 2的试用版不支持导入项目。
Importing strip images will replace the existing sprite frames - do you wish to proceed?
导入长带图将替换现有的精灵帧 - 你希望继续吗？
In <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> you have objects and you have instances.
在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中你会拥有物体以及实例。
In <i0>GameMaker: Studio 1.4</i0> you had a separate background resource, where you could add images to be used as backgrounds.
在<i0>GameMaker: Studio 1.4</i0>中，你有独立的背景资源，其中你可以添加图片用作背景。
In <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> all images are considered sprites, and the use you put them too will depend on the <i2>layer</i2> they are assigned to in the room.
在<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>中所有图像都被视为精灵，并且其用途也取决于它们在房间中所被分配的<i2>层（Layers）</i2>。
In GML a function has the form of a function name, followed by the input arguments between brackets and separated by commas (if the function has no input arguments then just brackets are used).
GML函数结构是，一个函数名，后面是括号之内的输入的参数，参数用逗号分隔（如果没有参数，仅仅用括号就可以了）。

In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding Left Control to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse ${LaptopRHSKeys} for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
在笔记本电脑模式下，您可以平移，滚动和缩放，在区域上移动鼠标同时按住左控制键进行缩放，使用左Alt键进行平移和滚动。\n启用笔记本电脑模式时，使用${LaptopRHSKeys}进行非鼠标交互。

In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding Left Control to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse Right Control and Right Alt for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
笔记本模式下你可以通过在一个范围内移动鼠标进行平移，滚动和缩放，按住左Ctrl缩放，左Alt平移和滚动。\n笔记本模式开启时使用右Ctrl和右Alt 进行无鼠标的交互。
In a number of situations you want to let your instances complete an action depending on a particular value.
很多情况下，你想要实例根据一个特定值完成一个动作。
In a timeline you specify which actions must happen at any specific moment in game time, and you can use all the actions that are available for an object in its different events as well as code.
在时间轴中，您可以设置在游戏内事件的任何特定时刻要执行那些操作，并且可以在不同的事件以及代码中使用可用于物体的所有操作。
In general a sprite will be associated with an object, but you can draw sprites on their own, either from code or in the room editor <b3>Asset Layer</b3> (more on this later).
一般而言，一个精灵将与一个物体相关联，当然你可以只绘制一个精灵，无论是用于代码还是在房间编辑器 <b3>资源层</b3> （后面会详细介绍）。
In general this is only required when debugging and may be requested by support should you have an issue.
一般地，这些内容只在调试的时候是需要的，并且在你遇到问题的时候可以请求支持。
In general this option is used for testing due to its faster build times, but it does not offer the same performance boost that using the YYC option (if available) offers.
一般来说，此选项可以更快的构建来用于测试，但它不能像YYC一样进行性能提升。

In general you can click the left mouse button<i1> to select anything, use <i2> + <i3> to select multiple items, hold <i4> to drag items into different docks or onto the workspaces, and also the <i5> to open context specific menus.
通常地，你可以点击鼠标左键<i1>来选择任意东西，使用<i2>+<i3>进行多选，按住<i4>来将项目移动到不同的层叠窗口或工作区（Workspace）上，以及<i5>可以打开特定的右键菜单。

In general you can click the left mouse button<i1> to select anything, use <i2>/<i3> + <i4> to select multiple items, hold <i5> to drag items into different docks or onto the workspaces, and also the <i6> to open context specific menus.
通常你可以点击鼠标左键<i1>选择任何东西 <i2>/使用<i3> + <i4> 选中多个项目，按住 <i5>拖拽项目到不同的停靠栏或者工作区，以及这个 <i6> 可以打开特定的右键菜单。
In general you'll want small sound effects to be <t4>WAV</t4> and larger effects or music to be <t5>MP3</t5> or <t6>OGG</t6>.
一般来说，小规格的声音效果一般是 <t4>WAV</t4> 格式，而大规格的声音效果以及音乐则使用 <t5>MP3</t5> 或 <t6>OGG</t6> 格式。

In general, <t6>WAV</t6> files are used for any short sound effects as even though they are generally larger files they will play instantaneously due to the fact that they do not need any type of decoding for playing.
通常来说，<t6>WAV</t6> 格式的文件适合存放短音效，因为WAV格式文件较大，但是WAV格式不需要解码就可以直接播放。
In general, or an object to draw anything and register collisions with instances of other objects it needs to have a sprite which is added using the <i0> button.
一般来说，除非这个物体用来绘制一些事物，或者与其他物体的实例产生碰撞，否则它需要有一个精灵，可以使用按钮 <i0> 添加。
In general, shortcuts fall into the following three categories:
一般地，快捷键被分为如下三类：
In general, the workspace is simply an area where you can organise the different resources of your game while you are working:
一般情况下，工作区只是一个组织不同资源的区域，你在制作游戏的时候工作区如下图所示:
In general, you can set the colour, font, size and style for each of the different options.
一般来说，您可以为每个不同的选项设置颜色、字体、大小和样式。

In most cases you can simply use the <a2><t3>os_is_paused</t3></a2> function to test this, but in some very specific cases (for example games on Chrome Apps) that function will not trigger, in which case you should use this function instead.<br4>
大多数情况，简单的使用 <a2><t3>os_is_paused</t3></a2> 测试焦点是否存在，但是一些特殊的情况（比如Chrome Apps 游戏）那个函数不会触发，这时使用本节所说的这个函数替之。<br4>
In most games you will want certain things to happen at certain moments in time.
在大部分游戏中，你可能希望一些事情在特定的时间里发生。
In order to use this functionality, you will need to have the Amazon API Extension installed.\nWould you like to download it now from the Marketplace?
为使用这个功能，你将需要安装 Amazon API 扩展。\n现在你想从市场上下载它吗？

为使用这个功能，你将需要安装 Google Play APK 扩展。\n现在你想从市场上下载它吗？
In order to use this functionality, you will need to have the Google Play Licensing Expansion Extension installed.\nWould you like to download it now from the Marketplace?
为使用这个功能，你将需要安装 Google Play Licensing 扩展。\n现在你想从市场上下载它吗？
In order to use this functionality, you will need to have the Google Play Services Extension installed.\nWould you like to download it now from the Marketplace?
为使用这个功能，你将需要安装 Google Play Services 扩展。\n现在你想从市场上下载它吗？

In physics, restitution is defined as "<i0>the return of an object or system to its original state after elastic deformation</i0>", but as the fixtures in the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> are really <b2>rigid bodies</b2> and cannot be deformed, restitution is really a way of saying how "bouncy" the fixture is.
在物理学中，恢复原则被定义为“<i0>弹性变形</i0>后物体或系统返回到原始状态”，但是由于<i1> GameMaker Studio 2 </i1>中的灯具真的是<b2>刚体</b2>，不能变形，恢复系数真的是一种说“弹性”的“弹性”的方式。

它主要是用来制作2D游戏的工具，虽然制作3D游戏也是可行的。有许多工具和编辑器能帮助实现你的游戏想法，将您的最终项目从同样的初始基础资源移植到多个平台上。

It's best to give each sprite a descriptive name so that you can identify at a glance whether a particular resource is a sprite or an object or anything else, and many people do this by prefixing or suffixing the resource with the letters "<i1>spr</i1>" - for example, "spr_Ball".
最好给每个精灵一个描述性的名字，这样你就可以一目了然地识别一个特定的资源是一个精灵还是一个物体或其他任何种类的资源，许多人通过给字符串 “<i1>spr</i1>” 加上前缀或后缀来做到这一点 - 例如“spr_Ball”。

It's important to note that when you use the <t0>@function</t0> identifier, then the script name that you give there will show in the IDE <i1>just the same as the script name in the resource tree</i1>.
请务必注意，当你使用<t0>@function</t0>标识符的时候，在IDE中是显示<i1>和资源树中一致的脚本名</i1>。
It's obviously harder to see here, but the overflows ripple along until there are no ones in a column - or 2 at which point an overflow bit makes 3 and it stays there.
这里看起来显然比较困难，但是会一直溢出，直到列中没有一个数 - 或者哪一位为 2，溢出导致 3，它就会停留在那里。

It's worth noting that all docked windows can be hidden/unhidden individually by clicking the button to the side of the docked items (highlighted in the image at the top of this page), or you can hide/unhide all docked items using the quickbutton <i0> at the top of the IDE, and note too that the IDE will remember docked windows between sessions.
值得注意的是，所有停靠的窗口可以通过点击停靠的窗口侧面的按钮（在上图中突出显示）单独隐藏/取消隐藏，或者您可以使用IDE的顶部的快捷键 <i0> 隐藏/取消隐藏所有停靠的窗口，并注意 IDE 会记住每个会话中的停靠窗口。
It's worth noting that an array <b0>always starts at 0</b0> and can <i1>never be negative</i1>!
需要注意的是数组编号 <b0>开始于0</b0> 并且 <i1>永远不能为负数</i1>。
It's worth noting that the <t0><filename></t0> in <t1>-output</t1> and <t2>-debugoutput</t2> can be the same one if desired, as the file is opened and closed on each write.
值得注意的是，如果需要，<t1>-output</t1> 和 <t2>-debugoutput</t2> 两个选项的 <t0><filename></t0> 参数可以是相同的，文件在每次写入时都会被打开并关闭（不需要担心文件句柄被占用的问题）。
Item '{0}' is locked, unlock to allow editing
项目 '{0}' 被锁定，解锁以允许编辑
Items '{0}' are locked, unlock to allow editing
项目 '{0}' 被锁定，解锁以允许编辑
It’s also worth noting, that computers can only add (or subtract, multiply or divide) 2 numbers at once, even SIMD is based on 2 calculations at once, but doing multiple calculations in parallel.
值得注意的是，计算机一次只能加（或减、乘、除）2 个数字，即使单指令多数据流同时基于 2 个计算，但并行执行多个计算。
JDK not installed correctly at location entered in Android Platform Settings
在Android平台设置中输入的位置未正确安装JDK
Jump to the instance's start position.
跳转到实例的起始位置。
Just below the colour picker we have our tools - these are the different drawing tools, including the brush, flood fill, masking and shape tools.
在颜色选择器下面是工具 - 这些是各种绘图工具，包括刷子，填充，遮罩和形状工具。
Just for information; this will always be locked for this platform
仅作为信息，在该平台下它会始终保持锁定。
Just like any other variable, it can be anything you want from simply "a" to "mymumscow".
和其他所有变量都一样，它可以是你所想的任何东西，比如"a"或者"mymumscow"。
Just like normal additions, we add numbers together and then we overflow into the next column, but unlike a normal decimal addition, we can only go to 1, not 9.
就像正常的加法，数字加起来然后溢出到下一列中，但是不同于普通的十进制加法，只会进到 1，没有 9。
Just like normal variables, you can pass arrays through to scripts to be used and then returned to the instance that called the script.
就像普通的变量，你也可以传递数组到脚本中，并返回到调用这个脚本的实例中。

Let's look at a typical object setup with events and code:
我们来看一个典型的对象设置，包括事件和代码：

Let's say we want a simple animation counter, counting from 0 to to 15 (as we have 16 frames of animation), now we can either do an increment, and then do an IF, or we can use our knowledge of binary and remove the IF completely.
假设我们需要一个简单的动画计数器，从 0 到 15(因为我们有 16 帧的动画)，现在我们可以做一个递增，然后做一个 IF 判断，或者我们可以使用我们的二进制知识并完全不需要 IF 语句。
Let's say we wanted to set bit 27, what number is that?
假设我们希望设置第 27 号位，那么数字将会是多少呢？
Let's take a quick look at how you do division, and why it's going to be so useful.
我们快速的看一下你是如何做除法的，以及为什么这很有用。
Let's take a simple number - 64 - and divide by 32:
我们取一组简单的数——64，然后除以 32
Let's take a slightly more complicated number as a further example: 23.
我们再看一个稍微更复杂的数字作为进一步的例子： 23。
Let's take some very simple examples first.
我们先来看一个非常简单的例子。

Most of the time they have a sprite associated with them so that you see them in the game rooms, but sometimes they are used as a "behind the scenes" controller to do things related to the user or for timing, etc...
大多数时候他们有一个与他们相关的精灵，以便您在游戏室看到他们，但有时候它们被用作“幕后”控制器来做与用户相关的事情或时间等...

tuv.seg: No matter what you select, you will then be prompted to choose a save location for the project and then it will be opened in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.
无论你选择什么， 然后提示选择保存项目的位置，并在 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中打开。
No new data since you last called cloud_synchronise
自从上次调用以来cloud_synchronise没有新的数据。
No rooms found - you need at least one room to run.
没有房间 - 至少需要一个房间来运行
Normal surfaces are quite easy to use, but there are a few basic rules to be followed when you use them:
表面使用很简单，但在使用的时候，也有几个应遵循的基本规则：

Normally most instances are visible but sometimes it is useful to have invisible ones - for example, you can use them for way-points to control a moving monster, or to keep track values and perform certain timed actions.
通常选择可见，但是有时不可见也是有用的。例如，可以使用点方式控制怪物移动，或者跟踪并进行一定的动作。
Normally used in conjunction with an argument array (<t1>argument[0...15]</t1>) to permit varying input arguments for a given script.
一般和参数数组（<t1>argument[0...15]</t1>）同用以允许对给定脚本输入数量可变的参数。

Normally you want it to be awake (ie: participating in the physics world) right from the start, but sometimes this can lead to certain instabilities and unwanted effects due to the abrupt start of the physics simulation.
通常你希望它从一开始就清醒（即：参与物理世界），但是由于物理模拟的突然启动，有时这可能会导致某些不稳定和不必要的影响。
Normally you would simply use the <i0>Step In</i0> button to do this, but you also have one for stepping over code and one for stepping out of the code.
通常你只需要用<i0>跳入</i0>按钮来做这件事，不过你还有另外两个选择，一个跳过代码和一个跳出代码。
Normally you would try and keep them no larger than the size of the view or display window.
通常不要超过视野或者显示窗口的大小。
Not expecting {0} {1} assigned in room {2} in instance {3}'s variable '{4}' (expected {5})
不期望在实例{3}的变量“{4}”（预期{5}）的房间{2}中分配{0} {1}
Not only can a child share code with its parent, but you can do checks and run code on parent objects and it will automatically include the child objects too, which saves a lot of time and energy.
孩子不仅可以与父母共享代码，而且可以在父对象上执行检查和运行代码，并且还会自动包含子对象，从而节省了大量的时间和精力。

Not only can you pass arguments into a script, but you can also ask a script to return a value too (using the <a0>Return</a0> <i1> action), so you can use them to (for example) build calculating methods or give back an instance ID after a complex collision detection or any number of things.
你不仅可以向脚本传递参数，你还可以要求脚本返回（Return）一个值（使用<a0>返回（Return）</a0>动作），因此你可以使用它们来（举个例子）构建一些计算方法或经过一系列复杂的碰撞检测之后反馈一个实例ID，又或者是其他的一些东西。
Note that a parent object doesn't have to have any events or code in it...
请注意，父对象不必在其中包含任何事件或代码...
Note that after changing any preferences from this window you need to click the <i3>Apply</i3> button for them to take effect.
请注意，从此窗口修改任何偏好设置你都需要点击<i3>应用（Apply）</i3>按钮来生效。

Note that although you appear to have two instances of the IDE running when you do this, they are both for the same project and you cannot have one project in one and another ion the other unless you specifically open two instances of <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>.
请注意，尽管在执行此操作时，您看似运行了两个 IDE 实例，但是它们都属于同一个项目，除非您专门打开了 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 中的两个实例，否则无法将其中一个项目与另一个项目分开。

Note that both the optional "type" and the obligatory "description" parts of <t0>@param</t0> are not displayed by default in the IDE code complete, and to see them you must activate the options in the <a1>GML Preferences</a1>.
注意，在<t0>@param</t0>中无论是可写可不写的"type"还是还是必须写的"description"，在IDE的代码补全当中默认是都不显示的，如果想查看它们你必须在<a1>GML 偏好设置(GML Preference)</a1>中激活相应选项。

Note that by default <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> will save your project automatically (depending on the <a1> Preferences</a1> that you have set) and this button is simply so you can force a save at any time.
请注意，默认情况下， <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 将自动保存您的项目（取决于您设置的 <a1> 首选项</a1>），此按钮可以使您随时强制保存。
Note that clicking the help button <i1> in the menu bar will also open the document, as will pressing <i2>.
注意，在菜单条中点击帮助按钮<i1>或按下<i2>键也可以打开帮助文档。
Note that created variables in <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> are all stored as double-precision floating point numbers, but you can use other formats when dealing with extensions.
请注意，在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中创建的变量都被存储为一个双精度浮点数，但是当使用扩展的时候你可以使用其他类型。

Note that currently <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> does not support "true" boolean values, and actually accepts any real number below 0.5 as a false value, and any real number equal to (or greater than) 0.5 as being true.
请注意，当前的<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>还不支持“真正的”布尔值，并且实际上是视所有低于0.5的实数为假（false），所有大于等于0.5的值为真（true）。
Note that downloading and installing a runtime can take a few minutes, but you can see a progress bar for the download at the top right of the IDE:
请注意，下载并安装运行环境需要几分钟，但是你可以在IDE的右上角看到一个进度条：
Note that if the game is in the foreground when the time for the notification comes, it will <i0>not</i0> be shown, but the asynchronous event <b1>will still trigger</b1>.
需要注意的是，如果推送时程序运行在前台，通知将 <i0>不会</i0> 被展示，但是异步推送事件 <b1>仍会触发</b1>。
Note that if you are running <i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> on a macOS system and are using a single button mouse, please use <i8> + <i9> to get a right mouse click <i10>.
请注意，如果你在macOS系统上运行<i7>GameMaker Studio 2</i7> ，并且使用单按钮鼠标，请 <i8> + <i9> 获取鼠标右键单击 <i10>。
Note that if you set the alpha value to 0, you will not see these icons.
请注意，如果将Alpha值设置为0，则不会看到这些图标。
Note that in these cases the username/password/proxy details will <i0>always</i0> be required, and that the proxy IP should also have the port added, ie: <t1>xx.xx.xx.xx:port</t1>.
注意，在这种情况下代理、用户名、密码 <i0>必须</i0> 填写，代理 IP 应该添加端口号，例如： <t1>xx.xx.xx.xx:port</t1>.

Note that installed tutorials and demos will have an additional icon <i0> which can be used to uninstall the project from your computer (this does <i1>not</i1> remove the tutorial or demo from your "Owned" list).
注意：安装教程和演示将有额外的图标 <i0> 可用于从您的计算机卸载该教程(它<i1>不会</i1>从你的 "已拥有" 列表里删除)。
Note that multiple case statements can be placed for the same statement.
注意，同一个语句前可以出现多个case。
Note that not all options will be available for all resources and it will depend on the resource type or the folder as to which ones you can use.
请注意，并非所有选项都可用于所有资源类型，你可以使用哪些选项取决于资源类型或是否为文件夹。
Note that on Window 8 and above, the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE will support pen devices too.
请注意，在Windows 8或更高版本中，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>还会支持触控笔设备。
Note that on Windows 8 and above, the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE will support pen devices too.
请注意，在Windows 8或更高的系统上，<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE还会支持触控笔设备。
Note that on the HTML5 target, this value is the height of the <i0>browser window</i0>, rather than the physical display size.
需要注意的是HTML5平台，这个值是 <i0>浏览器窗口</i0>的高度，而不是显示器的物理尺寸。
Note that on the HTML5 target, this value is the width of the <i0>browser window</i0>, rather than the physical display size.
需要注意的是HTML5平台，这个值返回的是 <i0>浏览器窗口</i0>的宽度，而不是显示器的物理尺寸。
Note that resource names are limited to using only letters, digits and the underscore symbol "_" in a name of a sprite (and any other resource) all resources must start with a letter, not a number.
请注意，对于资源名称仅限使用字母，数字和下划线符号“_”，所有资源必须以字母开头而不是数字开头。
Note that some of the tools are split diagonally and will draw either outlined or filled shapes depending on which side of the line you click on to select them
请注意，某些工具是延对角线分割的，您需要点击对角线的某一侧来选择工具绘制轮廓线或填充形状
Note that some of these are specific to the <b1>File Watcher</b1> background process.

Note that sounds take up a lot of space on disk, so you should be careful when creating them for your game projects.
请注意，声音在磁盘中会占用大量空间，所以在创建游戏项目时应该注意。
Note that tat the top left of the Resource Tree you have the <b5>Collapse All</b5> button <i6> which can be used to close all open resource folders.
请注意，资源树左上角有 <b5>全部折叠</b5> 按钮 <i6> ，可用于关闭所有已打开的资源文件夹。
Note that the <t0>runtime_version</t0> folder will depend on the runtimes you have installed currently.
注意 <t0>runtime_version</t0> 文件夹取决于你当前安装的运行时版本。
Note that the Step Event category has three sub-categories to "fine tune" timing within the instance, but in general you will use the main Step Event most.
请注意，“步事件”类别下有三个子类别可以在实例中“微调”时间，但是一般情况下，您最常使用的是主要步事件。
Note that the YYC option will require extra setup.
请注意，YYC选项需要额外安装。

Note that the YYC target may require extra tools to be installed for the platform selected, otherwise it will not work - you can find further information about this from the <a3>YoYo Games Help Center</a3> as well as on the individual target <a4>Preferences</a4> pages detailed in this manual.
请注意，YYC可能需要为所选择的平台安装额外的工具，否则将无法正常工作 - 您可以从 <a3>YoYo Games 帮助中心</a3> 以及本手册中详细列出的各个目标 <a4>参考</a4> 页面中找到更多信息。

Note that the right mouse button <i1> menu on the resources that are not in the default view is slightly different and has the following options: <i2> Most of the options are obvious but it should be clarified that <b3>Create</b3> will permit you to create a new resource anywhere within the custom view of the project (it will be added into the correct resource folder in the default view of the resource tree), and <b4>Add from default view</b4> will permit you to carry over a resource from the default resource tree into the custom view.
注意，不在默认视图中的资源其鼠标右键菜单 <i1> 略有不同，具有以下选项：<i2> 大多数选项都是显而易见的，但应该说明， <b3>创建</b3> 将允许您在项目的自定义视图中的任意位置创建新的资源（它将被添加到资源树的默认视图中的对应资源文件夹中），并 且<b4>从默认视图添加</b4> 选项将允许您将资源从默认资源树传输到自定义视图中。
Note that the section on events above simply gives an overview of how they work, but for full details on all the avaialble events, please see the following section:
请注意，上面的事件部分简要概述了它们的工作原理，但是有关所有可用事件的详细信息，请参阅以下部分：

请注意，还有一个部分叫做<b0>特定平台偏好设置（Platform Specific Preferences）</b0>被列举在手册的<a1>这个位置</a1>。
Note that there will also appear <b0>context specific</b0> menu options in the top menu bar, depending on the window that you have focused on currently.
请注意根据你目前焦点所在的窗口，顶部菜单栏还将出现 <b0>特定环境下的</b0>菜单选项。
Note that these are not mutually exclusive ways to make your games, and you can mix using GML with DnD™ as you wish, depending on your skill and requirements with either.

Note that this can also be set in the Global Game Settings and that it is <i1>only applicable Windows 7 and above</i1> - it will just use the default method if you have this option ticked and run on XP or Vista - and that it does <i2>not</i2> switch it on or off, for that you would use the function <a3><t4>display_reset()</t4></a3>.
注意，你也可以在全局游戏设定中设置并且<i1>只适用 Windows 7 或更高的系统</i1> - XP 或者 Vista 上，勾上这个选项也将使用默认的方法 - 并且它 <i2>不会</i2> 开启或关闭垂直同步，因为那个你将需要使用到函数 <a3><t4>display_reset()</t4></a3>。

请注意这个函数检查的是该物体是否出现在资源树中而非实际的游戏房间中。
Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Clean Cache</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.

Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Create Executable</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.
请注意这个命令和IDE中的 <b2>创建可执行文件</b2> 按钮 <i3> 效果是一致的。
Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Debug</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.

Note that this command is the same as pressing the <b2>Run</b2> button <i3> in the IDE.
请注意，这个命令和按下IDE的 <b2>运行</b2> 按钮 <i3> 效果是一样的。

Note that this does not report if v-sync is active or not (you can switch function <a2><t3>display_reset()</t3></a2>), and that you can set the v-sync method from the Global Game Settings or using the function <a4><t5>display_set_windows_alternate_sync()</t5></a4>.
注意这个函数并不是报告垂直同步是否激活（这个通过切换函数 <a2><t3>display_reset()</t3></a2>实现），你可以在全局游戏设定中或者或者使用函数 <a4><t5>display_set_windows_alternate_sync()</t5></a4>来设置垂直同步的方法。

Note that this is <i2>not</i2> the same as checking if two arrays are the same using ==, which will not check to see if the two arrays hold equivalent values, but only to see if the arrays are referencing the same initial array.
请注意，这并<i2>不</i2>与使用==来判断数组是否相同的方法完全一致，使用==判断的方法不会检测两个数组是否具有相同的值，而只会查看两个数组是否引用了同一个初始数组。
Note that this is a <i2>community run forum</i2>, so if you have a bug report or require technical assistance you should go to the Official Support Forums first (see above).
请注意，这是一个<i2>社区论坛</i2>，所以如果您有错误要报告或需要技术帮助，您应该到官方支持论坛（见上文）。
Note that this is not an exclusive DnD™ interface, and you can switch between DnD™ and GML code using the right mouse button <i5>.
请注意，这不是唯一的DND™访问接口，你可以切换 DnD™ 和 GML 代码，使用鼠标右键<i5>.
Note that this is not an exclusive GML interface, and you can switch between GML code and DnD™ using the right mouse button <i3>.
请注意，这不是唯一的GML访问接口，你可以切换 DnD™ 和 GML 代码，使用鼠标右键 <i3>.
Note that this is only the main, general, options for the current project, but you may also have platform specific options being listed as a part of the <a1>Resource Tree</a1>.
请注意，这只是当前项目的主要以及一般选项，其他平台特定选项作为 <a1>资源树</a1> 的一部分列出。
Note that this may affect the games performance and that not all information is available in real time.
不过要注意这样也许会影响游戏表现，而且并不是所有的信息都会实时有效。

Note that this value may vary a lot during a session, but when you close your game, the compiler output window within <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> will show you the minimum and maximum as well as the average values for this (note that the minimum value <i3>can</i3> be negative!
请注意，该值在会话期间可能有很大的变化，但是当您关闭游戏时，<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 中的编译器输出窗口将显示最小值和最大值以及平均值（请注意，最小值 <i3>可以</i3> 为负数！
Note that this will only restore the defaults for the section currently being edited.
请注意，这只会恢复当前正在编辑的部分。
Note that to compile for iOS <b2>you will require an Apple Mac computer running OSX or higher</b2> as well as the relevant certificates and permissions.
请注意，为了编译 iOS，<b2>您将需要运行 OSX 或更高版本的 Mac 计算机以及具备相关证书和权限</b2>。

Note that using <b6>Delete</b6> <i7>does not delete the resource from the project</i7> and it will still be visible in the default resource tree, which is the view you should be using if you wish to remove the resource completely and not just from the view.
请注意，使用 <b6>删除</b6> <i7>不会从项目中删除资源</i7>，并且仍将在默认资源树中显示该资源，如果您希望完全删除资源，而不仅仅是从视图中删除资源，则该视图应该是您所使用的视图。
Note that we assign the value <t0><b1>argument0</b1></t0> to a temporary variable at the start.
请注意，在开始的时候我们将值<t0><b1>argument0</b1></t0>赋给一个临时变量（Temporay Variable）

Note that we say "based on" because you don't actually place objects directly into the game room, but rather you place <b0>instances</b0> of these objects, which are basically copies (or clones if you prefer) of the object resource.
请注意，我们说‘基于’是因为您并不能直接把物体放置在房间中，而是将这些对象的 <b0>实例</b0> （相当于对象资源的副本或拷贝）放置入其中。
Note that when a reference to the search term is found, it will be opened in the current workspace and zoomed/panned to.
请注意，当找到对应搜索项时，它将在当前工作空间中打开并放大/平移到聚焦位置。

Note that when holding these buttons, you simply have to <i16>move</i16> the mouse - not click nor drag, just move - and that if there is a general shortcut that normally requires the use of the <i17> or <i18> keys, you would use the <i19>Right</i19> keys of the keyboard instead.
请注意，当按住这些键位的时候，你只需要<i16>移动</i16>鼠标即可——不需要点击也不需要拖拽——并且如果有一个常规的快捷键通常要求是哟个<i17>或<i18>键的时候，你可以改用键盘上的<i19>右边</i19>的相应键位。

Note that when holding these buttons, you simply have to <i19>move</i19> the mouse - not click nor drag, just move - and that if there is a general shortcut that normally requires the use of the <i20>/<i21> or <i22> keys, you would use the <i23>Right</i23> keys of the keyboard instead.
请注意，当按住这些按钮时，你只需要 <i19>移动</i19> 鼠标 - 不是点击或拖拽，仅仅是移动 - 如果有一个需要使用含有 <i20> /<i21> 或 <i22> 的快捷键，你需要使用<i23>右</i23> 边的按键来实现。

Note that when using DnD™ or GML code you can also select an action or a function (or keyword or whatever) and then press <i0> or click the middle mouse button <i1> to open the manual on the relevant page.
请注意，当使用DnD™按钮或GML代码，你也可以选择一个动作或一个函数（再或者是一个关键字或者是别的什么东西），然后按下<i0>或者点击鼠标中键<i1>来在本帮助手册中打开相关页面。
Note that when you use the Debug Module, you can also add <b0>Breakpoints</b0> to your code or DnD™.
请注意，当您使用调试模块时，您还可以添加 <b0>断点</b0> 到您的代码或 DnD™。
Note that while the resource tree is docked to the IDE by default, you can take it out and into its own window by clicking <i4> on the "Resources" text at the top and dragging.
请注意，默认情况下，资源树停靠在IDE中，您可以通过点击 <i4> 顶部的“资源”文本并将其拖放到系统桌面中。

Note that while working through a tutorial you can save the project at any time and close the IDE or even change projects without worrying about losing your place, since tutorials will store the page and section that you are currently working through every time you save the project.
请注意，使用一个教程进行创作时，你可以随时保存工程并关闭IDE甚至改变工程，而无需担心失去你的当前位置，因为教程会保存该页面和你每次保存时正在创作的部分。
Note that you are free to distribute the games you create with <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> in any way you like, including selling them.
请注意，您可以随意使用 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 以任何您喜欢的方式分发您创建的游戏，包括销售。
Note that you can also use the keyboard shortcut <i1>/<i2> + <t3>T</t3> to open the Goto window.
请注意，您也可以使用键盘快捷键 <i1>/<i2> + <t3>T</t3> 打开 Go to 窗口。
Note that you can place the origin anywhere you wish by simply clicking <i3> on the preview image, and you can also manually input the origin position by adding values into the x/y fields at the top.
请注意，您只需单击预览图像即可将原点放置在所点击 <i3> 的位置，也可以通过在顶部的x / y字段中添加值来手动设置原点位置。
Note that you can set the detection mode for the bounding box to be either automatic (the default value) or manual.
请注意，您可以将边界框的检测模式设置为自动（默认值）或手动。

现在，思维敏锐的你可能已经察觉到，我们在此处两种方法都使用了（这也是常有的情况），但是，它仍然只是一组指令。

Now, this can be done by simply creating an array of positions within the room and then having the instance move between them, but that can be a chore to set up and is difficult to change, test and adapt for different things.
你可以先简单地在房间中创建一些简单的位置排列，接着让实例在他们之间移动。但这个工作很繁重而且不好修改，测试和适配。

Now, we could create a shortcut to the runner like we did for the exe, and then change the parameters as necessary, but that means having to open and edit it between tests, which defeats the purpose of our using this functionality for side-by-side testing.
现在，我们可以仿照上述对 exe 操作中那样为 runner 创建一个快捷方式，然后根据需要更改参数，但这意味着必须在测试之间打开并编辑它，这就违背了我们将此功能用于并行测试的目的。

Now, we say "based on" because you don't actually place objects directly into the game rooms, but rather you place <b0>instances</b0> of these objects which are basically copies (or clones if you prefer) of the object resource.
现在,我们说“基于”因为你没物体直接进入游戏房间,而是你把< b0 > < / b0 >的这些物体实例基本上是副本(或如果你喜欢克隆)物体的资源。
Now, when calling this script in code anywhere, you will get auto-complete and argument help etc...
现在，在其他任意位置的代码中调用该脚本的时候，就会有自动补全以及参数提示等信息了。
Now, when you place these instances in a room they will all behave the same, but look different, since they will "inherit" the events of the parent.
现在，当你把这些实例放在一个房间里时，它们都会表现得相同，但是看起来是不同的，因为他们会“继承”父项的事件。
Now, when you run your game in debug mode it will pause at the point (or points) that you have defined.
现在，当你在调试模块中运行游戏的时候，它就会暂停在你定下的断点（们）上了。

Now, you can check a lot of these things yourself by adding in so-called "debug code" to your games to display on the screen the information you require, or you can have it that it shows messages when there is an error, but this is often a lot of work and if you aren't sure where the problem is in the first place then it can be a time consuming case of trial and error to track down your bug.
现在，您可以通过在游戏中添加所谓的“调试代码”，来在屏幕上显示所需的信息，或者您可以使它在出现错误时显示消息，这样可以自己检查这些信息，但是这通常会带来大量的工作，如果您不确定问题在哪里，那么您可能在尝试和错误的追踪错误上耗费大量时间。
Now, you can try to achieve this by using the <i0>Alarm Events</i0> in an instance, but when things get too complicated this won't work any more, especially as you are limited to only twelve alarms.
您可以通过在实例中使用 <i0>闹钟事件</i0> 来实现该目的，但是当事情很复杂的时候，闹钟事件就不太适用了，特别是闹钟事件的设置上限为12个。
Now, you can try to achieve this by using the alarm events but when things get too complicated this won't work any more, especially as you are limited to only twelve alarms.
通常，你可以使用定时事件来完成这件事，但是当你的要完成的事情过于复杂的时候这根本行不通，特别是你只有12个定时器可以用。

Now, you want the player to die if he touches any of these four objects and this would normally entail four different collision events with four different sets of actions or code, one for each of the enemy objects.
现在，如果他触摸到这四个对象中的任何一个，你想要玩家死亡，这通常会导致四个不同的碰撞事件与四个不同的动作或代码集合，一个对于每个敌对象。

tu.note: 默认的翻译是数论，然而此处是解释二进制运算的逻辑，用纯数学专业术语，一般的开发者还需要二次查找才会了解“数论”的含义，此处推荐直接翻译“数字理论”。

tuv.seg: 物体编辑器的手势事件
对象编辑器物理形状编辑器
对象编辑器物理形状类型
物体编辑器的偏好设置
Object double click opens all object events
双击物体打开所有物体的事件
Object has been released too many times
Objects are a special resource that we use to control aspects of a game and to do specific things.
物体是一个用来控制游戏各方面的具体事件的特殊资源。
Objects are in a very real sense the building blocks of your game, and together with rooms will form the core of any project that you create.<br6>
物体实际上是游戏的构建模块，它与房间一起构成了所有游戏项目的核心。<br6>
Objects are the resource that we use to control aspects of a game and to do specific things.
物体是一个用来控制游戏各方面的具体事件的特殊资源。
Obviously when making a game, it is very important that you know when two (or more) instances of an object have collided, and for that we have the collision event.
显然，在制作游戏时，知道物体的两个（或多个）实例是否发生碰撞以及触发碰撞事件是非常重要的。

Obviously you can't create a cycle of "parent 1 is child of parent 2 is child of parent 1" but you can create what is called "object hierarchy" where "parent1 is child of parent2 is child of parent3".
显然，你不能创建一个循环“父1是父2的孩子是父1的子”，但是您可以创建一个所谓的“对象层次结构”，其中“parent1是parent2的子代是parent3的子代”。

Of course, this assumes that the sprites, images, and sounds you used to make it can be distributed or sold as well and that you have the legal rights to all assets, and it also assumes that the game complies with the YoYo Games EULA for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>.
当然，这代表您使用的精灵，图像和声音也可以分发或销售，并且您拥有所有资源的合法权利，并且该游戏也符合 YoYo Games EULA for <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>。
Okay, we can use an array for those things mentioned above, but what is an array?
好了，我们可以用数组做到上面提到的那些事情，那么数组究竟是啥呢？
Okay... so actually this would be bit 26 the way I've been describing things so far (as bits have been starting at one), but actually... bits start at bit 0, and go upwards, not at bit 1.
好吧……因此实际上以我目前所描述的方法（我是假装位是从 1 开始的）会设置 26 号位，但实际上是从 0 号位开始的并向上递增的，而非 1 号位。
On all operating systems you can use the touch screen to click and drag items in the main workspace, and we support 2 simultaneous pointers, where a second tap will perform a right-click.
在所有操作系统上你都可以使用触控屏点击或拖拽项目到主工作区里，并且我们支持两个同时存在的触控来表示右键。

On mobile devices, normally only one application can be active in the foreground at any time, but many games and applications operate in a time-based or interconnected environment where events of interest to users can occur when the application is <i0>not</i0> in the foreground.
在移动设备上,通常只有一个应用程序可以在任何时候活跃在前台,但是许多的游戏和应用程序需要基于时间或者其他特定的用户行为来触发事件， 并且<i0>不需要</i0>活跃在前台。
On the left above is the parent object with 5 events in it, and on the right you can see the "child" object.
在左上方是其中有5个事件的父对象，右边可以看到“child”对象。
On the left of the start page you can see a list of previous projects that you can open.
在起始页的左侧你可以看见你所能打开的过去的项目。
On the left we have four separate collision events and on the right we have a single collision event, as we have created a "parent" object and assigned all the enemy objects to it.
在左边，我们有四个单独的碰撞事件，右边我们有一个碰撞事件，因为我们创建了一个“父”对象，并分配了所有的敌方对象。
On the right of the screen you can find the resource tree.
在屏幕右侧，您可以找到资源树。
Once a Runtime Feed has been created it will be listed in this section as a sub-category, and you should always have at least one feed listed (by default this would be the Master feed).
一旦创建了一个运行库下载源，它将作为子类别在这个部分列出，你应该始终至少列出一个下载源（默认是主下载源）。
Once a device has been found or added, it will then be shown in this window, like in this example image for Android:
一旦找到或添加了一个设备，它将在此窗口中显示，就如下图示例的 Android 设备：

Once a tutorial or demo has been installed, it's simply a case of clicking on it to open it and you will be prompted to provide a location to save the tutorial project to before the IDE opens for you to begin.
一旦教程或演示项目已经安装，你可以点击打开它，选择保存位置，之后在IDE中打开这个教程。
Once an audio file has been assigned to a group you can then use the specific audio group functions to change them and lo load/unload them from memory.
一旦音频文件被分到了一组，你就可以使用特定的音频组函数改变它们或从内存中加载/卸载它们。
Once bought you will be able to compile projects to <i2>one</i2> of the following targets:
只要购买你就可以编译项目到下列目标平台 <i2>之一</i2> ：
Once imported and added as a resource, you can then set it for drawing using the appropriate code or actions.
导入并添加为字体资源后，您就可以使用代码或其他操作将其变为绘图了。
Once installed and the first time you run <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>, you may be prompted to update before being able to use the product.
一经安装后首次运行<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>，你可能会在使用产品前被提示升级。
Once registered and logged in, the main <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> IDE will open on the <b4>Start Page</b4>:
一旦注册，登录，<i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> IDE 主界面将打开<b4>起始页（Start Page）</b4>：
Once selected the sprite you can change a few other properties like whether it should be visible or not - for example - or what kind of collision mask it should have.
一旦选择了精灵，你可以改变一些其他属性，比如它是否可见 ， 或者它应该具有什么形状的碰撞盒。
Once that is done, you can assign this time line to the guard and the guard will do exactly what you planned.
完成后，你就可以把这个时间轴绑定在你的守卫上，然后这个守卫就会完全按照你计划中的那样行动了。
Once the Preferences window is open you will have the following different options:
一旦偏好设置窗口打开，你会有如下的各种选项：
Once the keyboard is hidden, a System event of type "keyboard status" is raised.
隐藏键盘后，会引发类型为“键盘状态”的系统事件。
Once the keyboard is shown, a System event of type "keyboard status" is raised.
显示键盘后，将引发类型为“键盘状态”的系统事件。
Once the tutorial or demo is in the "Owned" section, you can mouse over it and either install it or view the information on it from the Marketplace:
一旦教程出现在 "已拥有（Owned）" 部分，当鼠标在某个教程之上时，会显示它的信息说明。
Once you are a registered developer for the choosen platform, please contact the Helpdesk via your <a2>YoYo Account</a2> and request access to the appropriate documentation.
一旦你注册成为所选平台的开发者，请使用您的 <a2>YoYo Account</a2> 账户登录 Helpdesk 获取相关文档.
Once you are done you reset the drawing target so that all further drawing happens on the screen again.
一旦完成，重置绘制目标，再让进一步的绘制发生在屏幕上。

Once you create a time line you can then assign it to an object, and the instance of that object will then execute the actions and code at the indicated moments of time when placed or created within a room.<br1>
创建时间线后，您可以将其分配给某个物体，然后该物体的实例将在所放置或者创建的房间在指定时刻执行操作以及代码。<br1>
Once you create a time line you can then assign it to an object, and the instance of that object will then execute the actions at the indicated moments of time when placed or created within a room.
当你创建了一个时间轴以后，你可以绑定在一个物体上，然后这个物体的实例就会在你指定的特定时间点上执行这些动作。
Once you have added the event and chosen the object to check for you can add code or DnD™ to resolve the collision.
一旦添加该事件并选择物体来进行碰撞检查就可以添加代码或 DnD™ 来定义碰撞发生后触发的行为。
Once you have added the relevant information, click on <b0>Okay</b0> and log in to <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> as normal.
一旦你添加了相关信息，就可以点击 <b0>确定</b0> 并且登陆 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>。

Once you have created your executable asset package you can then give the file to other people or place it on your website to download, or upload these files to the different hosting services for individual distribution or even to online stores (like Google Play, iTunes or the MS Store) for general distribution and retail.
创建可执行资源包后，您可以将该文件发送给其他人或将其放置在您的网站上进行下载，或将这些文件上传到不同的托管服务平台以进行个人发行，甚至上传到网上商店（如Google Play，iTunes或微软商店）进行分销和零售。
Once you have done that you can simply click the <b2>Create Executable</b2> button <i3> in the IDE to start the compiler build or select <b4>Create Executable</b4> from the <a5>Build Menu</a5>.
完成后，您可以简单地单击 IDE 中的<b2>创建可执行文件</b2>按钮 <i3>，以启动编译器构建，或从 <a5>构建菜单</a5> 中选择 <b4>创建可执行文件</b4>。

Once you have done that, the new file and password will be automatically added into the form fields listed above and you can click on the <b2>Check</b2> button to test that the certificate has been generated correctly.
一旦做完，新文件和密码将会自动添加上面列表的窗口字段中，然后你可以点击 <b2>检测（Check）</b2> 按钮测试是否已经正确的生成证书。
Once you have done this, the necessary files will be generated so that you can distribute it as you wish.
点击确定后会生成目标程序，就可以如你所愿地发布了。
Once you have downloaded and installed GameMaker Studio 2, the first time you use it you will be requested to input your licence details:
一旦你下载并安装了GameMaker Studio 2，首次使用你会被要求输入你的许可信息：
Once you have given a name to the project and a location to save it, you will be taken to a new, blank, <a2>workspace</a2> to start working on it.
一旦您已经给定了项目的名字及存储位置，您就会被带到一个新的、空白的 <a2>工作区（Workspace）</a2> 来开始创作。
Once you have loaded your file you can preview the sound by using the play button which will loop it continuously.
加载好文件后可以使用播放按钮预览音乐，这将循环播放音乐。
Once you have made your shortcut you can then use any of the following parameters in the target path:
一旦你成功创建了快捷方式，你就可以在目标路径中使用以下任何一个参数：
Once you have selected one and loaded it in, you can then preview it using the playback controls shown as well as change certain attributes for how the file should be exported.
一旦你选择了文件并加载，你就可以使用显示中的播放控件预览它，并改变文件的某些属性例如应该如何导出等。
Once you have selected your data-type, the variable will then show the entries in the structure simply by clicking the small "+" next to its name.
选择好了你的数据类型以后，点击它名字旁边的小"+"来让变量显示整个的结构。
Once you have selected your event, the <a2>code window</a2> will be chained to it and open up on the right.
选择您的活动后，<a2>代码窗口</a2>将被链接到右侧并打开。
Once you have set up your shape, you then need to define the basic physical properties that your object is to have.
一旦你设置了你的形状，你需要定义你的对象的基本物理属性。
Once you have that done, you need to create a <i0>Shortcut</i0> to the game on the desktop.
安装完毕后，你需要在桌面上创建一个游戏的 <i0>快捷方式</i0>。

Once you have your images it's simply a question of assigning them to objects in the <b5>Object Editor</b5>, adding some code or DnD™ actions, and then placing instances of these objects into a game room in the <b6>Room Editor</b6>.
有了图片之后，在 <b5>物体编辑器</b5>绑定到物体上就是简单的问题了，添加一些代码或 DnD™ 动作，然后将物体的实例放进 <b6>房间编辑器</b6>的游戏房间里。
Once you select a resource you can also click <i2> on the Edit Sprite <i3> or Edit Image <i4> buttons to edit either the image itself or the sprite resource.
一旦你选择一个资源，你也可以点击 <i2> 编辑精灵 <i3> 或编辑图像 <i4> 按钮来编辑图像本身或精灵资源。

Once you select the desired runtime to use, the details will be shown in the section and when you click <i0>Apply</i0> you will be prompted to clsoe and restart the IDE so that the new runtime can be initialised.
一直你选择所需使用的运行库后，在这部分你将看到详细信息，当你点击<i0>应用</i0>你将被提示关闭并重启IDE，以便初始化新的运行库。
Once you've got to grips with the basics you can then move on to the more in-depth look at the components of <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> in the <a3>Interface</a3> section below.
一旦你掌握了基本的知识，你便可以再深入看看 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>的各个元件，它们 在下面的 <a3>界面</a3>部分。
One final thing we'll mention here is that the IDE for <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> also has minimal support for touch screens.
最后我们这里要说的就是<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>的IDE还有一些对于触控屏的支持。
One of the resources in the <b0>Resource Tree</b0> is the <b1>Script</b1> resource.
<b0>资源树</b0>中有一种资源叫做<b1>脚本（Script）</b1>
One or more files are locked.
一个或多个文件被锁定。
One or more files may be locked.
一个或多个文件可能被锁定。
One or more included files has an invalid filename, should only contain a-z, A_Z, 0-9, _ or .\nSee the output panel for a list.
一个或多个内含文件（included files ）包含无效的文件名，应该只能包含 a-z、 A_Z、 0-9， 或者“_ ”。\n查看输出面板中获取列表。
One or more of the files that you tried to import is not supported in this editor.
此编辑器不支持您尝试导入的一个或多个文件。
Only support Android Devices with a GPU
Only support Android devices with a GPU
Only that single instance is being affected while all the rest are not.
只有那一个单一的实例受到影响，而其余的都不受影响。
在资源管理器中打开日志

双击精灵资源打开图片编辑器

当双击精灵资源节点时打开图像编辑器。

打开实例创建顺序（Instance Creation Order）窗口
Open the tutorial instead of adding a datafile?
打开教程而不是添加一个数据文件？

打开前往（Goto）窗口来检索工作区

Optimise the executable and add to the Global Assembly Cache.
优化可执行文件并添加到全局程序集缓存（Global Assembly Cache）。
Optimising executable... this may take some time
优化可执行文件...这可能需要一些时间
Or say you work in a team and you want to have an "Artists View", so you create a cut down resource tree that only shows the sprites, instances and rooms.
或者你在一个团队工作，你想要创建一个“艺术家视图”，那么你可以创建一个资源树，只显示精灵，实例和房间。

tuv.seg: Other than that, you are also constrained as to the resources that are available:
此外，在可用的资源上，你也会受限。
Other than those methods of input, there is also limited support for pen devices, and also a special mode for those people working on projects using a laptop.
除了这些输入方式以外，还有一些是对于触控笔设备的有限支持，并且也是一个专门给那些使用平板或笔记本电脑工作的人的模式。
Other than those resource limits, there are a few other elements missing from the IDE:

Please note that to start drawing to a surface you must first have called the function <a0><t1>surface_set_target</t1></a0> and then this one after you have finished, <i2>for each surface target that you have set</i2> or else nothing will be drawn on the screen as all further drawing (even in other instances) will be done on the surface.

Say you have a "player" object and four different "enemy" objects.
说你有一个“玩家”对象和四个不同的“敌人”对象。

假设你有一个关卡，里面有几三门，每扇门都有一把钥匙。

假如你想在随机的位置产生四个不同的怪物。

Say you want two monsters: one that moves up and down, while another that moves left and right, but you also want the two of them to have the same health, shoot at the player and hurt the player if they collide with them.
假设你想要两个怪物：一个上下移动，另一个是左右移动，但是你也希望他们中的两个人具有相同的健康，在玩家身上射击，并且如果与他们碰撞，伤害到玩家。
Scripts are exactly the same, with the only difference being that <i0>you</i0> write them.
脚本也是如此，唯一的区别就是它们是由<i0>你</i0>所编写的。
Scripts are simply blocks of code or DnD™ actions that are executed as if they were one of the built in <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> functions or actions.
脚本就是一段代码或者拖拽按钮（DnD™）动作，它们可以像<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>的内置函数或动作那样被执行。
Scripts can also return a value, so that they can be used in expressions.
脚本也可以返回值，所以可以在表达式中使用。
Scrolling in laptop mode behaves just like panning, so it should be intuitive and precise enough so that you don't need to use the scrollbar.

因为 16 帧是 2 的平方数，并且计数器中包含 0，所以我们可以将 2 的次方数减 1 作为掩码使用，这样我们就可以用它来包装计数器。
Since arrays are numbered consecutively, this means you can loop through them to perform extra actions too, like we did to initialize it:

Since this can be quite a complex concept to grasp and then apply to real-world programming situations, you can find below a series of short examples that could be applied to any game made with <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.
由于这是一个相当复杂且需要掌握的概念，你应该学会应用到实际的编程环境中，你可以在下面找到一些简短的例子，这些例子可以应用到任何使用 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 制作的游戏中。
Since this is essentially a mini-tutorial to get you started, we've split it into sections which you can get to from the following links:
由于这是引导你入门的迷你教程，我们已经将它分割成如下几个小节：

Single colour simply sets the background to the colour of your choice (using the <b3>Colour 1</b3> setting, as explained below) while block pattern is the default setting (which can also be edited using the rest of the dialogue options shown below).
单色模式会单纯地把背景设置为你所选的颜色（使用<b3>颜色 1（Colour 1）</b3>设定，下文会提到），而默认选项是方块图案（它还可以通过下文所示的其余对话框选项进行修改）。
Sit back, relax, and let us introduce you to some of our cool {0}'New Features'{1}

So - OR (|), AND(&), NOT(~) and EOR(^) let us manipulate bits with relative ease, allowing us, at the simplest level, to control multiple bits at once.
所以 - 或 (|)、 与(&)、 非(~) 以及异或(^) 让我们可以相对容易的操作位运算，允许我们在一个最简单的层面上一次性同时控制多个位。
So actually not that complex really.
所以其实没有那么复杂，真的。
So adding a 1+1 means we overflow into 10.
所以 1 + 1 意味着溢出到 10。
So bit 2 = 2, bit 3 = 4, bit 4 = 8 and so on (as shown below in this <i2>byte</i2> table - a byte being a collection of 8 bits):
所以 2 号位 = 2，3 号位 = 4，4 号位 = 8 等等（如下所示，在这个 <i2>字节</i2>表中 - 一个字节是 8 位的集合）：
So even if bit 1 was already set, the operation still works and bit 3 will now also be set.<br0>
所以，当 1 号位已经被设置的时候，该操作对 3 号位依然有效并且也会同样被设置.<br0>
So for only 2xAA, this will report 2, for 2x and 4x availability it will report 6.
所以只支持 2xAA（2倍的AA）会输出2，对于 2x 和 4x（2倍或4倍） 的可用性将输出6。
那么 16 倍或 128 倍呢？

tu.note: 待校正

tuv.seg: So if had a value of 1000111011 and I wanted to clear bits 1 and 3 using the mask above, I would end up with this...
再比如我们有一个值 “1000111011”，我们想要清理位 1 和位 3，使用上面的掩码，我将用这个结束这个操作：
So if we had the number 51 (110011) what does this do?
如果参数 0 为 51(110011)，这条语句的作用是什么？
So if you can pack all yours flags down into a single memory access, this is good!
所以如果你能把你所有的标记都打包成单一的内存通道，那是极好的！
So if you click this on the default view, for example, then an exact copy will be made for you to then edit.
因此，如果您在默认视图中单击此选项，那么它将会为您准备一个精确复制的副本，然后基于此进行编辑。
So let's look at a more complex example.
让我们来看一个更复杂的例子。
So let's look at the most basic binary theory first - how numbers are created.
所以，我们先看一下最基础的二进制理论 - 数字是怎样创建的。
So let's say Bit 27 is an active flag, and bit 0 is an exploding flag.
那么假设 27 号位是一个激活标志，0 号位是一个爆炸标志。
So the above should be written as either this:
所以，上面的应该这样写：
So there you shift the single bit <i0>down</i0> by 5 (which is the number of shifts required for 32 – look above), which gives us 2.
所以，这里你应该向 <i0>低阶</i0> 移动 5 位（这也是要得到 32 时需要移动的位数——见上文），最终我们会得到 2。
So they'll do each calculation in blocks of 2.<br1>
所以它们将分两次进行分别计算。<br1>
So this happily lets us set and clear any bits we'd like, and it also lets us compress out data structures massively.
所以，这让我们很方便地设置并清空我们需要的任意位，并且它也可以让我们很大幅度地压缩数据结构。
So to avoid any issues you are best not to call multiple functions in the arguments of a function call as you may well be building in a reliance on the order of evaluation.

因此为了避免可能发生的任何问题，你最好不要在参数里调用大量的函数。So to avoid any issues you are best not to call multiple functions in the arguments of a function call as you may well be building in a reliance on the order of evaluation.
So use this functionality with care!
所以请谨慎使用此功能 ！

Surfaces are <i0>volatile</i0> meaning that they could be removed from memory at any time due to OS memory management and other things, so here we check to see if our surface exists and if it doesn't we create it and assign it to the view 0.
表面是 <i0>不稳定的</i0>，意味着系统内存的管理或其它原因，它们可能会从内存中销毁，所以这里检测表面是否存在，如不存在则创建它，并指定给一个视野。

Surfaces are always held in texture memory which means that they can be destroyed from one moment to the next (for example, when a screensaver starts on windows, or when minimised on an Android device), so you should always check that a surface exists before doing anything with it (this includes drawing it to the screen).
表面一直保存在显存里，这意味着从这一刻到另一刻（比如，电脑启动屏幕时，或者安卓设备最小化时），它可能会被破坏，所以在做与表面图层相关的操作之前，你一直都需要检测是否存在一个表面层（包括向屏幕绘制表面时）。
Surfaces take up space in memory and so need to be removed, normally at the end of a room, but it can be done at any time depending on the use you put them to.
表面图层会占据内存空间，通常需要在房间结束工作时清除它们，可以在任何时间执行这个过程，取决于你使用的方式。

Textures (sprites and backgrounds) are stored on texture pages, and if you have a lot of image assets in your game, then <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> has to swap between texture pages to draw them all, therefore if this value is high (over 20, for example) you really should look into ways to optimise this as it will affect the performance of your game, especially on mobile platforms.
纹理（精灵和背景）存储在纹理页面上，如果您的游戏中有很多图像资源，那么 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 必须在纹理页面之间进行交换以将其全部绘制，因此如果该值很高（例如超过20），那么您真的需要研究如何优化它，因为该值过高会影响您的游戏性能，特别是在移动端。
