<b0>网格设置（Grid Settings）</b0> 偏好设置用来更改网格覆盖的工作方式，有下面可用的选项：
The <b0>Image Editor Preferences</b0> are used to define how the sprite and <a1>image editor</a1> windows look and feel.
<b0>图像编辑器偏好设置（Image Editor Preferences）</b0>被用于定义精灵和 <a1>图像编辑器（Image Editor）</a1>窗口的外观和感受。
The <b0>Language Preferences</b0> are used to define how some of the language features for programming will be displayed in the IDE of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> .
<b0>语言偏好设置</b0>被用于定义编程时的一些语言特性将会被如何显示在 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的 IDE 中。
The <b0>Marketplace Preferences</b0> are used to set up the Marketplace Certificate for uploading or buying assets.
The <b0>市场偏好设置（Marketplace Preferences）</b0>可以建立在市场上用于上传或购买资源的市场证书（Marketplace Certificate）。
The <b0>Master</b0> Runtime Feed preferences are used to select, install and un-install the different runtime tools (this page will be the same too for any further runtime feeds that you have added).
<b0>主</b0>运行库下载源偏好设置用于选择、安装或者卸载不同的运行库工具（此页对于你添加的任何其它的运行库下载源也都是一样的）。
The <b0>Object Editor Preferences</b0> are used to define certain properties for the <a1>object editor</a1> window.
<b0>物体编辑器偏好设置</b0> 用于定义 <a1>物体编辑器</a1> 窗口的特定属性。
The <b0>Plugins Preferences</b0> are used to control any extra plugins that have been added to the <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE.
<b0>插件偏好设置</b0>用于控制已经添加到<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> IDE的任何额外的插件。

The <b0>Preferences Window</b0> is an essential part of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>, as it is where you can set up and customise your experience using the IDE as well as set up any specific platform SDK's etc...
<b0>偏好设定窗口</b0> 是 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>的一个重要的组成部分，因为在这里你能够设置并自定义你的IDE使用体验还可以设置任意平台的SDK等……

tu.note: 此处翻译待斟酌。

tuv.seg: The <b0>Resource Tree Preferences</b0> are used to define certain properties for how the resource tree and it's elements function.
<b0>资源树偏好设置</b0>用于为资源树和它的元件定义某些属性。
The <b0>Resource Tree Preferences</b0> are used to define certain properties for how the resource tree and its elements function.
<b0>资源树首选项</b0> 用于设置资源树及其元素功能的某些属性。
The <b0>Room Editor Preferences</b0> are used to define how the <a1>room editor</a1> will look and behave.
<b0>房间编辑器偏好设置</b0>用于定义<a1>房间编辑器</a1>的外观和感受。
The <b0>Runtime Feeds Preferences</b0> are used to display and change the currently installed runtimes as well as the runtime in current use.
<b0>运行库下载源偏好设置</b0>用来显示或更改当前已安装的运行库，也包括当前正在使用的运行库。

The <b0>Spline Editor</b0> Preferences are used primarily to define how the <a1>path editor</a1> looks and feels, although they will affect certain other aspects of the IDE (like the physics shape editor).
<b0>样条曲线编辑器</b0>偏好设置主要用来定义<a1>路径编辑器</a1>的外观和感受，尽管也将会影响IDE的特定的其它方面（比如物理形状编辑器）。
The <b0>Sprite Editor</b0> Preferences are used to define how the <a1>Tile Set Editor</a1> looks and functions.
<b0>精灵编辑器</b0> 首选项用于定义 <a1>图块集编辑器</a1> 的外观和功能。
The <b0>Sprite Editor</b0> Preferences are used to define how the <a1>sprite editor</a1> looks and functions.
<b0>精灵编辑器</b0> 偏好设置用来定义<a1>精灵编辑器</a1>的外观和功能。
The <b0>Text Editors Preferences</b0> are used to define how the different <a1>code/script editors</a1> look and feel.
<b0>文本编辑器偏好设置</b0>用来定义不同的<a1>代码/脚本编辑器</a1>的外观和感受。
The <b0>Timelines Preferences</b0> are used to define certain properties for when you are working with the <a1>timeline editor</a1>.
<b0>时间轴首选项</b0> 用于设置使用 <a1>时间轴编辑器</a1> 时的某些属性。
The <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE (integrated development environment) has a number of advanced options that are of great importance if you wish to get the most out of the product.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 的IDE （集成开发环境）拥有大量的高级选项，对于想要获得最大化的产品，它们都具有重要的意义。
The <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE accepts mouse and keyboard input, and many operations can be carried out using one or the other or both.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 的IDE接受鼠标和键盘输入，并且你可以选择一个或另一个或者两者都用来实现更多操作。
The <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE will periodically check for updates and then download them automatically.
<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE会定期要求你检查更新，然后会自动下载。

The <t3>index.html</t3> can also be customised to show your game with a different background colour, or at a different position etc... but a knowledge of HTML is necessary for this, and you can also specify your own custom index file when you build the package (see the <a4>HTML5 Game Options</a4>).
<t3>index.html</t3> 也可以自定义，以不同的背景颜色或不同的位置来显示你的游戏，但是需要 HTML 的相关知识，你也可以在构建时指定自己的自定义索引文件包（请参阅 <a4>HTML5游戏选项</a4>）。
The Amazon Fire Android SDK path is misconfigured
Amazon Fire Android SDK 路径配置错误
The Android SDK path is misconfigured
Android SDK 路径配置错误
The Background preferences deal with the Workspace background and what it will display as well as how it will be displayed.
背景偏好设置用于处理工作区的背景、显示什么背景以及背景如何去显示。
The Compiling preferences deal with certain options related to the output when compiling your game for testing or creating a package, as well as certain areas of the compiling process.
编译器偏好设置用于处理某些在编译游戏以测试或创建程序包时和输出及编译处理的某些方面有关的选项。
The Confirm Dialogue preferences deal with some of the general confirmation pop-ups that will appear when performing certain actions in the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE.
确认对话框偏好设置用于处理一些在<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE中执行某些动作时的常规弹窗确认信息。
无法找到当前的程序包。
The DLL {0} on extension {1} with function {2} has more than 4 arguments and are not all the same type.
扩展名为{1}且函数为{2}的DLL {0}具有4个以上的参数，并且类型不同。
The Event cannot be changed to an existing Event.
事件无法更改为现有事件。

The File Watcher scans the project folders for external changes - for example if you change a gml script in Notepad++ then the file watcher will detect this change and ask you if you want to reload it or discard it - and as such the frequency that this scan happens can severely impact performance and power consumption.
文件监视器扫描项目文件夹的外部更改，例如，如果你使用 Notepad++ 修改了 GML 脚本，那么文件监视器会检测到此修改，并询问你是否要重新加载或者放弃 - 因此，扫描频率可能严重影响性能和功耗。
The Free version has certain limitations but permits you to test out the most important features and prototype projects.
试用版具有一些限制但是允许你体验我们最重要的特性和样例工程。
The Grid Settings preferences are used to set how the image grid will be presented, with the following options available:
网格偏好设置（Grid Settings preferences ）被用于设置图像网格会如何显示，有如下可用选项：
The ID of surface to be copied.
The ID of the notification to cancel.
The ID of the surface to be copied.
The ID of the surface to change.
即将发生变化的表面层的ID。
The ID of the surface to check.
The ID of the surface to copy the other surface to.
从其它表面复制到的目的表面层的ID。
The ID of the surface to get the height of.
将要获取高度的表面层ID。
The ID of the surface to get the width of.
即将获取纹理的表面层ID。
The ID of the surface to set as the drawing target.
作为绘制目标的表面层的ID。
The ID of the surface to use.
图片编辑器的背景设置
图像编辑器的确认设置
The Image Editor Grid Settings Preferences
图像编辑器的网格设置
图像编辑器的偏好设置
The Image Editor Preferences also has the following sub-categories:
图像编辑器偏好设置中还有如下的子目录：
图像编辑器的工具设置
The Input preferences control certain aspects of the mouse and keyboard input within the IDE.
输入偏好设置用于控制IDE中某些需要鼠标和键盘输入方面的控制。
The NOT operator is just what it says - NOT those bits.
“非” 运算就像它说的一样 - “非” 那些位。
The NX CPU Profiler can only be used on YYC builds.
NX CPU Profiler 只能用于YYC构建。
The NX CPU Profiler should not be enabled for Packaged builds
程序包构建时无法启用 NX CPU Profiler
The Object Editor Confirm Dialog Preferences
物体编辑器确认对话框偏好设置
The Output Window preferences control the different colour and formatting options for the various different output windows in the IDE.
输出窗口偏好设置控制着IDE中各个输出窗口的各种颜色和格式。
The Path preferences control the different file paths required by elements in the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE as well as for any external editors that you require.
文件路径偏好设置（Path Preference）用于控制<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>中的一些要素以及你所要求的外部编辑器（External Editors）所需的各种文件路径。

The Power Saving preferences here will affect how much CPU power and GPU power will be used to generate the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE (essentially this will lower the base framerate at which the program runs and so lower power consumption).
节能偏好设置（Power Saving Preferences）将会影响生成 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE 所使用的 CPU 及 GPU 功率（必要时这些设置会在程序运行时降低基本帧率及功耗）。
The Projects section is where you can create, open or import projects.
你可以在工程部分创建、打开或导入项目。
The Repository '{0}' is expecting a different Username/Password than is set under the Identity preferences.
存储库 '{0}' 期望一个与身份偏好设置不同的用户名/密码。
The Repository is expecting a different Username/Password than is set under the Identity preferences.
项目库需要一个与标识设置(?)不同的用户名/密码。
The Resource Tree Confirm Dialog Preferences
资源树确认对话框偏好设置
The Room Editor Confirm Dialogs Preferences
房间编辑器确认对话框偏好设置
The Room Editor Grid Settings Preferences
房间编辑器网格设置偏好
运行库主下载源偏好设置
运行库下载源偏好设置
The SDK Build Settings are invalid
样条曲线编辑器偏好设置
The Sprite Editor Confirm Dialog Preferences
精灵编辑器确认对话框偏好设置
文本编辑器颜色偏好设置
The Texture Group for sprite '{0}' is invalid - setting to Default Texture Group instead
精灵纹理组 '{0}' 无效 - 使用默认纹理组代替
The Tile Set Editor preferences also has a <b0>Confirm Dialogs</b0> sub-section:
“图块集编辑器” 首选项还有 <b0>确认对话框</b0> 子部分：
The Trial Licence has certain limitations but permits you to test out the most important features and prototype projects.
试用版具有一些限制但是允许你体验我们最重要的特性和样例工程。
The URL or IP to connect to (a string).
待连接的URL或IP（字符串形式）。
The URL to get the IP of (a string).

The UWP target comes with two compile options, one is the <b0>VM</b0> that uses a runner and interpreted code and the other which is the <b1>YYC</b1> (YoYo Compiler) which creates native code and a compiled executable.
UWP 平台带有两个编译选项，一个是 <b0>VM（虚拟机）</b0> ，它使用一个运行器来解释代码，另一个是 <b1>YYC</b1>（YoYo 编译器） ，创建本机代码并编译可执行程序。
The Web Server will show a certain amount of debug information related to the files that have been served, and has a button to clear this at the bottom.
这个网络服务器会显示一定量的与所伺服文件相关的调试信息，以及底部的一个用来清空这些信息的按钮。
The YoYo runner also benefits from a special command line parameter:
YoYo runner 还受益于一个特殊的命令行参数：
The above code check for a key press and the toggle the application surface on or off depending on its state (like in an options menu).
上述代码检测按键并根据它的状态切换应用表面的启用(就像菜单的选项)。
The above code checks for a key press and if it detects one it frees the memory reserved for the surface indexed in the variable "surf" and then changes room.
上述代码将检测一个键是否按下，如果检测到了，则对索引为变量surf的表面图层所预留的那部分内存进行释放，然后切换一个房间。
The above code checks for a mouse button press and then sets the window to fullscreen if it is not already, or sets it to windowed if it is already.
上述代码将检测鼠标按下，如果还不是全屏则设置窗口为全屏，否则在已经是全屏模式时设置为窗口。
The above code checks the orientation of the device and sets a global variable depending on the value returned.
上述代码检测设备的取向，根据返回值设置一个全局变量。
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it contains a pointer and if it does not then one is assigned to it.
上述代码将会检测变量“val”来观察它是否存储一个指针，如果不是则将一个指针赋予给它。
The above code checks to make sure that the correct asynchronous function call is being revised, then goes on to get the status of the returned cloud ds_map.
上面的代码通过检查以确保异步调用的函数正确性，然后返回云端 ds_map 的 status。
The above code checks to see if a surface exists and if it does not it will create a surface that is 1024 pixels wide and 1024 pixels high, assigning the index to the variable "surf".
上述代码将检测是否存在一个表面图层，如果没有则创建一个1024×1024px大小的表面图层，并指定给索引为变量“surf”。
The above code checks to see if view[0] is visible or not and if it is not, it then sets it to be visible.
上述代码检测 view[0] 是否可见，如果不可见，则设置为可见。
The above code checks to see which view is currently being drawn and then draws a different text to each view based on the return value.
上述代码将基于返回值检测当前绘制的是哪个视野并绘制不同的文字。
The above code creates a <t0>ds_map</t0> and then requests data for the first available notification in the queue.
上面的代码创建了一个 <t0>ds_map</t0> ，然后请求数据队列中第一个可用的通知。
The above code creates a new ds_grid, based on the width and height of a previously created grid, then copies the information form the previous grid to the new one.
上述代码创建了一个新的栅格结构，基于先前创建的栅格的宽度和高度，然后从先前的栅格中拷贝信息给新的栅格。
The above code creates a string from the values stored in the global array "Highscores" and then writes this string to a file for local storage.
以上的代码创建了一个字符串的值存储在全局数组“Highscores”中,然后将该字符串写入本地存储。

The above code creates a string from the values stored in the global array "Highscores" and then writes this string to the cloud service for storage, as well as writing it to a file for local storage.
以上的代码创建了一个字符串的值存储在全局数组“Highscores”中,然后将该字符串写入存储的云服务中,并且在本地文件中保存了一份。

The above code creates two surfaces of different sizes, assigning each one to a different canvas element, and then those surfaces are assigned to two views so that the correct part of the room is captured.
上述代码创建了两个不同大小的表面，并给他们每个都指定了不同的画布元素，然后为了在房间里捕捉正确的部分，给这两个表面层指定了两个视野。
The above code first checks the current draw alpha and then if it is not set to 1 it sets it to 1.
上述代码首先检测当前绘制透明度，当其不为1时，将其设为1。
The above code gets the hue used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then merges it with white at a 50:50 ratio, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取颜色常量 "c_teal"的色相，然后将其与白色按照50:50的比例混合，并且将混合后的新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。

The above code gets the saturation used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then uses that value to set a random colour to have the same saturation, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的饱和度，然后使用这个饱和度与一个随机的颜色相搭配，并且将得到新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。

The above code gets the value used to make the colour constant "c_teal" and then uses that value to set a random colour to have the same luminosity, storing the resulting colour in the variable "col".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的明度，然后使用这个明度与一个随机的颜色相搭配，并且将得到新颜色储存到变量 "col"中。
The above code resets the position of view port[0] to the (0,0) position (top left hand corner) of the display.
上述代码将重设view port[0]（视口）的位置为 显示器的(0,0)位置 (左上角)。
The above code stores the current action number in the variable "num".
上述代码将当前所执行动作的索引存入变量“num”中。
The above code stores the current x axis window position in the variable "wx".
上述代码储存当前窗口位置的x坐标至变量wx。
The above code stores the current x axis window position of the mouse in the variable "wx".
上述代码使用变量"wx"记录了鼠标在窗口中的x轴位置。
The above code stores the current y axis window position in the variable "wy".
上述代码储存当前窗口位置的y坐标至变量wy。
The above code stores the current y axis window position of the mouse in the variable "wy".
上述代码使用变量"wy"记录了鼠标在窗口中的y轴位置。
The above code takes a screenshot of a part of the game screen that is 100 pixels square when the user presses the "S" key.
上述代码在按下“S”键时将游戏屏幕边长100像素的正方形区域保存为截图。
The above code takes a screenshot of the game when the user presses the "S" key.
上述代码在按下“S”键时保存游戏屏幕截图。
The above code uses the <t0>argument_count</t0> variable to initialize variables, and is an example of how to permit a script to accept a variable number of arguments.
上述代码使用<t0>argument_count</t0>变量来初始化变量，并示范了如何允许脚本接收可变数量的参数。
The above code will add up all the values in our array, draw each of them and draw the total value at the end.
这段程序将数组中的数据依次累加，并绘制数组的值每个值，最后绘制累加的总和。
The above code will burst a random number of particles between 30 and 60 from the chosen emitter.
上述代码会从所选发射器迸发30到60个随机数量的粒子。
The above code will center the game window within the display if it is not in full screen mode.
在不是全屏模式下的情况下，让游戏窗口屏幕居中放置。
The above code will change the size of the window based on the value of the variable "global.scale" when the mouse button is pressed.
上述代码将在鼠标按下时，基于变量“global.scale”改变窗口的大小。
The above code will change the window cursor to the standard windows drag cursor if the left mouse button has been pressed and it has not already been changed previously.
如果之前不是拖放指针，上述代码将在按下鼠标左键时切换窗口鼠标指针为拖放指针。
The above code will change the window cursor to the standard windows drag cursor if the left mouse button has been pressed.
上述代码在鼠标左键按下时改变窗口光标为拖动光标。
The above code will check for a mouse button being pressed, and if it is it then gets the mouse position relative to the view[0] and compares it to see if a variable should be set to true.
上述代码将检测鼠标是否按下，如果是，然后它会获取相对于视野0（view[0]）的鼠标位置，并且比较它的值，看是否应该设置为真。
The above code will check the current geometry method and set it to "fast" if it is not already.
上述代码将检测当前的几何顶点缓冲区的方法，如果没有准备好则设置为 “fast（vbm_fast 方法）”。
The above code will check the current view being drawn and if it is view[0] it copies the surface indexed in the variable "temp_surf" onto the surface indexed in the variable "surf".
上述代码将检测当前绘制的视野，如果视野是 view[0]，则复制变量为 "temp_surf" 的表面到变量为 "surf"的表面。
The above code will check the view port size against that of the surface "aplication_surface" and if it is different, the surface is re-sized.
上述代码将检测视野输出大小是否与“应用表面”的一致，如果不同，将重置表面层的大小。
The above code will check the window colour to see if it is set as black or not, and if it is not it sets it to black.
上述代码检测窗口内背景颜色，如果不是黑色则设置为黑色。
The above code will check the windows caption to see if it has text or not, and if it does it sets it to an empty string so as no caption is displayed.
上述代码检测窗口是否有标题文字，如果有则设置为空，即不显示标题。
The above code will check to see if a global variable exists and if it does then it is output to the console.
上述代码会检测一个全局变量是否存在，若存在将其输出到控制台上。
The above code will check to see if a surface indexed in the variable "surf" exists, and if it does not, it will re-create it.
上面的例子中将检测变量为 "surf"的表面图层是否存在，如果不存在，将重新创建一个。
The above code will check to see if the game window is in focus or not, and if the function returns <t0>false</t0> a script will be called.
上述代码将会检测游戏窗口是否处于焦点，若为<t0>false</t0>则调用一个脚本。
The above code will check to see if the global variable called "enemy_num" exists and if it does not it is created and set a value.
上述代码将会检测名字叫"enemy_num"的全局变量是否存在，如果不存在则创建这样的全局变量并为其设定一个值。
The above code will check to see if the user presses the "S" key on the keyboard and if they do it will save a part of the surface indexed in the variable "surf" to disc.
上面的代码将检查是否用户按下键盘上的“S”键，如果他们这样操作了，将对变量“surf”索引的表面层的一部分进行存盘保存。
The above code will check to see if the user presses the "S" key on the keyboard and if they do it will save the surface indexed in the variable "surf" to disc.
上面的代码将检查是否用户按下键盘上的“S”键，如果他们这样操作了，将对变量“surf”索引的表面层存盘保存。
The above code will check to see if the v-sync method is using the alternative or the default, and if it's the default it will switch to the alternative instead.
上述代码检测是否使用于替代的垂直同步方法，如果是默认的则切换为替代的方法。
The above code will check to see if the window is in full screen mode or not and draw a text message depending on the returned value.
上述代码将检测是否为窗口模式，根据返回的值绘制文字。

The above code will check to see which view is currently being drawn, and if it is view[0] it sets the draw target to a surface and draws all instances of the object "obj_Effect" before resetting the draw target again.
上述代码将检测当前是哪个视野在绘制，如果是view[0] ，它将设置绘制目标到一个表面层，并在表面层上绘制“obj_Effect”所有实例 ，然后重置绘制目标。
The above code will check two arrays to see if they hold equivalent values, and if they do not then the code will copy the entire contents of the array "inventory_array" to the array "item_array".
上述代码将会检测两个数组来查看它们是否承载了相等的值，如果不是，这段代码将会拷贝数组"inventory_array"的全部内容给数组"item_array"。
The above code will clear the particle emitter indexed in the variable "p_emit1".
上述代码将会清空索引为变量“p_emit1”的粒子发射器。
The above code will create a new TCP socket then attempt to connect through that to the given IP address on port 6510.
上述代码会新建一个TCP套接字然后尝试通过之去连接指定的IP地址的6510端口。
The above code will create a new array of 100 entries, each one set to the keyword <t0>noone</t0>, and then assign it to the variable "instance_array".
上述代码将会创建一个具有100个元素的新书组，每个新数组会被赋予一个关键字<t0>noone</t0>，然后将整个数组赋给变量"instance_array"。
The above code will create an identity matrix and store its index in a variable for future use.
上述代码将会创建一个单位矩阵并将其索引存入一个变量中以供日后使用。
The above code will delete the font indexed in the global variable "Font".
上述代码会删除索引为全局变量“Font”的字体。

The above code will generate a 1D array held in the variable <t0>display_data</t0> containing the information about the displays, as well as create the variable <t1>display_num</t1> to hold the number of active displays found.
上述代码将生成一个包含显示器信息的一维数组保存到变量 <t0>display_data</t0>，同时创建变量 <t1>display_num</t1> 保存找到的激活的显示器的数目。
The above code will get the 32bit colour value at the position of the mouse and then split it into its component values, storing them in variables.
上述代码将获取鼠标位置的32位真颜色，提取它的分量值，储存到不同的变量上。

The above code will get the angle of direction from the instance to the mouse cursor, then get the difference between that angle and the current <t0>image_angle</t0>, using this value to slowly rotate towards the mouse.
上述代码将会获得实例到鼠标光标的方向角，然后获得这个角度与当前的<t0>image_angle</t0>的差值，同时使用这个值缓慢地向鼠标方向旋转。
The above code will get the blue component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "b_comp".
上述代码获取常量 "c_teal"的蓝色值，并且将其储存到变量 "b_comp"中。
The above code will get the green component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "g_comp".
上述代码将会返回颜色常量“c_teal”的绿色分量，并将该值存储与变量“g_comp”中。
The above code will get the position of the application surface, as well as the absolute width and height in relation to the display window, and store them in four variables for future use.
上述代码获取应用表面层的位置，以及相对于显示器或窗口的绝对长宽值，保存到四个变量上备用。
The above code will get the red component of the colour constant "c_teal" and store the value in the variable "r_comp".
上述代码获取颜色常量 "c_teal"的红色分量，并且将其储存到变量 "r_comp"中。
The above code will lock the draw GUI event to the given width and height, scaling all components to fit the display, using that proportion.
上述代码将锁定GUI绘制事件，以指定的宽度，使用那个比例缩放所有的分量以适应显示器。
The above code will loop through a 2D array and set each entry to -1.
上述代码将会遍历该二维数组并将每一元素设为-1。
The above code will position the game window in the upper left corner of the browser or display (depending on the target module being used).
上述代码将放置游戏窗口至浏览器或者显示器（根据正在使用的目标模块）的左上角。
The above code will resize the application surface to have a 1:1 ratio with the GUI layer.
上述代码在GUI层上以1:1的比例重置应用表面层的大小。
The above code will resize the ds_grid indexed in the global variable "Grid" and then clear it so that each cell holds the value -1.
上述代码将会重设索引为全局变量"Grid"的栅格结构的大小，并且接下来清空它以便每个单元个都承载值-1.
The above code will return the IP address of the given URL and store it in the variable "game_ip".
上述代码将会返回所指定的URL的IP地址并将其存入变量“game_ip”中。
The above code will set an advert to display at the bottom left-hand corner of the display.
上述代码在显示器底部左下角设置并显示一个广告。
The above code will set an advert to display at the top right-hand of the display.
上述代码将在显示器右上角设置并显示一个广告。
The above code will set the anti-aliasing level to 8 if supported and switch v-sync to on.
上述代码将设置抗锯齿等级为8，并开启垂直同步。
The above code will set the game window to occupy the whole display area (either the browser or the screen, depending on the target platform).
上述代码将设置游戏窗口覆盖整个显示器区域（可以是浏览器或者屏幕，取决于目标平台）。
The above code will set the minimum and maximum width and height for the game window.
上述代码将为游戏窗口设定最大宽高。
The above code will set the render target 0 to the surface ID indexed in the variable "surf".
上述代码将渲染目标0到变量“surf”索引的表面层上。
The above code will set the timeout for the network connection to 1000ms and tell GameMaker Studio 2 not to block on connect.
上述代码会设置网络连接超时限制为1000毫秒并告知GameMaker Studio 2不阻止连接。
The above code will skip back to the beginning of the loop if the array[i] value is already an empty string.
上述代码将判断array[i]的值，如果是一个空字符，它将跳回到循环的开始。
The above code will store the current window height in the variable "hh".
上述代码将获取当前窗口的高度，保存到变量"hh"中。
The above code will store the current window width in the variable "ww".
上述代码将保存当前窗口的宽度到变量“ww”中。

上述代码在一个变量中保存d3d设备的指针。

上述代码将游戏窗口id存入一个变量。
The above code will store the height of the surface indexed in the variable "surf" in the variable "sh".
上述代码将在变量sh中储存索引变量为surf的表面图层的高度。
The above code will store the width of the surface indexed in the variable "surf" in the variable "sw".
上述代码将在变量sw中储存索引变量为surf的表面图层的宽度。
The above code will switch off the automatic drawing of the application surface.
上述代码将切换应用表面层的自动绘制为假。
The above code will try and create a server using TCP through port 32.
上述代码将会尝试使用TCP协议通过端口32创建一个服务端。

上述代码将会尝试使用TCP协议通过端口6510创建一个服务端。
The above code would center the mouse in the game display.
上述代码将鼠标放置在显示器中央。
The above code would center the mouse in the game window.

The basic idea of the path resource is rather simple - you define a path by drawing it in the path editor, then you can place an action (or code) in an event of an object to tell the object to follow that particular path in the game room.
路径资源的基本思路很简单-你可以通过在路径编辑器中绘制路径来对路径资源进行定义，然后你可以通过在物体的事件中放置动作模块或者添加代码来使物体在房间中沿着特定路径（来行动）。
The basic use of a surface would be as follows - You first create a surface and assign its index to a variable.
表面层的基本用法如下 - 首先创建一个表面，给它的索引分配给一个变量。

The batch is "broken" when you change a font, a colour, a blend mode, or any other draw status that affects how things are drawn on a global scale, so you should try to limit these things to as few objects as possible since a high number of batches will adversely affect your games performance.
当您更改字体，颜色，混合模式或影响全局绘制效果的任何其他绘图状态时，该批次将被“破坏”，因此您应该尝试将这些行为尽可能限制，否则批次数太大将对您的游戏性能产生不利影响。

The format for an extension will vary depending on the final target platform, although in general they are written in C++, C# or JavaScript, which is then parsed using <a2>specific functions</a2> in GML.<br3>
扩展的格式将根据最终的目标平台而有所不同，一般它们采用C ++，C＃或 JavaScript 编写，然后使用 GML 中的 <a2>特定函数</a2> 来进行解析。<br3>
The full shader is comprised of a vertex shader program, and a fragment shader program (also known as a pixel shader).
完整的着色器由顶点着色器程序和片段着色器程序（也称为像素着色器）组成。
The function or script being called is for acting on an instance, but at the time of running no instances exist
调用的函数或脚本用于对实例执行操作，但在运行时不存在实例
The function will only work while the game is in focus and using alt + tab will unlock the mouse.
这个函数只有焦点在游戏中时有用，所以使用 alt + tab时 将会解锁鼠标。
The function will return 0 if the variable given is not an array or is a 1D array.
如果给定变量不是一个数组或者是一维数组时将会返回0.
The function will return a unique <b0>id</b0> value that should then be used in the appropriate asynchronous event to identify the ds_map that is returned as a "call back" from the cloud service.
该函数将返回惟一的<b0>id</b0> 值，那么应该使用适当的异步事件识别 ds_map 返回作为云服务的“回调（call back）”。

The function will return an array with 8 values per display (ie: if you have two displays, the array will have a length of 16 indices), where the values [0 ... 3] correspond to the overlapx1, overlapy1, overlapx2, overlapy2 - defining the region of overlap on this display and will be set to 0,0,0,0 if no overlap - and the values [4 ... 7] corresponds to the monitorx1, monitory1, monitorx2, monitory2 - the coordinates of the display in the virtual display space.

对于每个显示器，这个函数将返回8个值添加到一个数组中（比如你有两个显示器，数组长度将是16），值[0~3] 对应 overlapx1、 overlapy1、 overlapx2、 overlapy - 定义显示器里的重叠区域，如果无重叠，将设置为 0,0,0,0 - 值 [4~ 7] 对应 monitorx1、 monitory1、 monitorx2、 monitory2 - 它们是虚拟显示器空间上的坐标。

The function will return an array with four keys, where key 0 and 1 are the x and y position of the top lefthand corner of the surface, and keys 2 and 3 are the x and y of the bottom righthand corner of the surface, all relative to the size of the display or window.<br4>
这个函数将返回包含四个键值的数组，键0和键1是表面左上角x/y的位置，键2和键3是表面右下x/y的位置，所有的这些值响应显示器及窗口发生变化。<br4>
The function will return the index of the surface which should be stored in a variable for future function calls.
这个函数将返回表面的索引名称，并储存在一个变量上，方便将来函数调用。

The information section of the Start Page permits you to browse the <a0>YoYo Games Marketplace</a0> as well as browse and open Tutorials and Demos made by the YoYo Games team to show off specific aspects of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> (see below for more information).

The instance layer is where you place all the instances of the objects that you require for the game.
实例层是用来放置游戏所需物体的所有实例的层。

The language or method that you use to create your projects will depend on your skill and your previous background history, and since everyone is different <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> aims to be as adaptable as possible to your different needs, offering two different options for you to create games:
创建你的项目使用的语言或者方法取决于你的技能和你以前的技术背景，既然每个人都是不同的， <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>致力于满足你的不同需求，为你打造游戏提供了两种不同的选项：
The larger this value compared to your game speed, the smoother your game will run and the more overhead you have for adding further things.
与您的游戏速度相比，该值越大，您的游戏将可以运行越流畅，并有更多性能剩余来让您添加更多东西。
The last operator we want to look at is EOR (Exclusive OR, sometimes called XOR), this operator flips the bits set in <i2>both</i2> values.
最后我们要看的运算符是 “异或（EOR，有时叫 XOR）” ，这个运算翻转位设置，当 <i2>两个位</i2> 相同时为 0，不同时为 1。

This can increase your games performance by at least two or three times, especially on logic-heavy games, ideal for those larger or CPU intensive games.
这可以将您的游戏性能提高至少两到三倍，特别是对于重量级游戏以及较大型或者对CPU使用程度较高的游戏来说效果非常理想。
This can now be used as follows in another event of the controller object (an alarm for example, or a key press event):
下面的代码可以在控制器的另外一个事件中使用（比如计时器，或者按键事件）。
This caption appears at the top of the window, beside the game icon, when the game is not in full screen mode.
当游戏不是全屏模式，标题出现在窗口顶部游戏图标的旁边。
This child only has 2 events defined, but it will inherit the events of the parent and so have 5, exactly the same.
这个孩子只定义了2个事件，但它会继承父进程的事件，所以有5个完全一样。
This colour represents that which will be used for those areas of the game window that are not occupied by any views.
这个颜色表示的游戏窗口内视野间隙的背景颜色。
This constant indicates that the pointer is not pointing to anything meaningful (the same as <t0>NULL</t0> in C++ or null in C#)
该常量表示指针没有指向一个地址（空地址）（和C++中的<t0>NULL</t0>或C#中的null一样）
This constant simply means that the value is not a valid pointer
该常量表示该值不是一个有效的指针。

This converse is true and if you drag certain windows to the sides of the workspace (or the bottom) then they will be docked, meaning that it essentially becomes part of the IDE window overlay and is no longer independent.
相反，如果您将某些窗口拖动到工作区的两侧或底部，那么它们将会停靠，这意味着它们成为IDE 窗口的一部分，不再独立。
This depth is incremented by the amount given here.
深度的增加量根据上面给定的的值来确定。

This document is divided into three parts with the aim of getting you introduced to the interface and basic workings of <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> before going on to more advanced usage and the functions available through our propriety scripting language <a2>GML</a2> or our visual scripting tool <a3>Drag and Drop</a3>.
本文档分为三个部分，目的是让你熟悉<i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1>界面和基本的工作方式，然后是高级的用法和适合我们的脚本语言<a2>GML</a2>的函数用法，或者虚拟的脚本工具<a3>拖拽（Drag and Drop，简称DnD）。</a3>

This does <i3>not</i3> mean however that you should be checking 1 and 0 (or any other real number) for true and false, as you are also provided with the <b4>constants</b4> <t5>true</t5> and <t6>false</t6> which should always be used in your code to prevent any issues should real boolean data types be added in a future update.
然而，这也<i3>不</i3>意味着你应该使用1或0（或者别的实数）来进行检测真假，因此还提供了<b4>常量</b4><t5>true</t5>和<t6>false</t6>，你应该总是使用它们以防止在未来的更新中引入真正的布尔数据类型时可能引发的问题。

This error is usually only found from trying to run a malformed project file (if this happens consistently you may wish to contact <a0>YoYo Games Support</a0> and supply the details that the compiler output window shows)
通常只有在尝试运行格式错误的项目文件时才会发现此错误（如果经常发生此情况你可联系 <a0>YoYo Games Support</a0> 并提供编译器输出窗口的详细信息）

This event happens when an instance of the object is first created, and is the very first thing that happens within an instance that has been placed in the room through the room editor when a room is entered.
当一个物体的实例第一次被创建时，这个事件就会发生，并且是在进入房间时通过房间编辑器放置在房间中的实例发生的第一件事情。
This event is the very last event to be executed when an instance is destroyed.
此事件是一个实例被销毁时所执行的最后一个事件。
This extension has no exported functions
该扩展没有导出的函数
This extremely useful for doing repetitive tasks that would involve multiple lines of code in any other way, and is commonly used as a counter for evaluating arrays, or drawing things.
处理包含很多行代码的重复任务极其 有用，通常用来数组计数，或者绘制。
This feature only works when the function has been selected from the autocomplete.
这个特性只有在自动补全开启时才有效。
This feed will then be scanned for updates to the runtime tools which can then be downloaded and installed.
这个下载源将扫描更新运行库，然后可以下载并安装。
This font is missing one or more symbols and will get replacements from other fonts.
此字体缺少一个或多个符号，将从其他字体中获取替换。

This function Resets the display settings to the ones that were set when the game was started, but also allows you to change the current level of full screen anti-aliasing being used and whether to use vertical synchronisation.
这个函数将游戏开始时显示器的一些设置重置为某些值，也允许更改全屏抗锯齿的等级以及是否使用垂直同步。

This function allows you to attach a surface to a canvas element that already exists in your web page, meaning that you can effectively split up portions of your game to be drawn at various different places within the page.
这个函数允许你为已经存在网页上的canvas元素附著一个表面图层，意味着可以有效的分割游戏的部分页面，绘制到页面内的不同地方。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to all the values of the cells found within the defined area of a grid.
这个函数可以被用于向一个栅格中一个确定区域内所有单元格的数值中叠加一个被给定的值（实数或字符串）。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to all the values of the cells found within the defined disk area of a grid.
这个函数可以被用于向一个栅格中一个确定圆盘区域内所有单元格的数值中叠加一个被给定的值（实数或字符串）。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to the value of the given cell within the grid.
这个函数可以被用于向一个栅格的被给定单元格的值叠加一个给定的值（实数或字符串）
This function can be used to clear a given ds_grid to a specific value.
这个函数可以被用于用一个特定的数值清空一个被给定的栅格结构。
This function can be used to clear the entire screen (with no alpha blend) to the given colour, and is only for use in the draw event of an instance (it will not show if used in any other event).
这个函数用指定颜色来填充（清空）整个屏幕（没有透明度设定），它仅能用于实例的draw事件（用于其它事件时不发挥作用）。

This function can be used to clear the entire screen with a given colour and the alpha component of the destination is set to the value you have set - this function does <i0>not</i0> do any blending as it works but any subsequent blend operations can be set up to use the destination alpha that you have set.
这个函数可以用指定的颜色和透明度填充整个屏幕，屏幕原有图像的透明度保持不变 - 这个函数 <i0>不</i0> 会对原有图像的透明度与混合模式做任何修改。随后你可以再次修改其混合操作。
This function can be used to get the colour of a specific pixel from a surface, using the local coordinates of the surface where (0,0) is the top left corner.
此函数使用局部坐标，可用于从一个表面获取特定像素的颜色，其中（0,0）是表面层的左上角。
This function can be used to maximise the GUI layer and set it to be scaled and offset in relation to the screen dimensions, rather than the default application surface position and dimensions.
这个函数最大化GUI层，相对于屏幕尺寸进行缩放和偏移设置，而不是相对于默认的应用表面层的位置和尺寸。
This function can be used to set a local notification to be shown on a given date at a given time.
此函数用于设置一个给定时间日期的本地通知。
This function can be used to set a maximum window height for your game.
这个函数可以给游戏设置一个窗口的最大高度。
This function can be used to set a maximum window width for your game.
这个函数可以给游戏设置一个窗口的最大宽度。.
This function can be used to set a minimum window height for your game.
这个函数可以给游戏设置一个窗口的最小高度。
This function can be used to set a minimum window width for your game.
这个函数可以给你的游戏设置一个最小窗口宽度。
This function can set the background colour of the game window.
这个函数可以设置游戏窗口的背景颜色。
This function cancel the given push notification.
这个函数将会取消已有的推送通知。
This function clears the matrix stack.
This function has no effect on any other device.<br0>
这个函数对移动设备无效。<br0>
This function is essential when working with surfaces due to their volatile nature.
由于表面图层的不稳定性，在使用到表面时，这个函数还是有必要的。
This function is used to create a surface and will return the index of the surface which should be stored in a variable for future function calls.
这个函数被用来创建一个表面图层，而且将会返回这个表面的索引地址，这个索引应该储存在一个变量上，将来可以调用它。
This function returns a special <i0>pointer</i0> for the surface texture.
这个函数返回表面层纹理的特殊 <i0>指针</i0> 。
This function returns the amount of blue used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no blue and 255 is all blue.
这个函数返回给定颜色的蓝色值，这个值在0到255之间，0代表不含有蓝色，255代表100%的蓝色。
This function returns the amount of green used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no green and 255 is all green.
这个函数返回给定颜色的绿色值，这个值在0到255之间，0代表不含有绿色，255代表100%的绿色。.
This function returns the amount of red used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no red and 255 is all red.
这个函数返回给定颜色的红色值，这个值在0到255之间，0代表不含有红色，255代表100%的红色。
This function returns the background colour of the game window.
这个函数返回游戏窗口的背景颜色。
This function returns the caption of the window (this is the text that appears on the top of the window, beside its icon) and by default this shows the caption of the room you're currently in.
此函数返回窗口的标题（窗口顶部图标旁边出现的标题文字），默认显示的是当前房间的标题。
This function returns the current value of the draw alpha, which will range between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque).
这个函数返回当前的绘制透明度值，这个数值的范围是从0（完全透明）到1（完全不透明）。
This function returns the direction of a vector formed by the specified components [x1,y1] and [x2,y2] in relation to the fixed x/y coordinates of the room.
这个函数返回由特定的相对于房间的x/y坐标组件(x1,y1)和(x2,y2)形成的一个向量的方向。
This function returns whether an object with the specified index exists or not.
该函数返回指定索引的物体是否存在。
This function returns whether the game window is in fullscreen mode (<t0>true</t0>) or not (<t1>false</t1>).
这个函数返回游戏窗口是否是全屏模式(<t0>为真</t0>)，或者不是 (<t1>为假</t1>)。
This function sets the angular damping value of a fixture.
这个函数 sets the angular damping value of a fixture.

This function simply takes the image from one surface and copies it onto another one at the specified local position within that surface (where the (0,0) position is the top left corner of the destination surface).
这个函数简单的让图像从一个表面图层复制到另外一个表面特殊的位置（(0,0)表示在表面图层的左上角）。
This function will commit a file to the chosen cloud service for storage.
这个函数将提交一个文件到所选云服务用于存储。
This function will commit a string to the chosen cloud service for storage.
该函数将提交一个字符串到所选的云服务用于存储。
This function will get the dpi of the device display along the x axis (this value is also dependant on the orientation of the device).
这个函数将获取设置显示器x轴的dpi（这个值也依赖设备的方向）。
This function will get the dpi of the device display along the y axis (this value is also dependant on the orientation of the device).
这个函数将获取设置显示器y轴的dpi（这个值也依赖设备的方向）。

This function will only affect things drawn in the <a0>Draw GUI Event</a0> and can be used to set a specific width and height for all GUI components in that event, and no matter what size of display or window is used to display the GUI, it will be scaled to fit correctly.
此函数只会影响 <a0>Draw GUI Event</a0> 中的绘制的内容，并可以用来给那个事件中所有GUI组件设定特定的宽度和高度， 不管显示器或窗口之前是怎样显示GUI，都会缩放到适当的效果。
This function will populate a pre-made <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0> with a series of key/value pairs for the first local push notification in the queue to be shown.
这个函数将以一系列键值对儿（key/value pairs）的形式返回一个 <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0>作为本地通知队列中最先被显示的通知。
This function will populate a pre-made <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0> with a series of key/value pairs for the next local push notification in the queue to be shown.
这个函数以一系列键值对儿（key/value pairs）的形式返回一个 <a0><t1>ds_map</t1></a0> 作为本地通知队列中下一个被显示的通知。
This function will resize a surface to the given dimensions (in pixels).
这个函数将重置表面的大小为给定的长宽值（像素）。
This function will return <t0>true</t0> if the application surface is being used for drawing, or <t1>false</t1> if the screen buffer is being used.
如果使用应用表面层，这个函数将返回 <t0>真</t0> ， 或者如果使用屏幕缓存区返回 <t1>假</t1>。
This function will return the IP address of the given URL.
该函数将会返回指定URL的IP地址。
This function will return the height of the display (in pixels).
这个函数将返回显示器的高度（像素为单位）。
This function will return the hue of the given colour.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的色相。
This function will return the mouse x position relative to the view selected.
这个函数将返回相对于所选视野的鼠标x坐标。
This function will return the mouse x position within the <i0>screen</i0>.
这个函数返回 <i0>屏幕</i0>上鼠标指针的x坐标。
This function will return the mouse y position relative to the view selected.
这个函数将返回相对于所选视野的鼠标y坐标。
This function will return the mouse y position within the <i0>screen</i0>.
这个函数返回 <i0>屏幕</i0>鼠标位置的x坐标。
This function will return the saturation of the given colour.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的饱和度。
This function will return the smallest angle difference between two angles as a value between -180 and 180 degrees (where a positive angle is anti-clockwise and a negative angle clockwise).
这个函数将会返回两个角的最小角度差.
This function will return the value (luminosity) of the given colour.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的明度。
This function will return the width of the display (in pixels).
这个函数将返回显示器的宽度（以像素为单位）。
This function will save a part of a surface to disc using the given filename.
此函数将使用给定的文件名保存表面层到硬盘上。
This function will save a surface to disc using the given filename.
此函数将使用给定的文件名保存表面层到硬盘上。
This function will send off to the cloud for data, which will then trigger the appropriate asynchronous event.
这个函数用于向云端发送数据, 并触发相应的异步事件。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has been flagged as "physics enabled", returning <t0>true</t0>, or not, returning <t1>false</t1>.
该函数会告诉你所检查的物体是否被标记为“启用物理的物体”，若是则返回<t0>true</t0>否则返回<t1>false</t1>。

This function would be called in an event like the <a0>Game Start Event</a0> or in an object that is placed in the first room of your game, with the idea being that you check the current data blob from the cloud server to see if it is up to date or not.
这个函数会在 <a0>开始事件（Game Start Event）</a0> 或者当一个 object 被放置在你的游戏的第一个房间中时被调用，通过这种思路来从云端服务器检查是否有数据更新。
This function would normally be called at the start of a new game and is used to retrieve the current status of the cloud service at game start up.
这个函数通常在新的游戏的开始被调用，用于检索云端服务器上存储的游戏的启动。
This general draw event will be caled, like the step event, every game frame, but it works in two different ways.
这个普通绘图事件和步骤事件一样，每一个游戏帧都会被检测和触发，但是它有两种不同的工作方式。
This global scope, built-in variable can be used to access the application surface using any of the surface functions.
在全局的范围内，这个内置变量可以访问应用表面层，任何表面层函数都可以使用它。
This graph shows frames per second and memory usage over time.\nHold Control and scroll to expand and contract the graph.
此图显示每秒帧数和随时间的内存使用情况。\n按住Control并滚动以展开和收缩图形。
This graph shows frames per second and memory usage over time.\nHold ⌘ and scroll to expand and contract the graph.
此图显示每秒帧数和随时间变化的内存使用情况。\n按住⌘并滚动以展开和收缩图形。
This happens when, in an action, you indicate that the action must be applied to instances of a certain object.
当在一个动作中，您指出该操作必须应用于某个对象的实例时，会发生这种情况。

This has two benefits - One, we don't have to worry about typos or errors when writing out the array positions, and two, we have in the variable "count" the number of positions that the array contains, which can then be used elsewhere in the object.
这样做有两个好处。一来可以避免打错数字，二来可以使用count这个变量计算数组包含数据的个数，这个变量可以用到物体的其它地方。
This help file will tell you all you need to know about <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> and how you can create your own games with it.
这个帮助文件将告诉你关于 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>所有你需要知道的东西，以及你怎样在创建你的游戏时使用它们。.
This index of the grid to clear.
This index of the grid to copy from.
This index of the grid to copy to.
This information will also be shown in the <a1>Compiler Error Output</a1>, as shown below:
这些信息也会被显示在 <a1>编译错误输出停靠栏</a1>, 如图:
This is a 1D (one dimensional) array which we are now going to break down the parts of to see what it means:
这是一个一维数组。看起来没什么特别的吧？下面我们把它分解开来看：

This is a <i2>very</i2> basic functionality, and in reality all it does is move the instance back to the position it was in the moment before a collision was detected before performing any code or DnD™ that is in the event itself, and as such is of limited use.
这是一个<i2>非常</i2>基本功能，实际上所有这些都是将实例移回到在执行任何代码或DnD™之前检测到冲突之前的位置本身，因此使用有限。
This is a curious one, but incredibly useful.
异或很奇特，但非常有用。

tu.note: 备注：SourceControlGit_CloneNonBareOrigin：Message for when a clone is done on a non-bare repository but an origin has been found. 应该有更好的翻译。

tuv.seg: This is a non-bare repository which we do not support direct cloning from.\nHowever we have found its origin so we will push to that and clone from the origin instead.
这是一个非公开存储库，我们不支持从中直接克隆。\n但是，我们已经找到它的源点（origin），所以我们将推送到那并从源点克隆。

This is a non-bare repository which we do not support direct cloning from.\nThere is no Origin marked on this repository so we will ask you to create one so both old and new repositories will be linked via the new bare repository
这不是一个公开库，不支持直接克隆。\n这个库里也没有源点(origin)标记，所以我们要求你创建一个，旧的和新的库都将链接到这个新的公开库。
This is a positive value from 0 - 65,535.
This is a very important thing to remember as instances and objects are <i1>not the same thing</i1> and each have their own set of functions that can affect them.
这很重要，因为这意味着物体和实例 <i3>不</i3> 同，每一个实例均有自己的一套功能。
This is a very important thing to remember as instances and objects are not the same thing and each have their own set of functions that can affect them.<br1>
这是非常重要的事情，因为物体和实例不一样，各自有一组可设置的属性。<br1>
This is achieved by a variety of means, with the keyboard and mouse on computers and through touch and tilting on mobile devices.
有多种方法可以实现交互，比如电脑的键盘、鼠标，移动设备的触摸和倾斜。
This is actually pretty useful, as we can now set up CONSTANTS for bit numbers.<br0>
实际上这相当有用，现在我们就可以建立比特常数（Bit Numbers）。<br0>
This is actually really useful, because when dividing down if we need the remainder, there's an even easier way to get it, which we'll get to in a moment.
实际上，这很有用，因为当我们向下除的时候如果我们需要余数，我们就可以更容易地获取它，我们一会会去获取它。
This is all laid out in an intuitive fashion, with different aspects of your game "<b3>chaining</b3>" together in the IDE to give you a unique and very visual representation of the workflow.
使用直观时尚的布置，在IDE中将你游戏的不同方面"<b3>链接</b3>"在一起，给你一个独特并且直观、可视化的工作流。
This is an event that you place in an object and then specify against which other object you should be checking for collisions.
这是一个放置于一个物体，然后指定对其他物体进行碰撞检查的事件。
This is an invaluable tool for deciding whether to update your current version, or when you find something that may be a bug after a release.
当你要更新你当前版本的时候这是个至关重要的工具，否则你可能会在下一个版本中就看到一些可能是bug的东西。
This is because 5 is 00000101 in binary, and following the rule above, the variable "flags" will get both these 2 bits merged with its own.
因为 5 在二进制中表示为 00000101，而根据上述的规则，变量 "flags" 就会将这两个位合并进来。

This is because it is stored in the texture memory and may be overwritten when the target platform needs that memory for something else which means that you should <i1><b2>always</b2></i1> have some type of fail-safe code in place, usually with the <a3><t4>surface_exists</t4></a3> function.
这是因为它储存在显存里，目标平台往内存里写入其它东西时就有可能会重写，所以你需要<i1><b2>一直</b2></i1> 在某些位置入置安全的代码，通常是 <a3><t4>surface_exists</t4></a3> 函数。
This is checked by default and represents the initial "state" of the fixture at the start of the room it has been placed in.
这是默认情况下检查的，它表示在其放置的房间开始处的灯具的初始“状态”。
This is checked by default and un-checking it will mean that you have to manually open all newly created resources.
该选项默认勾选，取消勾选意味着你必须手动打开所有新建资源。
This is checked by default and unchecking it will mean that you have to manually open all newly created resources.
该选项默认被勾选，解除勾选该项意味着你需要手动打开所有新创建的资源。

这意味着如果将永久物体放在一个房间中，它仍然可以在所有后续房间中使用，并将继续执行分配给其物体属性<i1>中的事件的任何操作，</i1>创建事件，这只是在最初创建时才被触发一次，而不是当您更改为新房间时才被触发。

这意味着这个事件是进行初始化变量，启动时间轴，设置路径以及只需要执行一次或者只有当一个实例第一次出现在房间里时才做的事情的最理想方式。
This means that you <b2>must always return the array</b2> from the script if you wish to change any array values.

This means that you can create a hierarchy "switch" in which different sections of code are run depending on the input value.

This means that you can have an object with a sprite assigned, then set the draw event to draw text and the sprite will not be drawn as you have not told <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> to draw it, although the text will be.
这意味着你可以有一个关联了精灵的物体，然后设置绘制事件来绘制文本，但精灵将不会被绘制，因为你还没有告诉 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 绘制它，尽管文本（也没有告诉 GameMaker Studio 2 但却）会被绘制。

This means that you only have to add one line of code into the objects to call this new scripted function, and if you wish to change something you only need to change it once in the script and all the objects will automatically run the new code, rather than have to go through every object and change the same thing in multiple places.<br1>

This section of the Targets window permits you to have <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> automatically select a specific configuration for a specific target platform.
“目标”窗口的此部分允许您让 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 自动为特定目标平台选择特定配置。

This section will show the Master runtime feed URL by default, but you can click the <i0>Add</i0> button to create a new Runtime Feed where you give the name and the URL for the RSS feed, and then click <i1>Apply</i1> to tell <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> to access it.
默认此部分将显示主要的运行库下载源地址，但是你可以点击<i0>添加</i0>按钮创建一个新的运行库下载源，你可以在其它给出RSS源的名称和网址，然后点击<i1>应用</i1>告知<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> 访问它。
This setting controls how far you have to drag the tab before the workspace recognises it, and the default value is 4px.
该选项控制着在工作区识别出该操作之前你需要将标签页拖拽出多远，默认值为4px。
This setting controls how far you have to drag the tab before the workspace recognises it, and the default value is 50px.
此设置控制在工作区识别之前拖拽选项卡的距离，默认值为50像素。
This setting is on by default, and un-checking it will switch it off (meaning that you will have to manually remove any temp files later).
该选项默认为开，解除勾选此项会将其关闭（意味着你需要在以后手动地删除所有的临时文件）。
This setting sets the number of milliseconds to have to wait with the mouse button pressed before the node can be moved (not repositioned).
这个设定设置了在节点能够被移动之前需要等待鼠标按下的毫秒数（不重置）。
This setting will affect how much an object "bounces" when it collides with other objects and is co-dependant on other forces that act on the instance like gravity and friction.
此设置将影响对象在与其他对象碰撞时“弹跳”多少，并且与重力和摩擦力作用于实例上的其他力相配合。
This setting will be used to define the maximum permitted size (default 64px).
这项设定将被用于定义允许的最大尺寸（默认为64像素）。
This setting will be used to define the minimum permitted size (default 16px).
这项设定将被用于定义允许的最小尺寸（默认为16像素。）
This sharing is called "inheritance" and an object that has a parent is called a "child" object.
这种共享称为“继承”，具有父类的对象称为“子”对象。
This simple code will initialize a ten position array (0-9) to 0, in that each position in the array contains the value 0.
这个简单的代码将初始化十个位置的数组（0-9）为0，数组的每个位置储存的数值都是0。
This simply means that you can tell your game to run the current line of code, then step onto the next one, permitting you to run through your entire game one line of code at a time should you wish.
这意味着你可以告诉你的游戏运行代码中的当前行，之后跳转到下一行。只要你想，就允许你跨越整个游戏来运行一行代码。
This sprite is a tile set and resizing will cause tile data to change.
这个精灵是一个图块集，重定义大小将导致图块数据变化。
This sprite is used by multiple tile sets of varying tile sizes.
这个精灵被不同大小的多个图块集所使用。
This starts the game again after it has been paused
在游戏被暂停后再次开始游戏
This stretches the game window to accommodate both ports and uses the window colour to colour the background where no view is shown.
拉伸游戏窗口容纳两个视野输出，并用窗口颜色填充没有视野画面的区域。
This then permits you to manipulate in real time the position, colour, and alpha values that are actually rendered into the display buffer.<br0>
这样就允许你实时操作渲染到显示缓冲区的位置，颜色和 alpha 信息。<br0>
This time line has no moments with source code
该时间轴没有带有源代码的时刻

This type of information being provided by the error reporting is very important as it detects and reports the syntax and language related bugs that are going to cause your finished game to crash, but it won't report more subtle bugs, nor does it give feedback on performance.
错误报告提供的信息非常重要，因为它会检测并报告导致游戏崩溃的语法和语言相关的错误，但不会报告更多的细微错误，也不会给出修复反馈。
This value is <i1>not</i1> clamped to the game speed of your game, and so shows you how much "overhead" you have to play with.
这个值 <i1>不</i1> 能完全决定游戏的游戏速度，而是显示当你游玩时还有多少性能剩余。
This variable has been inherited from the parent object {0}.
此变量已从父物体{0}继承。
This variable will return a value based on the setting of bits for the different levels.
这个变量基于不同等级设置的比特值返回一个值。
This watch enables you to see exactly what is being drawn to any surfaces you have in your game (including the <t0>application surface</t0>) as well as see the texture pages that are in memory.
在此视图中允许你查看到底哪些东西正画在你的表面上（包括<t0>应用表面</t0>）以及查看内存中的材质页。
This watch shows you all the information available for the state of the current frame being rendered, like the draw alpha or fill colour.
这个窗口为你显示所有被渲染当前帧的可用信息，例如绘制的透明度或者填充颜色。
This will actually compile down to just "a & 11111111111111111111111111111010".

This will also show any debug messages that you choose to send from your project at runtime, and can be configured to show different quantities of information from the <a4> General Preferences</a4>.<br5>
除此之外还将显示您选择在运行库从项目发送的所有调试消息，并且可以从 <a4>常规首选项</a4> 设置显示不同数量的信息。<br5>
This will be <i0>on</i0> by default but can be switched off if you prefer by toggling this button.
这个属性默认是<i0>开着的</i0>但是你也可以根据你的喜好把这个按钮切换为关闭状态。
This will bring up the following window:
This will clear the screen with the colour blue.
这将用蓝色填充整个屏幕。
This will close the debugger and permanently discard all collected data.
这会关闭调试器并永久丢弃所有已收集的数据。
This will close the game and the debugger and permanently discard all collected data.
这会关闭游戏并永久丢弃所有已收集的数据。
This will create a bare (server) repository and bind your project to it
这将创建一个公开（服务器）存储库并将项目绑定到它
This will create a new DnD™ script and open the editor window: <i2>
就会创建一个新的DnD™脚本并打开编辑器窗口：
This will create a new particle emitter and store its index in the variable "p_emit".
这段代码会新建一个粒子发射器并将其索引存入变量“p_emit”中。
This will create a new sprite and open the sprite editor for you (if the sprite editor does not open, simply double-click <i4> on the new resource): <i5>
IDE 将会创建一个新的精灵并为你打开精灵编辑器（如果精灵编辑器没有打开，只需双击 <i4> 新资源就可打开）：<i5>
This will create a new view of the resource tree cloned from the previously selected view.
这将创建从先前选择的视图克隆来的资源树新视图。
This will create a new view of the resource tree with no resources added to it (ie: a blank view).
这将创建资源树的新视图，且不添加任何资源（即空白视图）。
This will free up the memory associated with all the entries and values for that array.
这会释放数组所有数据关联的内存。

This will give very detailed information on how a game is performing and how long it takes to perform specific function calls or events (see the section on <a2>The Debug Module</a2> for further details).
它将提供有关游戏运行情况以及执行特定功能调用或事件所需要时间的非常详细的信息（有关详细信息，请参阅 <a2>调试模块</a2> 一节）。

This will have a direct impact on how much inertia a fixture has as well as how it reacts to collisions and forces, so if you make a small shape with a high density it will have a very large mass (like a bar of lead), but if you define a large shape with a low density it will have a much smaller mass (like a balloon).
这将直接影响夹具具有多少惯性以及如何对碰撞和力产生反应，因此，如果您制造出高密度的小形状，则会产生非常大的质量（如铅棒）但是如果您定义了一个较小密度的大形状，那么它的质量会更小（像一个气球）。
This will lose any unapplied changes you have made - do you want to continue?
这将会丢失所有未应用的更改 - 你想要继续吗？

This will now create a file called "<t0>debug.txt</t0>" in the same location as the executable (not the shortcut location, but where the game is installed) with debug and compiler information from your finished game.
这将在可执行文件的位置（不是快捷方式位置，而是游戏安装位置）创建一个名为 “<t0>debug.txt</t0>” 的文件，它带有来自于你完成的游戏的调试和编译信息。
This will open the <b1>Asset Explorer</b1> where you can select the sprite to use: <i2>
这将会打开 <b1>资源管理器</b1>，您可以在其中选择要使用的精灵：<i2>
This will open the <b2>Tile Set Editor</b2> where you can then add the sprite and set its properties: <i3>
之后会打开 <b2>图块集编辑器</b2>，然后添加精灵并设置其属性：
This will open the following window for you to fill in:
这将打开以下窗口，供你填写：
This will open the window pictured at the top of this page with the following sections:
这将打开此页面顶部的窗口，具有以下部分：
This will prompt you to choose another event category and once selected the contents of the current event will be changed to the new event (removing the original event in the process).
这将提示您选择另一个事件类别，一旦选择了当前事件的内容将被更改为新事件（删除过程中的原始事件）。
This will re-open any windows that are related to a tutorial project you have opened, but only if the project is one that was created as part of a tutorial (if not, this option will be unavailable).
该选项将会重新打开任何与你所打开的教程项目有关的窗口，但是，前提是该项目必须已经创建为教程的一部分（否则该选项不可用）。
This will reset the focused workspace to be 1:1 again.
重新设置聚焦工作区为1：1比例。
This will return TRUE if argument0 is a power of 2.
如果 argument0（参数0）是 2 的幂，那么将返回 TRUE。
This will return the colour of the pixel at coordinates (56,78) of the surface indexed in the variable "surf".
这将返回索引为“surf”的表面在在坐标（56,78）位置的像素的颜色。
This will run the game, but also open up the <b4>Debug Window</b4>, where you can monitor how your game performs and debug any issues (see the section on <a5>Debugging</a5> for more information).
这将会运行游戏，并打开 <b4>调试窗口</b4>，您可以在其中监视游戏的运行情况和调试其中的问题（有关详细信息，请参阅 <a5>调试</a5> 部分）。
This will set a timer to "push" a notification to the device when one day has passed.
设置一个定时器在一天后向设备“推送”一个通知。
This will set the GUI layer to have a 1:1 scale again and set the draw position to the (0,0) position of the application surface rather than the display or window.
这个操作会再次设置以1:1的比例，(0,0)的位置，相对于应用表面层作出改变，而不是显示器或窗口。
This will set the active drawing font to fnt_Main if it exists.
这段代码在fnt_Main字体存在时将其设置为活动字体。
This will take the contents of the chosen event and duplicate them in another event that you specify.
这将取代所选事件的内容，并在您指定的另一个事件中复制它们。
This will then update the rest of the options windows to show different details depending on the platform selected.
然后剩余的选项窗口将会更新以显示不同的细节，具体内容取决于所选的平台。
This will toggle all the docked elements between hidden and unhidden.
切换所有已停靠的窗口的状态（隐藏和显示）。
This will toggle laptop mode on and off (This will only appear if you are currently using a laptop - see the section on <a0>IDE Input</a0> for more details)
打开和关闭笔记本电脑模式（使用笔记本电脑时才会显示） - 有关详细信息，请参阅 <a0>IDE输入</a0>部分 。
This will zoom the focused workspace in to make everything larger (you can also achieve this holding down <i0>/<i1> and using the mouse wheel <i2>).
缩放聚焦的工作空间，使所有内容变大（您也可以通过按住 <i0>/<i1> 并使用鼠标滚轮 <i2> 来实现）。
This will zoom the focused workspace out to make everything smaller (you can also achieve this holding down <i0>/<i1> and using the mouse wheel <i2>).
缩放聚焦的工作空间，使所有内容变小（您也可以通过按住 <i0>/<i1> 并使用鼠标滚轮 <i2> 来实现）。
This window is for when you select an instance from your game.
这个窗口是为了你在游戏中选择的实例而存在的。
This window is for you to add a specific variable that you want to keep track of.
这个窗口可以让你添加你想一直追踪的特定的变量。

This window is where you can see the current system profile for the game being tested where you can check everything in your game from whole events to individual function calls to see how they are performing and spot any trouble areas or bottlenecks.
该窗口是你查看当前被测试游戏所处系统概况的地方，在此处你能查看你游戏中从整个事件到单独的函数调用中的各种细节，以此了解程序如何表现它们的功能，而麻烦区域或者瓶颈又在哪里。
This window permits you to change those properties and edit how the layer will be rendered.
此窗口允许您更改这些属性并编辑层的渲染方式。
This window permits you to see a list of every resource in your game and you can type in text at the top of the window to filter the results shown.
此窗口允许您查看游戏中所有资源组成的列表，您可以在窗口顶部输入文本，以过滤显示的结果。
This window simply shows the output of the compiler (as shown in the main IDE compiler window).
这个窗口仅仅会显示编译器的输出（正如主IDE编译器窗口中显示的一样）。
This window will display the current call stack of events, as well as the line number for the code being stepped through.
这个窗口会显示当前事件的调用栈，还有按步跳过代码的行号。
This wizard helps you easily create a layout for your DnD™ action.
该向导可帮助您轻松为DnD™动作创建布局。

This won't be necessary if you clone the default view, since all current resources will be in it to start with, but if you use a blank view or use the <b5>Delete</b5> right mouse button option to remove the item from the new view, you will need to re-add it again later if required.
如果您选择克隆默认视图，则所有这些操作都不是必需的，因为所有当前资源都将被复制在其中，但是如果您使用空白视图或使用鼠标右键的删除选项从新视图中 <b5>删除</b5> 该项目，那么当需要该资源时，你需要重新添加。
This work around for those bad drivers will slow things down, giving a noticeable performance hit for your game, so if you do not need the fix do not use it.
对于那些糟糕的驱动，使用该选项会减慢游戏速度，带来显著的性能下降，如果你不需要修复，就不要使用该选项。
This would add "." to all the strings held in the cells within the defined region of the ds_grid referenced by the variable "grid".
这将会向索引为变量"grid"的栅格结构中确定区域内的单元格中的所有字符串叠加一个"."。
This would add 2 to all the values held in the cells within the defined disk area of the ds_grid referenced by the variable "grid".
这将会向索引为变量"grid"的栅格结构中确定圆盘区域内的单元格中的所有值叠加2。
This would add 6 to the given cell within the ds_grid referenced by the variable "grid".
这将会向索引为变量"grid"的栅格结构中被给定的单元格叠加6.
This would be a binary "mask" of 11111111111111111111111111111010 (32bits).
This would call User Defined Event 4.
这段代码会调用用户定义事件4。
This would require a left shift of 4 bits, or 7 bits respectively.
这分别需要向左移动 4 位或 7 位。
This would set my_x to the x coordinate of the mouse relative to the display.
上述将设置 my_x 等于相对于显示器的鼠标x坐标。
This would set my_y to the y coordinate of the mouse relative to the display.
上述将设置 my_y 为屏幕上的鼠标的y坐标。
This would set myx to the x coordinate of the mouse in the window relative to all active views.
这个将设置myx 等于窗口中相对于所有激活视野的鼠标x坐标。
This would set myy to the y coordinate of the mouse in the window relative to all active views.
这个将设置myy 等于窗口中相对于所有激活视野的鼠标y坐标。
This would set the variable "dpx" to the dpi value of the x axis.
This would set the variable "dpy" to the dpi value of the y axis.
This would set the variable "myheight" to the display's height.
设置变量“myheight”为显示器的高度。
This would set the variable "mywidth" to the display's width.
设置变量“mywidth”为显示器的宽度。
Tick this to display all values as averages.\nUntick it to display accumulated values.
勾选此项以将所有值显示为平均值。\n取消勾选以显示累计值。
Tile - The image will be tiled to cover the workspace
拼贴（Tile） - 图像将会被逐片拼贴到工作区上。

水平平铺或垂直平铺关系到图像放置在纹理页中时如何创建边缘。

Tile sets are taken from the sprite resources, but are classified as a separate resource since <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> will handle them differently when creating your game.
图块集从精灵资源中获取，但是由于 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 在创建游戏时会以不同于精灵的方式编辑图块集，所以它们被单独分类出来。
Tile size increase will cause rooms to lose some tile layer data, are you sure you want to make this change?\n\nTo avoid data loss press cancel and increase room size of the affected rooms: {0}
图块尺寸增加将导致房间丢失一些图块层数据，你确定要进行此更改吗？\n\n为避免数据丢失请按取消，并扩大受影响的房间的大小： {0}

首先，您只能在此列出一个单独的“本地”机器，这是安装了 <i1>GameMaker Studio 2</i1> 的机器，但您也可以配置远程工作人员来使用。
To call a script from within a piece of code, just act the same way as when calling functions - that is, write the script name with the argument values in parentheses.
在一个代码块中调用脚本就像调用函数一样 - 使用脚本的名字，括号内填写参数的值。

To change the current target platform you can click on the <b3>Targets</b3> button <i4> to open the <b5>Targets Window</b5>, which will look something like this (exact details will vary based on your licence type): <i6>
要更改当前的目标平台，您可以点击 <b3>目标平台</b3> 按钮 <i4> 打开 <b5>目标窗口</b5>，如下所示（具体细节根据您的许可证类型而会有所不同）：<i6>
To clarify this, think of a game made with <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>.

To control how the object behaves over time, each game frame is split into a series of <b3>events</b3>, so you can add code or actions into a specific event and it will only run when the event is triggered, and events can be triggered by things like mouse button presses or collisions with other instances.<br4>
为了更好地控制随时间推移中的物体，每帧游戏内容都会被分割成一系列 <b3>事件</b3>，所以你可以将代码或动作模块添加到某一个实践中，事件只有在被触发时才会运行，事件可以通过操作鼠标或者与其他实例碰撞来触发。<br4>

单个二进制数只能存储 0 或 1，只能这样，所以复杂的数字需要添加位数。

What this means is that you can "pick and choose" which compiler version and which runner version to use should you have found any issues with the current one or are aiming at a very specific target version or platform.
而这就意味着当你发现当前的编译器和运行器对某一个目标版本或平台有问题的时候，你可以“挑选”编译器和运行器的版本。
What this means, is that just as you are able to <i0>set</i0> multiple flags at once, you can also <i1>clear</i1> multiple flags at once.

我们需要的是一种比较容易翻转“位”的方法（最好没有 CPU 开销）。

When a Remote Worker has been configured, you will then be able to select it from the list here, and have <i2>it</i2> build your projects rather than use the host machine where <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> is installed.
当配置了远程工作机器后，您将能够从列表中选择 <i2>它</i2> ，并使用其来构建项目，而不只是使用安装了 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> 的主机。
When an error occurs during the compiling and execution of a project this is reported with a message in the <b0>Compile Errors</b0> <a1>Output Window</a1>, much like the one shown below:
当在编译和执行项目时发生错误，会在 <b0>编译错误</b0><a1>输出窗口</a1> 中显示一条消息，如下所示：
When creating games it is important that you play test the executable file to make sure that the final compile is correct and has no unforeseen errors or differences.
在制作游戏时，测试可执行文件是十分重要的，这可以确保最终的编译时正确的，没有意料之外的错误或差异。
When creating your game it's very easy to forget to declare a variable or mis-type a string as a real etc...
创建游戏时，一个常见错误是忘记定义变量，或者将变量错误定义（例如将字符串变量定义为实数变量等等……）
When does the overview appear next to a node?
这个概述什么时候出现在节点旁边？
When doing this, you drag the window to the area you want to dock to and it will be highlighted to show that you can dock the window there:
当您执行上述操做时，您需要将窗口拖动到想要要停靠的区域，当其突出显示时即表明可以将窗口停靠在那里：

When getting started configurations may not be that important, but as the complexity and number of projected target platforms grows you'll find that they are an invaluable tool in organising and exporting your games correctly.
刚入门时配置可能不是那么重要，但是随着预计目标平台的复杂性和数量的增加，您会发现它们是组织和导出您游戏的宝贵工具。

When laptop mode is on, <i8>Left</i8> <i9> and <i10>Left</i10> <i11> are "reserved" for mouse interactions like panning the room editor, where <i12>Left</i12> <i13> is zoom, <i14>Left</i14> <i15> is scroll and pan.
当笔记本模式启动时，<i8>左</i8><i9>和<i10>左</i10><i11>是“预留”给像在房间编辑器中平移的这种鼠标操作的，而<i12>左</i12><i13>是给缩放的，<i14>左</i14><i15>是给滚动和平移的。

When laptop mode is on, <i9>Left</i9> <i10>/<i11> and <i12>Left</i12> <i13> are "reserved" for mouse interactions like panning the room editor, where <i14>Left</i14> <i15>/<i16> is zoom, <i17>Left</i17> <i18> is scroll and pan.
当笔记本模式打开时， <i9>左</i9> <i10>/<i11> 和 <i12>左</i12> <i13> 被 “保留” 用于鼠标交互，比如平移房间编辑器，其中 <i14>左</i14> <i15>/<i16> 控制缩放, <i17>左</i17> <i18> 控制滚动和平移。

When making games, it is often necessary to store information about the game state in a file of some type, but storing this information on the device is not always the best option as, if the player deleted the game and then re-installs, this information may be lost.
在游戏开发过程中，常常需要将游戏的状态信息保存在特定类型的文件中，但是把这些信息保存在本地设备上在大多数时候并不是一个好的选择，因为当玩家在卸载游戏之后重新安装时，这些数据可能会丢失。
When navigating the different sections of the Start Page, clicking <i0> on this will simply take you back to the main page.
当你导航至起始页的不同页面，点击<i0>将带你回到主页。
When programming your game using <i0>GML</i0> you should be aware that function call arguments are not guaranteed an evaluation order.
在使用<i0>GML</i0>编写游戏的时候，你会注意到函数调用参数的顺序并非固定的。

When programming your game, whether using code or Drag and Drop, it can be very easy to make mistakes - using the wrong variables, passing the wrong arguments, or using the wrong functions are just some of the most common errors we all make - and these mistakes are not always detected by the syntax checker that is included with the script/action editor.
游戏的编程阶段，无论是使用代码还是拖放模块，都非常容易犯错误 - 使用错误的变量，传递错误的参数或使用错误的函数是我们所犯的一些最常见的错误 - 脚本/动作编辑器附带的语法检查器并不能没有遗漏地检测到这些错误。
When removing events, you can use <i0> + <i1> to select multiple events and then delete them all together.
删除事件时，可以使用<i0> + <i1>选择多个事件，然后将它们全部删除。
When running a game for debugging, you can also see how your game performs and get an overview of how everything is working together by using the <b0>Profile</b0> option in the <b1>Debug Module</b1>.
当运行游戏进行调试时，您还可以通过使用 <b1>调试模块</b1> 中的 <b0>配置</b0> 选项来了解游戏的运行情况，并了解所有部件是否运行一致。
When set to <t0>true</t0> (and you have vSync active) an alternative method will be used to that which is the default, with the aim to reduce any possible visual lag or stuttering of your game.
当设置为 <t0>true</t0> （并且激活了垂直同步）时，替代方法将被使用，取代默认的方法，以减少任何可能的视觉延迟。

When the day is up, if your game is either in the background or not running, a notification will be shown to the user with the given title and message (on iOS, the game name is shown and the title is ignored), and then an asynchronous Push Notification Event will be called.
一天以后，无论你的程序是在后台还是未启动状态，玩家都将收到之前设置的通知（在iOS平台标题被游戏的名字替代了），然后一个异步的推送通知事件（Push Notification Event）会被触发。
When the game is paused, you can then use the next three buttons for "stepping" through your code.
当游戏暂停的时候，你可以之后使用下面三个按钮来“逐步”运行你的代码。
When the operating system delivers a local or remote push notification and the target application is not running in the foreground, it presents the notification to the user in the form of a banner.
当操作系统推送了一个本地或远程的通知而目标程序并没有在前台运行时，通知将会以banner(横幅) 的形式来展示。
When this option is checked, and you have specified the argument types in the script, then they will be shown in the status bar at the bottom of the editor, enclosed in {}.
当该选项被勾选并且你在脚本中标注了参数类型的时候，它们会被显示在状态栏当中，并被花括号括起来。
When unchecked, instances of this object will still be processed, but will not be drawn
取消选中时，仍将处理此物体的实例，但不会绘制
When using any project view other than the default one, you can drag and drop resources wherever you wish and rename folders to be anything you wish too.
当使用除默认项目视图之外的任何项目视图时，您可以随意拖放资源，并将文件夹重命名为任何您希望的内容。
When using the Block Pattern option, this sets the first colour for alternate blocks.
当使用方块图案选项时，该颜色被设置为交替方块的第一种颜色。

When working on mobile devices (in particular Android devices) this is an important factor to take into consideration as what may be appropriate for one display resolution, may not be appropriate for another.
在移动设备上运行时（尤其是安卓设备），这是一个重要的考量，适合这个显示器的分辨率时，可能不适合另外一个。
When working with objects in the <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> IDE, you can set up <b1>Parent / Child hierarchies</b1>.
使用<i0> GameMaker Studio 2 </i0> IDE中的对象时，可以设置<b1>父/子层次结构</b1>。
When working with the resource tree, you can use the right mouse button <i0> on any resource or folder to open a menu of options: <i1> The options available to you are:
使用资源树时，可以在资源或文件夹上点击鼠标右键 <i0> 打开选项菜单 <i1>：您可以使用的选项有：

When writing code and this is enabled, the IDE will automatically add the two brackets () that a function requires, placing the cursor within them if the function takes arguments, or placing the cursor after them if it does not.
当你写代码并且这个开启时，IDE将自动添加函数需要的两个括号()，如果函数有参数将会光标将会放置在括号内，如果没有参数，光标将会放在后面。
When writing code and this is enabled, you will get a popup window showing possible functions that you can use based on the current input text.
当代码并且启用时，你将看到一个弹出窗口，显示基于你输入文本的可能的函数。

When you click the Create Executable button you will be prompted to tell <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> which type of package you would like to create (can be either for ARM, x64 or x86 architectures), and you should choose that which targets the devices your game will be supported on: <i4> If you check the box marked <b5>Package For Store Upload</b5>, then the final package created will be an <t6>.appxupload</t6> file, which is what Microsoft specifies should be used for submitting apps to their store, as explained in this article <a7>here</a7>.

当您单击“创建可执行文件”按钮时，系统将提示您告知 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> 要创建哪个类型的软件包（可用于 ARM，x64 或 x86 架构），您应该选择设备类型以使您的游戏支持相应的设备： <i4>在 UWP 编译选项种如果您选中标记为<b5>商店上传包 </b5> 的框，那么创建的最终包将是一个 <t6>.appxupload</t6> 文件，如本文中所述，这是微软指定应用于将应用程序提交到其商店的文件格式，你可以点击 <a7>这里</a7> 提交。

When you create a new project from the <a0>Start Page</a0>, your resource tree will only contain empty folders for the resources you may need, so you need to <i1>right-click</i1> <i2> on the sprite resource folder and then select the option <i3>Create</i3>.

When you create a variable it can be used to hold information, and when you call a <i0>GML</i0> function, it can also return information.

When you first create a new object resource, there is a check-box marked <b0>Uses Physics</b0>, which is not checked by default.

When you first open <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>, you will be asked to log in to your <b1>YoYo Account</b1> (or register for one if you haven't already - see <a2>here</a2>).
第一次打开 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>，你将被要求登录你的 <b1>YoYo 帐户</b1>（如果你没有就注册一个 - 参见<a2>这里</a2>）。
When you first start <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>, your workspace will already be populated by a couple of windows which will be "docked" to the IDE.
当您第一次启动 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 时，您的工作区将被几个“停靠”到 IDE 的窗口填充。
When you flag an instance as being solid, you are telling <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> that it should try to resolve any collisions before triggering a <b1>collision event</b1>.
当您将实例标记为稳固时，您会告诉<i0> GameMaker Studio 2 </ i0>，它应该尝试在触发<b1>碰撞事件</b1>之前解决任何冲突。
When you go to add a sprite to an object or when you want to use a font in Drag and Drop or in any number of situations, you will be presented with the <b0>Asset Explorer</b0>:

When you use this window to make a search, the results will be shown in the <a0>Search Output Window</a0>.

Whether to set the screen to fullscreen (true) or not (false).

While <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2> is a powerful tool, it cannot do everything for you at the touch of a button so start small with simple examples and you will realize that not only is creating games great fun, but that learning to use <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> to do it is also very rewarding!
而 <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>是一个强大的工具，在能随心所欲的制作游戏之前，我们先从一些简单的小例子开始。你就会明白，制作游戏是一件很有趣的事情， 而且学习使用 <i3>GameMaker Studio 2</i3> 也是非常值得的！

While it's true you can still get some speed ups - and sometimes these can be significant - using binary and hex leads to you knowing the CPU better and can also lead to writing better code, being able to pack data better, and making some tasks a lot simpler.
虽然这是事实，你仍然可以得到一些速度上的提升 - 而有时这些提升可以更加显著 - 使用二进制和十六进制可以让 CPU 运行得更快，也能写出更好的代码，以及更好的打包数据，让一些任务变得简单得多，这些你应该都是知道的。
While we finish up your installation...

在任何工作区内，您可以随时在任何地方通过右键单击 <i1> 调用 <b0>右键菜单</b0>，菜单内容如下：<i2>

With a sprite assigned to the object you can click the Edit Sprite button <i0> to change the sprite properties, or if you do not have a sprite for the object but wish to create one you can click the Add Sprite button <i1> to create a new sprite resource and assign that.
使用分配给物体的精灵，您可以单击编辑Sprite按钮<i0>来更改精灵属性，或者如果您没有该对象的精灵，但希望创建一个，可以单击添加Sprite按钮<i1>到创建一个新的精灵资源并进行分配。

With a sprite created, we can go ahead and define the tile set, which means you have to first create a new tile set resource by right clicking <i0> the Tile Set resource folder and selecting <i1>Create</i1>.
创建一个精灵后，我们可以继续来定义图块集，您需要先通过右键单击 <i0> 图块集资源文件夹并选择 <i1>创建</i1> 来创建新的图块集资源。
With that done how do we use an array for practical things?
然后，我们怎么实际应用呢？
With that done, everything that would appear in view 0 will now be drawn to the surface we have created instead.
之后，所以将出现在视野view 0中的事物现在绘制到我们创建的表面层里。.
With the "normal" collision system your collisions are based off of the mask of the sprite assigned to the object, but with physics enabled this is no longer the case.
使用“正常”碰撞系统，您的碰撞是基于分配给对象的精灵的掩码，但是物理启用不再是这样。
