With the Desktop version of <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> all the limitations of the Trial Licence (see above) are removed and you can compile projects to the following Desktop targets:
使用桌面版的<i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0>将会移除所有试用版许可的限制（见上文），并且你可以在下列目标的桌面平台上编译工程：
With the advent of vertex buffers, matrices and cameras in <i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>, the following functions have been made obsolete:
随着<i2>GameMaker Studio 2</i2>中顶点缓冲区、矩阵以及摄像机系统的引进，下述函数已经作废：
With the resources you have seen so far you can add some nice images and sounds to the game resource tree, but they don't do anything in the game itself yet!
到目前为止你可以添加漂亮的图像和优美的声音资源，但是它们还没有在游戏内做任何事！
With these tools you can see how well your game is performing and what areas need "tweaked" to increase this performance.
使用这些工具，您可以看到游戏的表现如何，以及需要“调整”哪些方面才能提高游戏的性能。
With this function you can center the game window in the display when the target module is Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS, or you can center it in the browser if the target module is HTML5.
对于Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) 或者 MacOS 平台， 你可以使用这个函数将游戏窗口屏幕居中，而对于HTML5目标模块，是浏览器居中。
With this function you can change or set the position of the mouse within the game display which can be useful for FPS games, for example.
有了这个函数，你便可以更改或设置游戏屏幕上的鼠标位置，对于FPS游戏来说，这可能会比较好用。
With this function you can change or set the position of the mouse within the game window which can be useful for FPS games, for example.
有了这个函数，你可以更改游戏窗口的鼠标位置，这在FPS游戏中非常有用。
With this function you can change or set the windows caption for the room that you are currently in.
有了这个函数，你可以更改或设置当前所在房间的窗口标题。
With this function you can change the size of the game window.
有了这个函数，你可能更改游戏窗口的大小。
With this function you can check to see if two arrays are equal (equivalent or the same).
使用该函数你可以检测两个数组是否相等（等价或一致）
With this function you can copy the contents of one grid into another one.
使用这个函数你能够把一个栅格内的内容复制给另一个。
With this function you can create an array of a given size.
使用该函数，你可以创建一个给定长度的数组。
With this function you can enable or disable the application surface.
可以用这个函数启用或禁用应用表面层。
With this function you can find the overlapping region of the rectangle defined by (x1,y1) to (x2,y2) on each of the attached displays.
使用这个函数你可以查找 (x1,y1) 到 (x2,y2)矩形范围内的每个附加显示器的重叠区域。

With this function you can get the current cursor being used in the game window, with the return value being any one of the constants listed below (to set the current cursor being used you can use the function <a0><t1>window_set_cursor</t1></a0> which also takes these constants):
可以用这个函数获得当前游戏窗口使用的鼠标指针，返回值将下面所列的常量中的一个（设置当前的鼠标指针可以使用这个函数 <a0><t1>window_set_cursor</t1></a0> ，同样也是使用下面的常量）：
With this function you can get the current height (in pixels) of the game window.
这个函数可以获取游戏窗口的高度（像素为单位）。
With this function you can get the current width (in pixels) of the game window.
通过这个函数获取游戏窗口当前宽度（像素为单位）。
With this function you can get the height (number of entries) of a the first dimension of a 2D array.
使用该函数你可以得到一个二维数组的高度（以数组元素的个数形式）。
With this function you can get the internal Windows id value (the HWND, a <i0>pointer</i0>).
使用该函数您能获取到内部Windows内部id值（HWND，一个<i0>指针</i0>）。
With this function you can get the length (number of entries) of a 1D array.
使用该函数你可以得到一个一维数组的长度（以数组元素的个数形式）。
With this function you can get the length (number of entries) of a the second dimension of an array.
使用该函数你可以得到一个二维数组的高度（以数组元素的个数形式）。
With this function you can get the value from a given named global variable.
使用该函数你可以从所给定全局变量名的变量中的值。
With this function you can get the x position (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
通过这个函数，你将获取HTML5游戏浏览器内窗口的x坐标，或者者Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) 或者 MacOS 游戏显示屏内的窗口坐标。
With this function you can get the x position of the mouse cursor (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
使用该函数您可以获取到鼠标光标在显示器上（Windows、Ubuntu(Linux)及MacOS平台）的x坐标（像素为单位），如果是HTML5平台则是在浏览器中的位置。
With this function you can get the y position (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
通过这个函数，你将获取HTML5游戏浏览器内窗口的y坐标，或者者Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) 或者 MacOS 游戏显示屏内的窗口y坐标。
With this function you can get the y position of the mouse cursor (in pixels) within the browser if it is an HTML5 game or within the display if it is a Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS game.
使用该函数您可以获取到鼠标光标在显示器上（Windows、Ubuntu(Linux)及MacOS平台）的y坐标（像素为单位），如果是HTML5平台则是在浏览器中的位置。
With this function you can poll the window (or tab) state and if it loses focus the function will return <t0>false</t0> otherwise it will return <t1>true</t1>.
使用这个函数您能够得到窗口（或标签页）的状态，如果它失焦的时候，该函数会返回<t0>false</t0>，反之则返回<t1>true</t1>。
With this function you can send a request to connect to a server.
您能够使用该函数发送一个连接服务器的请求。

With this function you can set the cursor for the game window to any one of the constants listed below (to find the current cursor being used you can use the function <a0><t1>window_get_cursor</t1></a0> which will also return one of these constants):
有了这个函数，你可以设置游戏窗口的光标为下面列出的任意一个常量（获取当前使用的光标可以使用函数<a0><t1>window_get_cursor</t1></a0> ，它将返回这些常量中的一个）：
With this function you can set the game window to a specific position within the display (on MacOS, Linux(Ubuntu) and Windows) or within the browser (HTML5).
有了这个函数，你可以设置游戏窗口至显示器内的特定位置 （适用 MacOS, Linux（Ubuntu） 和 Windows） 或者浏览器内 （HTML5）。
With this function you can set the game window to be full screen (<t0>true</t0>) or not (<t1>false</t1>).
有了这个函数，你可以设置游戏窗口为全屏幕（<t0>true</t0>）或者不是全屏（<t1>false</t1>）。
With this function you can set the position of the game window within the browser (HTML5) or display (Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or MacOS) <i0>and</i0> set the scale of the window too.
有了这个函数，你可以设置浏览器内（HTML5）或者显示器内（Windows、 Ubuntu （Linux）或者 MacOS）游戏窗口的位置<i0>和</i0> 大小。
With this function you reset all further drawing from the target surface back to the screen.
用这个函数重置后面所有的绘制，从目标表面层返回到屏幕上。
With this method you could focus test with someone else or, as the designer, get a better feel for things by doing side-by-side tests.
用这种方法，你可以与其他人一起进行测试，或者最为设计人员的你，可以通过并行测试来更好地了解游戏。
With this option you can choose to have the message show, have it update the layers as if you'd clicked "Ok", or have it not update anything as if you'd clicked "No".
使用这个选项你可以选择显示消息，如果单击“Ok（确定）”它会更新层，单击“No（否）”将不会自动更新。
With this option you can convert from one to the other, regardless of the project type.
使用此选项，无论项目类型如何，都可以将其从一个转换为另一个。
With those details given you can then click on the <b0>Create Certificate</b0> button to generate the <t1>*.pem</t1> file.
鉴于那些给你的细节，你可以点击<b0>创建证书</b0> 按钮生成<t1>*.pem</t1> 文件。
Within the Marketplace dashboard you can set up different publishers if you require and each one should have it's own corresponding <t1>*.pem</t1> certificate file.
如果你需要，在市场面板里可以设置不同的开发者，每一个都应该拥有对应的<t1>*.pem</t1> 证书文件。

You <i0>could</i0> use a tilemap, but given that tilemaps are restricted to using a grid and only a single image per grid cell, they can be a bit restrictive.
虽然 <i0>可以</i0> 使用图块，但是由于图块限制必须使用网格而每个网格单元只能有一个图像，所以图块映射层会产生限制。
You also have a couple of specialist functions that are designed only for use with the application surface:
你也有只为应用表面专门设计的函数可以使用：
You also merge these secondary workspace windows back into the main one by dragging the tab back onto the first window.
您还可以将这些辅助工作区窗口通过将标签拖回到第一个窗口，来将其重新整合到主窗口中。
You are about to delete the directory "{0}" and all the items it contains.
您将要删除目录"{0}"以及它所包含的所有项目。
You are about to delete the file "{0}".
You are about to remove ""{0}"" from view ""{1}"".
You are logged into too many devices at once; manage devices and sessions on our website
你一次登录太多设备；请在我们网站上管理设置和会话。

You are not actually passing the array itself into the script (as you would a variable), but instead you are requesting that the script create a <i1>copy</i1> of this array, which you will change in the script.
你不是传递这个数组自身（数组变量），代替的是要求脚本创建这个数组的<i1>拷贝（副本）</i1>，脚本中可以随意更改。
You are not editing an action.
You are not previewing an action.
你没有在预览一个动作。
You are performing a one-way conversion from DnD™ to GameMaker Language.
你正在执行一个 从DnD™ 到 GML的单向转换。

You are presented with a list of everything and as you type the search term, this list will be culled to suit, so if all your rooms are prefixed with "rm_" for example, typing that will cull the resource list to show <i2>only</i2> those resources that begin with that name.
你会看到一个列举了全部东西的列表，并且随着你键入搜索项，该列表就会进行适配筛选，所以如果你的所有房间的名称都用"rm_"前缀，键入"rm_"就会筛选资源列表并<i2>仅</i2>显示以这个名字开头的资源。

You are presented with a list of everything and as you type the search term, this list will be culled to suit, so if all your rooms are prefixed with "rm_" for example, typing that will cull the resource list to show <i3>only</i3> those resources that begin with that name.
当你输入的内容越全，检索的精度越高，如果你的房间以“rm_”作为前缀，那么输入“rm_”时将会<i3>仅</i3>显示那部分资源。
You are using a reference to an argument that does not exist but that could map to another argument (for more information on scripts and arguments see <a0>here</a0>)
你正在引用一个不存在的参数，但该引用可以映射到另一个参数（有关脚本和参数的更多信息，请参阅 <a0>这里</a0>）
You assign the array to a variable, and then "fill in" different indices of the array with values.
你可以将数组赋予给一个变量，然后用值“填入”数组的各个索引元素中。
You can <i0>not</i0> edit most of the other information here (as it is set through the <a1>Target Manager Devices</a1> settings, but you can change the <b2>Network Speed</b2> value.
你<i0>不</i0>可以编辑此处的大部分信息（因为它们是通过<a1>目标管理器设备（Target Manager Devices）</a1>被设定好的，但是你可以修改<b2>网络速度（Network Speed）</b2>值）。
You can add breakpoints using the key "<t1>F9</t1>", and they will be shown in the <a2>Output Window</a2> where you can enable/disable them as required.
您可以使用快捷键 <t1>F9</t1> 添加断点，它们将显示在 <a2>输出窗口</a2> 中，您可以根据需要启用/禁用它们。
You can add up to 10 "bookmarks" to IDE windows or sections of code in scripts or object events, and then you can quickly skip between them using the correct key combination.
您可以将最多10个“书签”添加到 IDE 窗口，脚本或物体事件中的代码中，然后便可以使用正确的组合键快速在它们之间切换。
You can also <b0>Add a new SSH keypair authentication</b0> by clicking the button with that label.
你还可以通过单击具有 SSH 标签的按钮 <b0>添加以 SSH 密钥验证身份的账户</b0> 。
You can also add or subtract <i6>one</i6> from a value using <b7>++</b7>, <b8>--</b8>.
你甚至可以用以下符号加减<i6>一</i6> ： <b7>++</b7>，<b8>--</b8>。
You can also assign values to the enum variables at the time of creation:
你也可以在制作过程中将值赋给枚举变量：
You can also create a sprite to be used as a <b4>tile set</b4>, but we'll explore that option later too.
您也可以创建一个精灵来用作 <b4>图块集</b4>，我们稍后也会详细介绍这个选项。
You can also delete an array simply by "re-assigning" the variable that defines it to a single value.
删除一个数组仅需要对定义它的变量重新赋予一个值。
You can also delete views using the button <i0> (this is not available for the default view) and views can be renamed by simply clicking on the name and entering the new name you require.
您也可以使用按钮 <i0> 删除视图（不可用于默认视图），只需点击名称并输入所需的新名称即可重命名视图。
You can also edit the sprite resource image that has been assigned by clicking the Edit Image button <i2> to open the Image Editor.
您还可以通过单击编辑图像按钮<i2>来编辑已分配的精灵资源图像以打开图像编辑器。
You can also run the game in <b2>Debug Mode</b2> by testing using the Debug button <i3>.
您也可以通过使用 <b2>调试模式</b2> 按钮进行测试来运行游戏 <i3>。
You can also see in the image above the <b0>Output Window</b0>.
您可以在上方的图像中看到 <b0>输出窗口</b0>。
You can also set the speed to follow the path and a number of other actions relating to the position and orientation of the path within the room.
同时你也可以设置沿路径运动时的速度，以及在运动到不同位置及方向时执行不同的动作。
You can also set this variable to effectively turn "on" or "off" a view by setting the value to <t0>true</t0> (visible) or <t1>false</t1> (invisible).
可以通过设置这个变量的值的<t0>true</t0> (可见) or <t1>false</t1> (不可见)，来“打开”或“关闭”一个视野。
You can also specify the precision for the curves (default is 4) which can be from 1 to 8 with 8 being the smoothest.
同时你可以设置曲线的平滑程度（默认是4），范围是1至8，其中8最为平滑。

You may also use (and get returned) the following built in constants when using pointers:
在使用指针的时候，你可能会使用（或通过返回得到）如下的内置常量：

You must first enable the option and then set either the <b1>Raw DPi Override</b1> value (the default value is 96) or set the <b2>Percentage of the native DPi</b2>, and once changed you will be prompted to restart the IDE, which may require you to save any work being done on the currently open project.
你必须首先启用此选项，然后设置 <b1>原始DPI</b1> 值（默认为96）或设置 <b2>本地DPI百分比</b2>，一旦更改，将提示你重启IDE，则可能需要你保存当前打开的项目。

You must first enable the option and then set the value (the default value is 96), and once changed you will be prompted to restart the IDE, which may require you to save any work being done on the currently open project.
你必须先启用该选项然后去设置它的值（默认值为96），并且一旦你应用了修改，你就会被提示去重启IDE，而这就可能要求你保存当前打开的工程的所有工作。
You must first open a project to import resources into
您必须先打开一个项目才能将资源导入
You must include at least one resource
你必须添加至少一个资源
You must specifiy the full path to the VCVARS32.BAT file
你必须指定 VCVARS32.BAT 文件的完整路径
You must then send this registration id to your server, and every device that your game is installed on will have a different registration id.
你必须发送这个注册ID（registration id）到你的服务器，每个设备都拥有独一无二的注册ID（registration id）。
You need to commit changes before pulling.
在拉取之前你需要提交更改。

You need to to set the temp path to point to your game <t0>*.win</t0> file, and then save this as "<t1>GM_Test_1.bat</t1>" to your desktop (be aware that Notepad will save automatically as a <t2>*.txt</t2> file unless you choose "all files" from the save dialogue options).
你需要设置临时路径（<LOCAL TEMP PATH>）指向你的游戏 <t0>*.win</t0> 文件，然后保存为 “<t1>GM_Test_1.bat</t1>”（注意记事本会自动保存为 <t2>*.txt</t2> ，所以你需要在保存对话框的保存类型选择“所有文件”）。
You see, an array is basically a container with a number of spaces to store values, and each position in the container has a specific number to identify it, which is what we put in the [].
你看，一个数组基本上是一个容器，里面有一些存储值的空格，容器中的每个位置都有一个特定的数字编号来标识它，也就是我们放在[]中的内容。
You should <b1>ALWAYS</b1> check that a surface exists using <a2><t3>surface_exists</t3></a2> before referencing them directly.
在直接引用它们之前，你需要 <b1>一直</b1>使用 <a2><t3>surface_exists</t3></a2>检测表面层是否退出。
You should also note that you can <b0>name events</b0>, or at least give them a short descriptive text that will be shown beside them in the Event Editor.
您还应该注意，您可以<b0>名称事件</b0>，或至少给他们一个简短的描述性文本，将在事件编辑器旁边显示。
You should also realise that nothing will be seen if the surface itself is not drawn on the screen in the draw event of an instance.
还需要知道的是，还需要在实例的绘制事件中绘制才可以看到表面层的内容。
You should also realise that parents can have parents too!
你也应该意识到，父母也可以有父母！

You should first change the <b2>Default</b2> settings to create a base for all the resource tree nodes, and then go on to edit individual node label settings as required (note that they will all have "Use Default" selected to start with).
你应该首先更改 <b2>默认</b2> 设置以创建所有资源树节点，然后继续根据需要编辑单个节点标签设置（请注意，它们的初始选择都是“使用默认值”）。
You should now go to where you created the shortcut to the game executable, and then right click on it and select Properties.
你现在应该找到游戏快捷方式，并且右键点击并选择属性。

You should now have an idea of what the basic resources that are available to you to make your games are, so we'll move on and have a look at the general workflow when using <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> and starting out on a new project.
您现在应该了解了可用于制作游戏的基本资源，因此我们可以继续阅读并了解使用 <i0>GameMaker Studio 2</i0> 创建新项目的一般工作流程。
You should permit the web server to communicate through the firewall if this happens.
如果发生这种情况，你应该允许网络服务器穿过防火墙进行通信。
You simply set the date and time for the notification and it will be displayed to the user if the game is not currently running.
你仅仅需要设置时间日期和通知内容，如果你的程序当前没有在运行的话，通知就会被推送。You simply set the date and time for the notification and it will be displayed to the user if the game is not currently running.
You supply the array to check and the output from the function tells you how many initial entries it contains.
你需要提供待检测的数组，然后函数的输出将会告诉你它包含多少初始元素。

You supply the entry number for the first dimension and the function will return the number of second dimension entries that the array has (to find the length of the first dimension use the function <a0><t1>array_height_2D</t1></a0>).
你需要提供数组第一个维度的元素索引，然后函数会返回你在该元素下数组的长度（如果要获得数组的第一个维度请使用函数<a0><t1>array_height_2d</t1></a0>）。
You supply the name of the global variable to get the value of <i0>as a string</i0> (see example code below) and the function will return the value held by the global variable.
你需要提供待取得值的全局变量的<i0>字符串形式的</i0>名称（见下方代码），然后这个函数就会返回该全局变量所承载的值。
You tell the function the length of the array to create, and it will return the "handle" for the array which you can then assign to a variable.
你需要告诉这个函数所要创建的数组长度，然后它会返回给你这个数组的“句柄”，你可以将这个句柄赋给一个变量。
You then drag the object into a room in the <a1>Room Editor</a1> to create an <b2>instance</b2> copied from the basic object template.
然后，将物体拖动到<a1>房间编辑器</ a1>中的房间，以创建从基本物体模板复制的<b2>实例</b2>。
You will also need the path to the <t1><yourgame>.win</t1> file, as this is what we are going to point the runner to.
你还需要找到 <t1><你的游戏>.win</t1> 文件，因为这是我们需要指向 Runner 的文件。
You will be prompted to give a save location and a name for the file, and you should take note of this for future reference.
